Geb degi Jesús amarga sogdesun: —Ar a-ulale, escriba-wargwen bela Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid-igar nue wisile, bab-na-neg-yaur-sediid-wargwenyobdo, igi we-dule na e-ibmar-nuedgi ibmar-binigan, degi, ibmar-sergan, ono-dae, deyobmodo, we-dule-nue-igar-wisid, ibmar-epenne-durdaksad, degine, ibmar-bini-durdaksad ebumodo baigan-odurdakega.
Jesús igar-burbamaladgi-sunmaksiid bergusad-sorba, nade-gusad.
Jesús na e-dungued-neggweburse nonigu, Judiomar-onmaked-neggi emar-odurdaksigisad. Bukidar agi geger dakdemalad, sogdemalad: —¿Ar wede, bia binsaed-nuegan ami-dae, degine, ibiga nabir wede ibmar-dakledisurmalad imak-dae?
¿Ar wede carpinter-e-machisursi? ¿Ar e-nande María-nugsursi, Santiago, José, Simón, degine, Judas, amarde e-urbamarsursi?
¿Ar bela-e-bunmarde anmar-abargi gudisursi? ¿Ar degite, wede bia we ibmarmar durdaksasunna?
Degisoggu, a-ular dulemar geger Jesús-dakdemalad, Jesúsgi uludmarsunnad. Ar Jesúsdi amarga sogde: —Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad bela-neggwebur-baigangi bina nue sogdamalad, unnila e-neggweburginbi, degi, e-neg-yaurginmaladbi baisur dakdamalad. A-ulale bemar an-abingassurmarmogad.
Degisoggu, a-ulale, Nazaretgi Jesús ibmar-dakledisurmalad dogdar gwen imaksasulid, ar ade bukidar egi benmalad.
Deun a-ibagangi, Rey-Herodes itoar bela-dulemar Jesúsgi sunmakedbimar.
Herodes na e-maiganga sogde: “We-dule-gudiid, we Juan-Bautista, ar wede gannar-durgus gudiid, a-ulale nabir ibmar-dakledisulid imaked.”
Ar ade Herodes, Juan-Bautista-gasa-gusad, eskoro-dubgi-edicha eskaryagi mete-gusad, Herodías-ular. Herodíasde, Felipe-omenad. Ar ade Herodes e-urbagi ome-egwachad.
Ar ade Juan Herodesga soged: “We-ome be nikued sulinye.”
Deun Herodes Juan-oburgwebien-inigwele, geg oburgwe-gusad, dulemar-dobedba. Ar ade dulemar Juangi binsamalad, we Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbegedye.
Deun Herodes-gwalulesad-ibagi iba-ononanaigua, Herodías-e-sisgwa emar-abargi dodosgua, Herodes deun nue-yeer daksa-gusad.
A-ulale Herodesde bunagwaga sogsad: “Napira an bega soged, Bab-Dummad-nuggi an bega sogbalid, ar ibu be anse egisbie, an bega ukoed.”
A-bunagwade, e-nan-ega-sogedba Herodesga sogded: —Bategi, Juan-Bautista-e-nono be anga udaye.
Rey-Herodes deyob bunagwa-ega-soge itosgu, nue bukib-ito naded, ar bato bunagwaga sogsasoggu, “Napira an bega sogye, ar ibu be anse egisbiele, an bega ukoye,” degine, dulemar-eba-mesa-naba-siid e-itosmosoggu, Herodes e-sordamarga sogdesun, “Bunagwaga Juan-Bautista-e-nono ukmarye.”
Degisoggu, Herodes igar-uksasun, Juan-Bautista-eskaryagi-mellesiid e-dukar egwanegar.
Sordamar Juan-Bautista-e-nono bategi senonimargu, bunagwaga uknonimarsun, geb degi bunagwa e-nanga uksamosunnad.
Geb degi Juan-sapingan, Juan-e-san sunonimar, geb degi na neg-uangi digsamarsunnad. Geb degi Juan-e-sapingan nadmargu, Jesúsga sogdapmalad, Juan igi burgwisad.
Juan-Bautista-burgwisad Jesús wisgusgu, dulemargi banguded, na emarbi urgi bachikii nadmalad, nega-dule-sulidganba. Ar dulemar Jesús-naded wisguarmargu, neggwebur-irba eba nagap nade-gusmalad.
Jesús urgi aidedgu, dulemar-bukidar e-idu bukwa dakargu, nue dulemar wile dakde, degine, dulemar-uelemalad bela nudaksad.
Bato neg-sedodgu, e-sapingana Jesússe warmaknonimalad, ega sogdemalad: —Emi anmar nega-dule-sulidgangi bukmalad, degine, bato neg-sedodbalid. Degisoggu, dulemar be barmid, adi neggweburmarse namalagar, adi agi mas-gunned na bakmaloed.
Jesús na e-sapingan-abin sogde: —Wemar nasulir akarsulid, ar bemar ega mas-gunned ukmala.
E-sapingan, abin-sogdemar: —Anmar wegi mas sated, unnila madu-gwaatar, degi, ua-ukabo anmar nikmalad, degite, ¿igi anmar we-dulemar masgi ogunmalosunna? Geg anmar masgi ogunmalad.
Jesús na e-sapinganga sogde: —Degite madu, degi, ua anse be sedamar.
Geb degi Jesús gagan-birgi dulemar-oambikuega imaksad. Jesús madu-gwaataled, degi, ua-ukabogwad susgua, niba atakdegu, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsad. Geb degi Jesús madu, degi, ua biske-biske imasgu, na e-sapinganga ukded, degi e-sapingan dulemar-bukidaradga ukdemosunnad.
Degine, bela-dulemar-gudidimalad nue-immeles mas guchamalad. Jesús-sapingan mas-obichad wesmargu, garba-gwaambe-gakabo-mergu enosmalad.
Ar dulemar-mas-guchamalad, unnila macherganbi miliatarsaar mergued, omegan, degi, mimmigan, amardi obarilesulid.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapingan urgi gwae nakwega imaksad, adi e-iduar mata-dummad-gaka-obakar namalagar, na edi dulemar naega imakega besad.
Jesús dulemar bela barmisgu, na walagwen yar-birse nakwisad, Bab Dummadse golegar. Neg-mutikudgu, na walagwen Bab Dummadse gorsigisad.
Ar e-sapingandi urgi mataba omukulenado, ar ade burwa asabin gormaid.
Wakudaryalaba, Jesús na e-sapinganse mata-dummad-birgi ganna-ganna nade-gusad.
Jesús-sapingan, dule mata-dummad-birgi-dani dakarmargua, dobe-ito nadmalad, dobedba binnasur gotemalad, sogdemalad: —¡Sergan anmargi dani!
Degisoggu, a-ular Jesús yog e-sapinganse gotesun, ega sogdesun: —¡Be gandik imakmar, ani an gudii, mer be dobgumar!
Geb degi Pedro, abin-sogde: —Dummad, ar be gudiile, an bese mata-dummad-birgi ganna-ganna daged be an-imakdo.
Jesús Pedroga sogde: —Be dagdena. Pedro urgi-siid mata-dummadgi aidesgu, mata-birgi ganna-ganna Jesússe nade-gusad.
Pedro burwa-binnasur-gormai dakdegu, dobe-ito naded. Geb degi matagi dogdegu, binnasur gote, sogde: —¡Dummad, an-bendake!
Geb degi Jesús argangi Pedro-gasgu, Pedroga sogded: —Be an-bengued-duled, ar ¿ibiga be an-bengusa?
Ar Jesús, Pedro-ebo urgi nakwismargu, burwa bogidik naded.
Degine, urgi-bukwamaladi daksamargu, Jesús-nug odummodmarsun, igi Bab-Dummad-nug odummole-damogadyob, Jesúsga sogdemar: —Ar nue be Bab-Dummad-Machi-sunnadye.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapinganmala mata-dummad obaksamargua, Genesaret-yarse nonimarsun.
Dulemar-a-neggweburginmalad mag daksamargu, we Jesús gudiiye, gaya-burba mimmidmar, neggwebur-dikarba nanaidse. Degine, bela dulemar-uelemalad Jesússe senonimar.
Jesúsgi wilenagus-damalad: “Unnila be mor-dukubi wis ebuged be anmar-imakye.” Ar bela e-mor-duku-ebusmalad, bela nugusmalad.
Geb degi escribamar, degi, Fariseomar Jerusaléngi-danimalad Jesússe nonimargu, Jesúsga sogdemar:
—¿Ibiga be-sapingan dadgan-igar-maidgi-wede yoledimala? ¿Ar ibiga be-sapingan argan enuksurmala mas-gunned-iduar?
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —¿Ar ibiga bemarmo Bab-Dummad-igar-maidgi yoledimarmosunna, bemar dadgan-igar-maidba daed-ular?
Ar Bab Dummad sogsad: Be-bab-nug, degi, be-nan-nug, be odummogoye. Ex. 20:12; Dt. 5:16 Degine: Dule-gwensak babgi, igi, nangin-dibe gaya-ichakwa sunmaksale, a-dule oburgwemaloye. Ex. 21:17; Lv. 20:9
Ar emigindi bemar-Fariseomardi soggu: ‘Ar doa-dule e-babga, degi, e-nanga sog-dibe: Geg an be-bendaked, ar bela-an-ibmar-nikadi bato Bab Dummadga an uksad.
Ar degisoggu, a-dule e-bab, degi, e-nan bar bendaksulir, gwen akarsulid.’ Ar weyob bemar dulemar-odurdakedba Bab-Dummad-igar-maidgi yoledimardo, be-dadgan-igar-maidba daed-ular.
¡Bemar wagar-darbo-damalad! Ar nabir Isaías, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged, epenne bemar-nik sogsa-gusad, deun Bab Dummad sogye sogsa-gusgu:
We-neggwebur unnila askinbi an-nug odummomalad, ar e-gwage-ulubgindi angi gwen binsasurmalad.
Ar binsa askinbi amar anse gordimalad, an-nug odummomalagar. E-igar-maid odurdakeddi, dulemar-igar-mesisadba bur odurdakmalad. Is. 29:13
Degi Jesús dulemar-yogsarmaladse gotegu, amarga sogded: —Nue bela bemar an-itomalo:
Ar mas-gunned dule-ichosulid, ar dule galagwensuli-sunmakerdi, adi dule-ichodo.
Geb degi e-sapingan Jesússe-walik gunonigua, ega sogdemar: —¿Be wisi, emi Fariseomar sae-itodmalad, weyob be-ibmar-soge itoarmargu?
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —Ar an-Bab-nibneggi-maid sapi digsasulid, a-sapi gannar ungoed.
Mer geger be Fariseomar-dakmala, ar ibya-suliyob gudidimalad, amar aku-atakmalad-iduedmalad. Ar dule-ibya-sulid, dule-ibya-sulid-idumaile, ebobela neg-gullu-dummadgi argwanmaloed.
Pedro, abin-imakdegu, Jesúsga sogde: —Anmarga be oduloge, we be-ibmar-burbar-soged mas-gunned dule-ichosulid, we ibu obare.
Jesús, abin-sogde: —¿Ar bemarmo amba aku-itomarmoga?
¿Ar bemar aku-itoge, bela mas-gunned, unnila sabanse ubod-daed, degi, geb gannar miled-dabalid?
Ar dule-galagwensuli-sunmakeddi, adi gwagegi-bukwa ainiar-daed, degisoggu, amardi dule-ichosundo.
Ar dule-gwagegi binsaed-iskanamar ainiar-daed, na iblomalad, na ome-dikarba, degi, sui-dikarba yolemalad, na abirgunagwarsuli neg-sichigi nanamalad, ibmar-atursamalad, gakansaar aimar-barsoged, Bab-Dummad-nuggi dodomalad.
Ar we-ibmarmardi dule-ichomaladdo, ar dule argan-enuksuli mas-gunneddi, dule-ichogedsulid.
Jesús Genesaretgi-gudiid nade-gus, Tiro, degi, Sidón-yarse.
Agi ome-wargwen, Judiosulid, Cananeagined, a-yalaganba-danikid, binnasur Jesússe gordani, sogdani-gusad: —¡Dummad, be David-Wagwa, wile be an-dake! An-bunagwa sabsur niasamaid.
Ar Jesúsdi gwen abin-imaksasulid. Geb degi e-sapingan Jesússe warmaknonimargu, egi wilenagusmalad, ega sogdemalad: —We-ome be barmide, ar anmar-sorba wede ee gordanikid.
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —An barmilealidi, dulemar-baiganse an barmilearsulid, unnila Israel-dulemar-sibad-wawaadyob-yoggus-gudimaladse an barmilealid.
Degi, ome Jesús-abin yokorgi signonikid, ega sognonikid: —¡Dummad, be an-bendake, anga an-bunolo be nudake!
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —Be Judiosursoggu, an be-bendakele, mimmigan-mas achuga uknaiyob an imako-itole, degisoggu, igar-maisulid mimmigan-mas achuga be ukoye.
Ome, Jesús-abin sogde: —Dummad, nabir be sogendo, ar degi-inigwele, achumarse-bakar sunna mimmigan-mas mesa-urba-batemamaid gunmogad.
Geb Jesús, ome-abin imakdegu, sogde: —Ome, ibibayobi be an-bensuli bega sunna be-bunolo an nudakoed, degisoggu, deyob bega gusun. Ar a-wachigi yog e-bunolo nuguar-naded.
Tiro-yargi, degi, Sidón-yargi Jesús bangudgua, Galilea-mata-dummad-naidse nonikid. Geb degi Jesús yar-birse nakwisgu, agi sigidapid.
Agi dulemar-bukidar Jesússe nonimalad, ese senonimalad, dulemar-muya-muya-nanamalad, dulemar-ibya-surmalad, dulemar-geg-sunmakmalad, dulemar-sakwa-sikarmalad, degi, bukidar dulemar-galagwensuli-uelemalad Jesús-nag-naba mesnonimalad. Jesús amar bela nudaksa-gusad.
Degisoggu, dulemar-bukmalad geger dakdemalad, dulemar-geg-sunmakmalad sunmak imasgu, dulemar-sakwa-sikarmalad nudaksagu, dulemar-muya-muya-nanamalad nabir-nanae imaksagu, dulemar-ibya-surmalad mag-daksa imasgu. Degisoggu, Israel-Bab-Dummad-nug ogannodmarsun.
Degi Jesús na e-sapinganse gochagua, amarga sogde: —We-dulemar nue-wile an daked, ar ibapaagus anmarba bipirmakdimalad, mas-gunned sate gudimalad. Degisoggu, dulemar mas-gunsuli an barmidele, abakalegi igarba negoedamalale.
Geb degi e-sapingan, abin-sogdemar: —¿Ar bia wede anmar neg-dule-sulidgangi mas-ichesur amimalosunna, we-dulemar-ichesulid masgi ogunnegar?
Jesús na e-sapinganga sogde: —¿Madu-bigwa bemar nikmarsunna? E-sapingan, abin-sogde: —Madu walagugle anmar nikmalad, degi, ua anmar wis nikmarbalid.
Degi, Jesús dulemar-bukidarmalad napagi-sigega imaksad.
Jesús madu-walagugled susgua, degi, uamar susbargua, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsa-gusad. A-sorba, madu, degi, ua biske-biske imaksagu, e-sapinganga ukded. Geb degi e-sapingan dulemarga ukdemogad.
Dulemar-bergwapa madu, degi, ua-guchamargu, nue immelesmalad. Jesús-e-sapingan e-gwabgusad bela wesmargu, garba-gwagugle enosmalad.
Bela madu, degi, ua-guchamalad, macherganbi milibake-mergu daklealid. Omegan, degi, mimmigandi gwen obarilesulid.
Degi, Jesús dulemar-barmisgu, Jesús urgi nakwissun, geb degi Magdala-yalaganse nonisunnad.
Fariseomar, degi, Saduceomar, Jesússe nonimar, yamo Jesús-wilubdakegar. Jesúsga sogdemar: —Be anmarga Bab-Dummad-ganguedba, ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid anmar-wagab be imake, adi anmar mag be-dakoed, be Bab-Dummad-nuggi nue danikid.
Jesús amar-abin imakdegu, sogde: “Wegi anmar-yargi neg-sedodele, bemar sogmardo: ‘Mogir, ber ginnidikid, degisoggu, neg-yolasaila guoed.’
Degine, neg-wagdar bemar sogmarbardo: ‘Emi mogir ber ginnidikid, degine, gutumar yaisurbalid, degisoggu, dii burwaba mesa wioed.’ ¡Bemar wagar-darbo-damalad-dulemar! Ar di-wioeddi magar bemar dakmalad, degite, bemar-abargi ibmar-gunaiddi aku bemar dakmalad.
“Dulemar galagwensuli-damalad, degi, neg-sichigi-galagwensuli-yolemaladyob Bab-Dummad-sogedba-ibsasurmalad, amardi ega ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad oyobi abedamalad. Ar we-wilubgan ega oyolegosurmalad, unnila ega oyolegoedi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged, Jonás, a-gusadyob a-wilubgan ega oyolegoed, adi wisgumalagar an doa-dule gue.” Jesús degi-sogsagu, emargi bangudsun.
Jesús na e-sapinganmala mata-dummad-gaka-obakar mosgua, e-sapingan dakarmar madu na iesmala.
Jesús na e-sapinganga sogdesun: —Nue salakarmar, Fariseomar, degi, Saduceomar-madubur-inagi.
Jesús-sapingan na dukin ulubgi binsadmalad, sogdemalad: —Jesús weyob anmarga soger-gebed, anmar madu searsulidbar.
Jesús mag daksagu e-sapingan madu-senonisulidgi sunmakmalad, amarga sogdesun: “¿Ar ibiga bemar sogmarsunna, anmar madu searsurye? ¿Ar amba be an-benmarde?
¿Ar amba bemar nue-akusunna itomala, degine, be insasurmarsi, madu-gwaataledgi dulemar-miliatar madu guchamalad? ¿Agi madu-obichad garba-gwaambe-gakabo-mergu bemar wesmarbarsursi?
Deginbali, ¿amba bemar insasurmarbali, madu-gwagugledgine dule-milibake madu guchamalad? ¿Agi madu-obichad, garba-gwagugle bemar wesmarbarsursi?
¿Ar ibiga bemar nue-akusunna itomala, madu-ular an bemarga sogsasulid, bemar nue salakarmarye, Fariseomar, degi, Saduceomar-madubur-inagi?”
Geb degi Jesús-sapingan nue mag itosmalad, ega sogsad, madubur-inagi nue salakarmarye, nue madubur-ina-sunnadgi ega sogsulid. Ega soged, Fariseomar, degi, Saduceomar-ibmar-odurdakedgi nue salakarmarye.
Jesús Cesarea-de-Filipos-yarse nonigu, agi e-sapinganse egichialid, ega sogded: —¿Ani Dule-Machi, wede doaye an-nik dulemar sogmala?
E-sapingan abin-sogdemar: —Gwenna-gwenna Juan-Bautistaye, be-nik sogmalad. Baigandi sogmalad, be Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged Elías-nugadye. Agi baigan sogmarbalid, be Jeremíasye, ar a sulile, baigan sogmarbalid, be Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged epenne-gudigusad-wargwenye.
Jesús na e-sapinganga sogde: —¿Bemardina, doaye an-nik sogmarmosunna?
Simón-Pedro Jesús-abin sogde: —Be Cristo, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule, Bab-Dummad-Dula-Maid-E-Machi-sunnad.
Geb degi Jesús, abin-imakdemogad: —Simón, be Jonás-machi, begi nued binsalesad, ar dule we-ibmar bega sogsasulid, bega-sogsadi, an-Bab-nibneggi-maid, a bega we osanalos, an Cristoye, Bab-Dummad-Machi-sunnadye.
Ani an bega sogsun; be Simónye-nugad, Pedroye be-nuggubaloed. We-akwa-birgi anba-nanaimalad an na omelomai an imakoed, burgweddi gwen egi nakosulid.
Degine, ani an Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid-yabi an bega ukoed, ar bela we-napneggi be-ibmar-sogsadba galenonikile, nibneggi bela galenonimogoed. Ar we-napneggi be-ibmar-sogsadba igar-egasale, nibneggi bela deyob igar-egalemogoed.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapinganga sabsur sogdesun: “Melle dulemar-baiganga bipisaar sogoye, ede Jesúsye, Cristoye, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule-sunnadye.”
A-iba-onodedgi Jesús na e-sapinganga e-burgoedgine sunmakded, ede Jerusalénse naer-gebye, Judiomar-girmar-dummaganse nue odurdaklegoye, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganse nue wilegoye, degine, escribamarse wilebaloye, ede amarse oburgwilegoye, geb degi ede ibapaagi gannar durguoye.
Pedro, deyob-Jesús-sogsad itosgu, bachik Jesús-sesad, Jesúsga sabsur ibmar sogded: —Dummad, na be dukin wile na be dake, ar bela we-ibmar-be-sogsadi mer deyob bega guena-gadin.
Ar Jesús Pedrosik aibiris imaksagu, Pedroga sogde: —¡Nia-saila-Satanás, be angi bangusun! Bedi igar-iskanagi an-egwanbi-gudiid. Pedro, ar be-binsaedi, Bab-Dummad-sunnaa be binsasulid, unnila dulemar-sunnaa be binsaed.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapinganga sogde: “Ar dule-wargwen an-sapinga gubiele, na dukin san ieger-gebed, nakrus-semaiyob nanaer-gebed, bato burgwenadapidyob, geb a-dule anba dagodo, geb a an-sapinga guodo.
“Ar dule-wargwen anba-naid-ular burgwebisulir, e-san-burba ei yogguodo. Ar anba-naid-ular burgwenonikirdi, adi na e-san-burba yogguosurdo.
¿Ar ibi-nuedga dule-wargwenga gusar be insae, ar dule napneg-naid bela egadga imaksar, ar e-san-burbadi yoggusar? Deginbali, ¿dule-gwensak e-san-burba-ular, ibi na uksar be insae, adi e-san-burba mer ei yogguegar? Ibmar-sated san-burba-ular ogwaed.
“Ar Dule-Machi na E-Bab-ganguedgi, degi, yeer-daklegedgi na e-angermar-abargi we-napnegse danikir, geb degi bela wala-walagwen dulemarga ibmar uknonikoed, na e-ibmar-imaksamaladba.
Napira an bemarga soged, gwenna-gwenna wegi-bemar-bukmalad, burgosulid, amba dula gudii Dule-Machi-neg-dakmai-gued bemar dakedsemalad.”
A-iba-nergwad-sorbali, Jesús, bachik Pedro, Santiago, degine, Santiago-urba Juan, amar bachik yar-bir-matusulidse sesad.
Amar-asabin yar-birgi-gwichi Jesús-e-san-dakleged gwagde-gusad, na e-wagar dad-ibeler-gaeyobi gade-gusad, degine, e-mormar bela ise-sipumakar, bela dagudik, gwallubayobi dakle-naded.
Geb agi Jesús-sapingan-warbaagwad dakdemalad, dulemar epenne-dula-gudigusmalad, Moisés, degi, Elías, amar Jesúsmala sunmakgwichi.
Geb degi Pedro Jesúsga sogdesun: —Dummad, we nueddo wegi anmar gudigu. Ar be abegele, anmar wegi obunnoged-neg-gwapaa sobmalodo: Gwagwen bega, baid Moisésga, geb baid Elíasgarmo.
Ar amba Pedro sunmakgwichi, mogir mee emar-birgi nagunonikid. Geb agi mogir-imbaba gaka-burba gollalid, sogded: “We An-Machi-sabedi gued, we-machigi yeer an itoged. A-Machi nue be itomar.”
Ar Jesús-sapingan degi-gaya-burba itosmargua, yog napase askun sindigar sigidmalad, bela nue-dobe-ito nadmalad.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapingan-walik nonisunnad, e-argangi ebunonikid, emarga sogded: —Be gwisgumar, mer be dobgumar.
E-sapingan nono-onakwidmargu, dakdemalad, unnila bato Jesúsbi walagwen gwichi.
Jesús na e-sapingan-warbaagwadmala yar-birgi-gwichi aidearmargu, na e-sapinganga ise-sabsur sogded: —Mer bipisaar an-san-gwagsad bemar daksamaladi dulemarga sogmaloye, geb Dule-Machi burgwisar gannar durgusad-sorba, geb be sogmaloye.
Geb degi e-sapingan Jesússe egichiarmarsun, ega sogdemar: —¿Ibiga degite, escribamar sogmarsunna, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule-nonikoed-idu, Elías-inse nonigweloye?
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Ar napiragwad, Elías-inse bina nonikoed, bela-dulemar Bab-Dummad-igargi-binsaega nudaknonikoed.
Ar andi an bemarga soged, Elías bato nonikid. Nonigu, aku-daksa-gusmalad, ar igi na imakbi-gusmala, deyob Elías-imaksa-gusmalad. Amba deyob ani Dule-Machi, amarse odurdaklemogoed.
Geb degi e-sapingan mag itosmalad, Juan-Bautista-nik ega ibmar soged.
Jesús na-e-sapingan-warbaagwadmala dulemar-bukidar-bukmaladse aidenonimargu, dule-wargwen Jesússe nonikid, yokorgi sindigar abin signonikid, ega sognoni:
—Dummad, an-machi wile be dake, an-machi burwa-saar-daed, degine, ani nue odurdaklediid, imbagwenar soogi argwate-daed, imbagwenar digi argwate-daed.
Ar be-sapinganga an-machi an senonikinad, be-sapingan anga gwen nudaksasurmalad.
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —¡Bemar Babgi-bengumalad-dulemar, bemar Bab-igar-oakalogedmar! ¿Sanase bemar-abargi an gudiguosunna, bemar mer an-bengumalagar? ¿Sanase mag be itomaloe? Budar an bemar-daked danikid. Machigwa anse be sedamar.
Geb degi machigwa Jesússe senonimargu, Jesús niaga binnasur ibmar sokar, geb agi nia-machigwagi-maid nodsun, geb agi machigwa nugussunnad.
Geb e-sapingan Jesússe bachikii nonigu, ega sokarmalad: —¿Ar ibiga anmardi geg niaburba-onogusmala?
Jesús abin-sogde: —Ar bemar ulubgi amba angi benmarsoggu, a-ular geg niaburba bemar onogusmalad, ar napiraa an bemarga soged, ar bemar wismalad igi mostaza-gwag bur-bipigwa. Ayob-dungu bemar angi bensulir, sunna we-yarga be sogsamalaled: ‘Wegi-siid be weba ainir,’ ar yar ainirisaled. Ar ibmar bela be imakedbiirdo.
An-emis-nia-onosadgiid, geg dule onoged, unnila mas-gunsuli Bab-Dummadse-goledgi geb bemar sunna wegiid-niamar-onoged.
Jesús Galilea-yargi bipirmakdimaladgi, na e-sapinganga sokalid: —Ani Dule-Machi, dulemarse uklegoed.
Geb agi dulemar an-oburgwemaloed. Ar degite, ibapaagi gannar an durguoed. E-sapingan Jesús-deyob-ega-soge itoarmargu, nue wile-itodmalad.
Jesús na e-sapinganmala Capernaumse modapmalad, dulemar-Bab-Dummadse-goled-negga-mani-wemalad Pedrose nonimalad, ega sognonimalad: —¿Bemar-odurdaked-saila, we Bab-Dummadse-goled-negga-mani-weleged bennuksuli?
Pedro, abin-sogde: —Anmar-odurdaked-saila bennuke. Negse Pedro dogdegua, Jesús-inse ega sunmakalid, ega sogded: —Simón, be dakegua, reymar-we-napnegginmalad ¿doamargi we mani ga-damar be insae? ¿E-sordamargine, igi, dulemar-baigangine?
Pedro, abin-sogde: —E-sordasurmaladgi mani galeged. Jesús Pedroga sogdesun: —Degisoggu, e-sordamardi geg bennuksundo.
Ar degi-inigwele, dulemar mer anmargi urwemalagala, mata-dummadse be nae, be ua-sona. Ua gebe-be-sooedi, e-gaya be egaoed, a-e-gaya-yaba be mani-amioed. A-manigi bega, degi, anga, be mani-galeged bennukoed.
A-ibagangi, deun Jesús-e-sapingan Jesússe nonimalad, ega sognonimalad: —¿Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidgi doa bur-dule-dummadi?
Jesús machi-bipigwad-wargwense gochagua, emar-abargi ogwichisgu,
sogde: “Napira an bemarga sogmalad, ar bemar machi-bipigwa-daedyob gusulile, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse geg be dogmalad.
Ar degisoggu, doa-dule na san bipii we-mimmigwayob na imakele, ar a-dule Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidgi dule-dummaddo.
Ar doa-dule an-nuggine we-mimmigwayobid-wargwen ber nue-weligwar abingaele, ar an-abinganaiyob gunaido.”
Jesús sogdebar: “Ar dule-wargwen akwamu-dummad e-dukargi-nai demar-wilase metemalar, we-dule nue-dummad-wilegoed, ar burgoed. Aba bur-bule, dule nue-dummad-wilegoed, dule-wargwen we-mimmi-burwiganayob angi-bensur-gudidiid iskuega imaksar. Degisoggu, dule-ichoged-iduar, we-dulega bur-nuedirdo akwamu-dummad dukargi-nai burgwed.
Ibibayobi dulemar we-napneggi-bukmaladga iskana, ibmar dulemar gwage-ichomalad nikagu, degite, ibmar-dule-ichomalad nue abelebalid, degi-inigwele, ¡ar dule emar-gwage-ichodiiddina, adi nue-dummad-wilegodo!
“Degisoggu, ar be-argan, igi, be-nag-dibe, be-gwage-ichogega be-imak-dibe, bur be siked nabirid, begi-dikasur-meted be imake, ar bur-nabirsursi, dula gudigued nag-wargwen, igi, argan-wargwen-nika dula gudigued, bur argan-warbo be nikad, igi, mali-warbo be nikad, be soo-saila-geg-berguedse bur melleder.
Ar be-ibya be-gwage-ichogega be-imak-dibe, bur ibya be onoge, begi-dikasur-meted be imake, ar bur-nabirsursi, ibya-gwagwen-nika dula gudigued, gwendi, ibya-gwabo-nika bur soo-saila-geg-berguedse melleder.”
Jesús sogdebar: “Nue be salakarmar, mer ibgwensur we-burwigana be dakmalo, ar napira an bemarga soged, ar nibneggi e-angermar an-Bab-nibneggi-maid-walik gudigumalad.
Ar ani, Dule-Machi, an nonigu, dulemar-yoggus-gudimalad abonogega an nonikid.
“Bemar itogua, ar dule-wargwen dulatar-na-sibad-wawaad-nikad ei wargwen yoggusale, ¿ar dulabake-gakambe-gakabakebakad-obes nadsulir be insae, sibad-wawaad-wargwen-ei-yoggusad, sapurba aminaegar? Aminadele.
“Napira an bemarga soged, ar na amisale, we sibad-wawaad-wargwenadba bur-weligwar itosaled, sibad-wawaad-dulabake-gakambe-gakabakebak yoggussulidba.
Degisoggu, be-Bab-nibneggi-maid, sibad-wawaadyob we-bipigana-wargwensaar ei yoggubisur abemaid.”
Jesús sogdebar: “Degisoggu, be-gwenad begi nosale, ese be nae, unnila bebo-apinni siidgi nue ega be soge, nue be angi nosye. Ar be-gwenad nabir be-itosale, na be-gwenad be-aiga gannar gunonikoed.
“Ar be-gwenad be-itosulile, dule-wargwen, igi, dule-warbo-dibe beba be nide, adi bela be-ibmar-sogoed, amar-wagab be sogegar.
“Ar amar-wagab be-gwenad be-itosulile, bela na Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-abargi be ega ibmar soge, ar amar-abargi amba be-gwenad be-itosulile, dule-Bab-Dummad-wichurmaladyob be we-gwenad-daksunnoed, degine, Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbamaladyob be we-dule-dakbaloed.
“Napira an bega soged, ar bela we napneggi be-ibmar-sogsadba galenonikile, nibneggi bela galenonimogoed, ar bela we-napneggi be-ibmar-sogsadba igar-egasale, nibneggi bela deyob igar-egalemogoed.
“Gannar an bemarga soged, ar bemar-warbo we-napneggi na be-emarbi-binsae Bab Dummadse ibmar egichidele, ar ibu be egisbimala, an-Bab-nibneggi-maid a-ibmar bemarga imakoed.
Ar bia bemar-warbo, igi, warbaa an-nuggi ambikunonimalale, an bato bemar-abargi siid.”
Geb degi Pedro Jesússe walikaa gunonikid, ega sognonikid: —Dummad, An-gwenad-angi-nosadga, ¿ilabigwa angi nossulidyob an dakoe? ¿Ilagugledsega?
Jesús abin-sogde: —Unnila ilagugleye an bega sogsulid, an bega soged, dulapaagwad-gakambe-ilagugle be-gwenad begi nossulidyob be dakoed.
Jesús sogdebar: “A-ulale, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaiddi, ar rey-wargwen e-maimar-egi-mani-ganikid-ebo igar-nabirogega ese gocha-gusadyobdo.
Wargwen-egi-mani-ganikid ese nonigu, dakleardo, talento-mili-ambe egi ganiki.
Ar we-dule mani-satedsoggu, geg e-dummad bennuked. A-ular e-dummad ega sogdesun, ‘Be-ome, degi, be-mimmimar, degi, bela be-ibmar-nikad be manigi ukna, adi agi be an-bennukoed.’
“Dakargu, a-maide, yokorgi e-dummad-asabin sindigar sii, egi wilenagusad, ega sognagualid: ‘Dummad, mer doga-doga be an-imako. Bela an be-bennukoed.’
Ar we-mai-e-dummad, wile na e-mai-dakdegu, a e-maiga sogdesun: ‘Be angi bar mani ganisurdo.’
“Ar we-mai, e-dummad-walik-siid nodgu, dule-ebo-arbaed, egi denario-dulatar-mani-ganikid abingualid. A-dule gammuyagi gasgu, ega sogded: ‘Angi be-mani-ganikid, be an-bennuk.’
“Geb agi na-ebo-arbaed, egi wilenagusad, ega sogded: ‘Mer doga-doga be an-imak. Bela an be-bennukoed.’
“Ar we-dule-ebo-arbaed gwen itobi gussulid. Nade-gusad, eskaryase dule-egi-mani-ganikid-metedapid, bela-egi-mani-ganikid bela e-bennukedse.
Ebo-arbamalad deyob daksamargu, bukib binsadmalad, nadmargu, e-dummadga bela sogdapmalad, emar na ibmar daksamalad.
“Geb degi e-dummad dule-egi-mani-gani-gusadse gochad, ega sogded: ‘Mai, be dule-iskana, bela-be-angi-mani-ganikid an bela bega osulosad, ar be angi wilenagusadbar.
¿Ar be geg bebo-arbaed be wile dakmosi, igi wile an be-daksamoga?’
Geb degi e-dummad uludgu, dulemar-odurdakmaloedga we-mai-iskana-urmaksasun, adi bela-egi-mani-ganikid bela e-bennukedse.”
Geb degi Jesús sogde: “Amba deyob an-Bab-nibneggi-maid bemar-sabsur-imakmarmogoed, ar bemar bela gwagegi na be-gwenad-begi-nosad be ega sogsurmalar: ‘Be angi nossuliyob an be-dakoye.’ ”
Emi Jesús weyob-ibmar-sogsad-sorba, Galileagi bangudsun, Judea-yalaganba, Jordán-diwar-obakar nade-gusad.
Dulemar-bukidar Jesúsba nade-gusmalad, agi dulemar-onudaksad.
Geb agi gwenna-gwenna Fariseomar Jesússe nonimalad, yamo yardaknonimalad, ega sognonimalad: —¿Wede binsa yogsaar sunna ome-meteye igar mai?
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogde: “¿Ar bemarde Bab-Dummad-Gardagi absodisurmarsi: Gebesailagi Bab Dummad we-napneg nasikargu, machered ome-ebo abirgunagwar ogwisgunonikid?” Gn. 1:27; 5:2
Degi Jesús sogdebar: “Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaibalid: A-ulale, machered ome-nikusale, e-babgi, degi, e-nangi banguoye igar maid, adi unnila e-ome-ebo gudiguegar, na ebogwad san-wargwennaga gunonisunnoed. Gn. 2:24
Ar degisoggu, bar na warbomarsursundo, unnila san-wargwennaa gunonimarsundo. Ar degisoggu, Bab Dummad abirgunagwar-dule-imaksadi mer na meted imakmar.”
Fariseomar, Jesús-abin sogdemar: —¿Ar ibiga degite, Moisés igar-mesissunna, ome-meted-garda imakoye ome-metegar?
Jesús, abin-sogde: —Ar bemar-gwage dutusulidba Moisés bemarga igar mesis-gusad, sunna bemar ome-meted-garda imakye, ome-metega, ar iduardi degi-igar-maisulinad.
Ar andi an bemarga soged, ar doa-dule ome-mete-dibe, ar e-dikarba-nosardi nabir metodo. Ar degisulirdi, ar ome-baid-nikusale, we-machered ome-dikarba neg-sichigi yolediido. Ar doa-dule, ome-melleded-nikusale, we-dule ome-dikarba neg-sichigi yoledimodo.
E-sapingan Jesúsga sokarmarsun: —Ar weyob macheredga ome-nikued-sik ega igar maile, mer bur ome-nikued nabir.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapingan-abin sogde: —Suli, deyobsuli. Ar bela dulemar ome-nikuosurmar-deeye soglesulid, unnila Bab Dummad dulemarga igar-uksamaladga, amardi nabir ome-nikuosur nanamalodo.
Ar gwen-gwen gusgu muu-neggi-danikid siamar-baisur-daked, ar gwen-gwen yamo girmar emar-abargi siamar-baisur-daked imaksamalad, ar gwen-gwenbali, siamar-baisur-daked dukin na imaksamalad, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid-ular. Ar dule sunna unni na ome-suli nanao-itogele, we-igar na abingaodo, ome-suli nanaed.
Geb degi Jesússe mimmigan-senonimalad, adi e-argan mimmigan-nonogi mesega, Bab Dummadse ega golega. Jesús-sapingan dulemar-mimmigan-senonimaladse uluarmalad.
Ar Jesúsdi sogded: —Mer ese urwemar. Mimmigan anse daged be imakmar, mer be bargamar, ar Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid we-mimmiganyob-damaladgadid.
Ar Jesús mimmigan-e-nono-birgi na e-argan mesisgu, nue nabir egi binsaded, Bab Dummadse ega gochad. Geb a-sorba Jesús nade-gusad.
Geb degi dule-wargwen Jesússe nonikid, ega sognonikid: —Odurdaked-saila-nued, ¿ibi-nued an saer-gebe, burba-geg-bergued an nikuegar?
Jesús, abin-sogde: —¿Ibiga dule-nuedye be anga soge? Dule-nued niksulid, unnila Bab Dummadbi wargwennaa dule-nued gued. Ar burba-geg-bergued be nikubiele, Bab-Dummad-igar-mesisadba be nanaer-gebed.
Dule, abin-sogde: —¿Igid-igarmala? Geb Jesús, abin-sogde: Mer dule-oburgwemalo, mer sui-dikarba, degi, ome-dikarba yolemalo, mer atursamalo, mer gakansaar aimargi sunmakmalo.
Be-babgi, degi, be-nangi nue-binsaed-nikaa damalo. Degine, na be dukin san-sabeyobi, emar be sabgumogo. Ex. 20:12-16; Dt. 5:16-20; Lv. 19:18
Sapingwa, Jesús-abin sogde: —Gusgu an sapingwagwad-akar bela we-igarmar-mamaidba an nanadiid. Emidi, ¿ibubi napi-imaked an abesunna?
Jesús, abin-sogde: —Ar ibmar-napiragwadbi-imakdii be nanabiele, be-negse be nae, be-ibmar na be manigi uknae, geb agi mani wileganaga be mimmioed. Geb degiir be nibneggi ibmar-nued be nikuodo. Geb a-sorba anba be dagoed, an-sapinga guegar.
Sapingwa deyob Jesús ega soge itosgu, naibi-ito naded, ar ade dule-mani-ibedid.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapinganga sogdesun: —Napira an bemarga soged, ibiyobi dule-mani-ibganga Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse-doged igar dutusuli, ar ade dogdar maniginbi binsamalad.
Gannar an bemarga soged, moli-yargan-mureged bur-baisursunna iko-ibyagi doged, ar dule-mani-ibeddi bur-beedse Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse doged.
E-sapingan, Jesús wegi-soge itosgu, nue geger-ito nadmalad, ar ade mani-ibgan bur-baisursunnaa abonolegoye bimalad. A-ulale, sogdemarsunnad: —¿Ar doa degite, sunna abonolegosunna?
Jesús na e-sapingan-dakdegu, ega sogde: —Ar dulemargardi geg gue, ar Bab Dummadgardi, bela ibmar guedbiid.
Geb degi Pedro, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —Anmardi belagwapa ibmar obesad, adi anmar beba naegar. Degite anmardi, ¿ibu nikumarmogosunna?
Jesús, abin-sogde: “Napira an bemarga soged, Bab Dummad we-ibmar-bela-ogwaoed-ibagangi, ani Dule-Machi, an-olo-gan-yeer-daklegedgi an sigidapir, bemar-anba-nagusmalad olo-gan gwaambe-gakabogwadgi sigmarmogoed, adi Israel-dorgan-sogambe-gakabogwadga igar-nabosii bemar gumalagar.
“Ar doa-dule anba-naid-ular ibmar-meter, e-negmar, e-gwenadgan, e-bunmar, e-bab, e-nan, e-ome, e-mimmigan, degine, e-nainumar, we-dule ibmar-dulataledba bur-bule abingaoed, degine, burba-geg-berguedi nikubaloed.
“Ar dummagan-bukidar dule-sorbarmaladga guoed, degine, dule-sorbarmalad dummaganga gunonimogoed.”
Jesús sogdebar: “Ar Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid weyobdo: Dule-wargwen, na neg-uya-sediid, wakudar neggi nodgua, dule-ega-arbamalad-aminaddo, adi e-nainugi ega arbamalagar.
Dule-nainu-ibed arbamalad-ebo na igar nabosmargu, arbamaladga sogsado, denario-irgwen ibagwengi an be-bennukoye. Geb agi e-nainuse ega arbaega barmissundo.
“Dad-abar-dummad gusgu, gannar nainu-ibed, nodbardo, dakdapdo, ibmar-ukleged-naba dulemar binsa bukmala, arbaed-suli.
Nainu-ibed amarga sogdedo: ‘Ar bemar an-nainuse arbanamarmo, ar sogedba an bemar-bennukmaloed.’ Amar nade-gusmalad, arbanad-gusmalad.
“Yorukugusgu, nainu-ibed dulemar-amiega gannar nodbar. Dulemar-amisgu, e-nainuse barmis, ega arbamalagar. Wachi-ilapaagi, amba deyob imaksabalid, degine amarga baiganga-sogsadyob sogsabalid.
Wachi-ilatargi, nainu-ibed gannar nodbalid, dulemar-dakdapid, arbasuli bukmala. Amarga sogded: ‘¿Ar ibiga bemar arbasuli emi be osedosmala?’
“Abin-imakdemalad: ‘Ar dule anmarga arbaed-uksurmalad.’ Nainu-ibed amarga sogde: ‘Bemar an-nainuse arbanamarmo, ar sogedba an bemar-bennukmaloed.’
“Neg-mutikudgu, nainu-ibed, ega-neg-dakedga sogded: ‘Arbamaladse be gole, be bennuk ibagwen-arbasad-wilub. Napisolaba-modapmalad-inse be bennuko, geb degi, wakudar arbadmaladse.’
“Napisolaba-arbadmalad nonimargu, bennuklesmalad, denario-irgwen.
Gebe-arbadmalad warmaksagu, binsadmar, emardi bur-melu bennuklegoye. Ar amar bennuklearmargu, amba denario-irgwen bennuklesmarmogad.
“Gebe-arbadmalad bennuklesmargu, nainu-ibedgi uluarmalad,
sogdemalad: ‘Wemar-sorba-nonimalad, unnila wachi-irgwen arbasmalad, anmardi bur-dummad arbasad, dadba dummad gal-itosad, degite, anmar-sunnaa bennuklesmarmogad.’
“Nainu-ibed, amar-wargwen abinsadgu sogde: ‘An-ai, an gwen begi dodossulid. ¿Ar bemarbo igar an nabossursi, denario-irgwen an be-bennukoye?
Degisoggu, ar begadid na be sue, be nae, ar wemar-napisolaba-nonimalad bemar-sunnaa an bennukbiele, an itolegeddo.
¿Ar wede igar-nabirsursi, an-itolegedba an-mani an imakbier? ¿Ar angi be nobsi, an dule-nued-daedba?’
“Degisoggu, dummagan dule-sorbarmaladga guoed, degine, dule-sorbarmalad dummaganga gunonimogoed. Ar ade bukidar dulemarse gollesad, degite unnila ichee wis dulemar sulegaled.”
Jerusalénse nadapmargu, Jesús na e-sapingan-ambe-gakabogwadse bachikii gochad, amarga sogded:
“Emi anmar Jerusalénse nadapid, Ani Dule-Machi, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganga, degi, escribamarga uklegoed. Amar anga igar-itosmalar, sogmaloed, oburgwemarye.
Wemar-Judio-dummagan Judiosurmaladga an-ukmaloed, adi angi dodomalagar, an-bibyomalagar, degi, nakrusgi an-biokmalagar. Ar degi-inigwele, ibapaagi gannar an durguoed.”
Geb degi Zebedeo-machimala-e-nan, Jesússe na e-machimalamala nonimar, yokorgi sindigar abin signonigu, Jesússe ibmar egisnonimalad.
Jesús ega sogde: —¿Ibu be abege? Ome, abin-sogde: —Na be neg-dakmai-gusale, we an-masmala-warbogwad dummaganga be nugsao, gwensak be-argan-nuedsik-siged, baid be-argan-sapiledsik-siged.
Jesús, ome-abin imakdegu, sogde: —Ibmar bemar egisnanaid, bemar wichurmalad ibu be egisnanai. ¿Ar nue dummad-an-wilegoedgi sunna bemar wilemogosi, an nog-goboedyob? Degine, ¿an digi-ogaledgi sunna bemar oglemogosi? Emar, abin-imakdemargu, sogdemar: —Anmar sunnamala.
Jesús abin-sogde: —Ar bemar sunnamarsoggu, napira an bemarga soged, bemar anyob nue-dummad naibi-itomarmogoed. Ar dummaganga-nug-imakeddi, adi ani, an nug-saosulid, unnila Bab Dummad bato na-igar-mesisadba na e-nug saoed dulemar-dummaganga guoe.
Jesús-e-sapingan-e-ambedi itosmalad wemar-warbogwad dummadga gubimalad. Degisoggu, wemar gwenad-warbogwadgi uludmarsunnad.
Geb degi Jesús e-sapinganse gochagu, amarga sogde: “Bemardi nue wismalad, dulemar-we-napneg-dummaganga-gudimaladdi e-sordamarba bur-dule-dummad na san-imak-daed, degisoggu, bela ega ibmar imakbi abe-damarsunnad. Degine, e-sorbarmalad gandikidba dulemar-barmidaed.
“Bemardi mer deyob gumalo, ar be dummadga gubiele, maiyob bela be dulemar-bendaker-gebed.
Ar be dulemar-iduedga gubiele, bela dulemar maiga be guer-gebed.
“Ar ani Dule-Machi, we-napnegse an nonigu, mai-nikuega an nonisulid, maiyob dulemar-bendakega an nonikid, degine, an na-san-burba-ukegar, adi dule-iskudimalad-anar an burgwegar.”
Jesús na e-sapinganmala Jericó-neggweburgi noarmargu, dulemar-bukidar eba armalad.
Deun, dulemar-warbo ibya-surmalad, igar-dikarba-simalad itosmargu, Jesús nadapye, binnasur Jesússe gotemalad, sogdemalad: —¡Dummad, Rey-David-wagwa, anmar-bendake, wile be anmar-dake!
Dulemar ese uluarmalad, adi boo sigmalagar. Ar bur-bule dulemar-ibya-surmalad binnasur Jesússe gotemalad, sogdemalad: —¡Dummad, Rey-David-wagwa, wile be anmar-dake!
Jesús, ibya-surmalad-itosgu, geb gwisgusad. Amarse gochagu, amarga sogde: —¿Ibu bemarga imakbi be an-abesunna?
Dulemar-ibya-surmalad sogdemalad: —Dummad, mag-atake be anmar-imake.
Geb Jesús amar-wile-dakdegu, amar-ibya-ebus, geb degi amar yog ibya nuguar nadmalad. Wemar-warbo ibya nugusad Jesúsba nade-gusmalad.
Jesús na e-sapinganmala Jerusalén modanimargu, Olivos-yar-dikarba, Betfagé-neggwebur-walik-gusgu, Jesús na e-sapingan-warbo-barmisad,
amarga sogsad: —Neggwebur-bipii anmar-asabin-siidse be namar. Agi bemar dakdapoed, moli-uaya-suid atinnar nai, na e-mimmi e-dikarba gudii. A-moli bemar esikoed, geb degine a-molimar be anse sedamaloed.
Ar dule-wargwen bemarga akar sokalile, bemar sogmaloed: ‘Ar Dummad wedi bina-soged, ebusad-sorba bega yog gannar barmidabaloye soged.’
Ar we deyob bela we-ibmar-gusadi, igi Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged sogsa-gusa, adi deyob guegala gunonikid, deun sogsa-gusgu:
Siongi-bukmaladga be soge: “Emi, be-Rey bese danikid, Na gwage eikwaa, moli-uaya-suid-birgi sii, Moli-uaya-suid-e-mimmi-birgi sii, Moli-uaya-suid ibmar-berbeged-e-mimmi-birgi-sii bese danikid.” Zac. 9:9
Jesús-sapingan-warbogwad nadmarsunnad, Jesús ega igi sogsa, deyob imakdapmalad.
Jesús-sapingan moli-uaya-suid, degi, e-mimmi, Jesússe senonimarsunnad. Geb degi a-moli-birgi na e-mormar ogichamargu, a-birgi Jesús sigisad. Jesús moli-birgi sigisgu, Jerusalénse nadsun.
Dulemar-bukidarad, na e-mor igargi Jesús-iduar ogitemalad, abala ogob-gagangiid-e-gagan gwane-gwane imakdemargu, Jesús-iduar igargi ogitemalad.
Ar dulemar-bukidar-idu-nadapmaladi, degi, sorba-danimaladi, binnasur gornadapmalad, sognadapmalad: ¡Bab-Dummad-nug odummomar! ¡We David-Wagwa! ¡We, Bab-Dummad-nuggi-danikid, bela ega ib-nuedga guena-gadin! ¡Nibneggi e-nug odummomarbar! Sal. 118:26
Jesús Jerusaléngi dogdapgu, bela Jerusalénginmalad oimakdemalad, sogdemalad: —¿Wede doasunna?
Dulemar-bukidarad-Jesúsba-danimalad sogdemalad: —We-dule, Jesús, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged, Nazaret-neggweburgined, Galilea-dola.
Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse dogdapgu, bela dulemar-ibmar-baknanaid, degi, ibmar-ukbukmalad sabsur onisad, degi, dulemar-mani-ogwabukmalad-e-mesa binnasur barbikiin meted, degi, dulemar nuu-ukbukmalad-e-gan barbikiin-metebalid.
Jesús amarga sogded: —Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmarkar naid: Bab Dummad soged: ‘An-nega, anse-goled-negye nugguoed.’ Is. 56:7 Ar emigindi bemardi atursamalad-negga imaksamalad.
Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi siidgi, dulemar-ibya-surmalad, degi, dulemar-nue-geg-nanamalad ese nonimalad. Jesús amar bela-nudaksad.
Deginbali, burwigana-bukidar Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi oimakbukwad, sogbukwad: “¡We-David-Wagwa, e-nug odummomar!” Ar dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, escribamar Jesús-ibmar-dakledisulid-imaknai-dakedba, degine, machimala-oimakbukwa-itosmaladba, sae-itodmalad, Jesúsgi uludmalad.
Amar Jesúsga sogdemalad: —¿Be itoge burwigana ibmar sogbukmalad? Jesús, abin-sogde: —Eye, an itoge; ¿Ar bemar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi absodisurmarsi? Burwigangi, degi, amba mimmigan-nunanaidgi, Amar-sunmakedgi be-nug-odummoged be imaksad. Sal. 8:2
Jesús agi nadgu, Judio-dummagan-mete-naded, neggweburgi nade-gusad, Betaniase. Geb agi megidapid.
Oibosgu, Jesús wagdar Jerusalén-neggweburse gannar danigu, ukur itoalid.
Igar-dikarba higuera-sapi-gwichi dakargu, ese nade-gusad. Ese modapgu, san sate dakalid, unnila e-gaganbi nika. A-sapiga Jesús sogdesun: —Be bipisaale bar gwen durbamakosulid. Agi higuera-sapi dinguded.
Jesús-e-sapingan higuera-sapi dingud-gusad daksagu, geger dakdemalad, sogdemalad: —¿Ar wede ibiga gwae-gwae higuera-sapi dingude?
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, ar bemar ibmar-imaknaid nue bensulile, unnila we-sapi-higuerabi deyob bemar imaksasuliled, ar sunna we-yarga be sogsamalaled: ‘Wegi be siid be ainir, demarse be nae,’ ar bemar-sogedba gusaled.
Ar bela be nue-bensuli Bab-Dummadse-goledgi be egisele, ar be-ibmar-egised abingaodo.
Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse nonigu, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan Jesússe warmaknonimalad, ar edi na odurdaksigu, ega sogdemalad: —¿Doa-nuggine-wede be we-ibmar imakdii? ¿Ar doa bega gangued uksasunna?
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —An bemarse ibmar-soggwen egismogodo. Bemar an-abin imaksale, geb an bemarga sogmogoed, we doa gangued anga uksa we-ibmar an imakdiid.
Juan-Bautista, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged imaksad, we, ¿bia daniki? ¿We, Bab Dummad barmiali, igi, we, dulemar barmiali? Anga be sogmalana. Degi, Judio-dummagan muchub-muchub na sogdemalad: “Bab Dummad barmiarye, anmar sogmalale, anmarga sogdagoed: ‘Degite, ¿ibiga bemar Juan-Bautista-bengusmarsunna?’
Dulemar barmiarye anmar sogbalile, anmarse neggwebur urwedagoed. Ar ade bela sogmalad, ‘Juan-Bautista, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged-sunnadye.’ ”
Degisoggu, Judio-dummagan, Jesús-abin sogdemarsun: —Anmar wichurmar, doa Juan-Bautista-barmiali. Degi Jesús, abin-imakdemosun: —An bemarga sogosurmarmodo, wede doa-nuggi we-ibmar an imakdii.
Jesús Judio-dummaganga sogde: “Degite, ¿Be itomalana? Dule-wargwen machimala na warbo nikado. A-dulede e-machi-wargwenga sogdo: ‘Machi, an-nainuse be arbana, uva eminao.’
Machi, e-bab-abin imakdegu, sogded: ‘Yapa an nae.’ Ar sorba, bukib itoargu, na nade-gusdo, arbanaddo.
Bab na machi-baidse nadbardo, ega amba deyob sogdapbardo: ‘An-nainuse be uva eminao.’ E-machi e-bab-abin sogde: ‘Baba, eye, an arbanao.’ Ar degite, we-machi nadsurdo, arbanadsurdo.”
Jesús Judio-dummaganse egisdesun: —¿We-masmala-warbogwad, doa bur e-bab-sogedba ibmar imaksa be insae? Abin-sogdemar: —Machigwa arbaapid. Jesús emarga sogde: —Deyobdo. Ar napira an bemarga soged, dulemar-Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbamalad, degi, omegan-gamba-samalad, amar bur bemarba Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse dogoed.
Ar bemarse Juan-Bautista igar-napiragwadgi sunmaknonimar-inigwele, bemar eba ib-imaksasurmalad, ar Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbamaladdi, degi, omegan-gamba-samaladdi e-sogsad bengussurmalad, ar bemar wemar-daksamarmo-inigwele, degite, be-iskuedga gwen bukib be itossurmalad, gwagegar, adi bemar we-igar abingamogagar.
Jesús Judio-dummaganga sogdebar: “Bemar itomarbalina, igar-burbar-baid maid: Ibagwengi dule-wargwen, na neg-uya sediid, uva na nainugi digsado, ber ebilis e maksado, agi, abargi uva-egured sobsabardo, geb degi galu sobsabardo, adi agi bela nainugi nakulegegar. Nainu-ibed dulemar-arbamaladga na e-nainu urmaksado, adi a-dulemar nainugi uva wealir, e-ibedga wis ukmogoye, na deyob ebo igar mesismardo. Nainu-ibeddi dikasur neggwebur-baidse nadsunnad.
“Uva-weed-ibagan mosgu, nainu-ibed na e-maigan nainugi-arbamaladse barmialid, adi uva na egadid suegar.
“Ar nainugi-arbamaladdi, nainu-ibed-e-maigan ese nonimargu, gwensak sarsosmalad, baiddi oburgwismalad, degi baiddi akwagi maksamalad.
A-sorba nainu-ibed na e-maigan-baigan bur-melu barmiarsunnad, ar amba deyob imaksamarbalid.
“Nainu-ibed napisolaba na e-machi-barmiarsunnad, ar ade binsaded: ‘An-machisoggu, egi-binsaed-nikaa-damaladba gwen oakalogosurmar an insaye.’
“Ar nainugi-arbamalad, nainu-ibed-machi dani dakarmargu, na ega sogdemalad: ‘We-dule-danikidi e-bab burgwisar, nainu bela egadbi guoed. Degisoggu, dagmar, we-machi oburgwemarsun, adi anmar ei-nainu suegar.’
Machigwa-gasmargu, nainu-dikarba metemalad, geb degi oburgwismarsunnad.”
Jesús Judio-dummaganse egisdesun: —Ar nainu-ibed na e-nainuse nonikir, ¿igi nainugi-arbamalad-imaknoni be insae?
Jesús-abin sogdemar: —Ar nainu-ibed nonikogu, bela nainugi-arbamalad-iskanamar-sabsuli-oburgwenonikoed. Na e-nainu, baigan-arbamaladga urmaknonikoed, adi amar na iba-sekalaa e-uva ega ukmalagar.
Ar Jesús na ede akwa-nuedyobsoggu, a-ular Judio-dummaganga sogdesun: —¿Ar bemarde Bab-Dummad-Gardagi absodisurmarsi? Bab-Dummad-Garda soged: Dulemar-neg-sobmalad-akwa-istar-daksamalad, a-akwa, akwa-sunsogedga bur gunonikid. ¿Ar weyob Bab Dummad akwa imaksad, ar anmarde geger dakde? Sal. 118:22-23
Degisoggu, an bemarga sogmar, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid, bemargadid, be-annik sulemaloed, dulemar-baigan-nabir-ibmar-nuegan-imakmaloedga uklegoed.
Ar dule-wargwen we-akwa-nuedgi argwachale, we-dule bibiskoed. Ar we-akwa dulegi argwachardi, adi, we-dule ese ubigwar guoed.
Jesús we-igar-burbar-sunmaklemaladgi sunmaksad, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, Fariseomar mag itosmalad, we emargi sunmaked.
Ar amar, Jesús-gabi-guarmalan-inigwele, geg oakalosgusmalad, ar ade neggwebur-dobmalad. Ar neggweburde we-Jesús Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbegedye nik sogmalad.
Jesús, gannar igar-burbar-maidgi sunmakdebargu, Judio-dummaganga sogdebalid:
“Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid weyobdo: Rey-gwensak na e-machi ome-nikued-ibagi mas-gunned-dummad onodaedyobdo.
Rey na e-maigan-barmisad, dulemar-ibase-nonimaloedse gornaegar, e-machi ome-niku-sokalid e-ibase dagegar. Ar ese-gollesmalad gwen ibase nonisurmalad.
“Geb agi rey e-maigan-baigan-barmisbalid, ega sogsad: ‘Dulemar-ibase-danimaloedga sogo: Emi wegine, guagwar bemarga an mas imaksamar, molimar, degine, ibmar-unimalad-gwallu-ibegan an bemarga oburgwismar, bato bemarga guagwar bukwad, degisoggu mer ikumalo, ibase dagmalo.’
“Ar ese-gollesmalad bai gwen itossurmar, gwensak e-nainuse arbanad, baiddi ibmar-uked-negse ibmar-uknaded.
Ar baiddi, rey-e-maigan-sarsosgu, oburgwismalad.
“Rey wisguargu, ese-gollesmalad deyob e-maigan-imaksamarye, nue sae-itoded, na e-sordamar-barmisad, bela e-maigan-oburgwismalad-ogilosad, geb degi bela a-neggwebur ogumaksasunnad.
“Geb degi rey e-maiganga sogded: Dulemar-ibase-dagega-ese-gollesmalad ega igar-gwen-maisulid ibase dagegar. ‘Ar an-machi-ome-nikued-ibagi mas-gunned bato guagwarsoggu,
bemar namarsun, igargan-mamaidba, ar agi bemar dulemar-dakalir, ese be gormalo, mas-gunned-ibase dagmalagar.’
Rey-maigan igarganba nadmargu, dulemar-abingusmalad bela amarse gochamalad, dulemar-nuegan, degi, dulemar-iskanamarse-bakar. Ome-nikued-ibagi-mas-gulleged bela engussunnad.
“Rey mas-gunned-ibase dognonigu, dulemar-nonimalad-daknonikid. Agi dakalid, dule-wargwen ome-nikued-ibagi-mor-yoleged-e-mor yoisuli.
Rey a-dulega sogded: ‘An-ai, ¿igi wegi be dogsa, ome-nikued-mor-yoisuli?’ Dule gwen abin-imaksasulid.
“Geb degi rey e-maiganga sokarsun: ‘We-dule-e-argan, degi, e-mali edinmar, magaba neg-sichidgi metemar, agi dummad-na-wilesiidbali bosii-guoed, degi, nugar-gorsii-guoed.’
“Ar Bab Dummad bukidar dulemarse gochad, degite unnila ichee wis sulesmalad.”
Jesús sunmaked bergusgu, Fariseomar nadmalad, na igar amiarmalad, igi-saele e-sunmakedgi anmar Jesús-gao-dibeye.
Degisoggu, Jesússe Fariseomar na e-sapingan-barmisad, Herodianomar-abargi. Jesússe nonimargu, ega sogdemalad: —Odurdaked-saila, anmar be-wisdo, be dule-ibmar-napiragwad-soged-duled, igar-napiragwadba Bab-Dummad-igar be odurdaked, degine, baisur be itoged igi dulemar begi binsae, ar ade begardi emarbi dulemar be daked.
Degisoggu, anmarga be sogena, emide, ¿we igar-nuedi, Roma-Dummad César-nugad anmargi-mani-gaed bennuked? ¿Anmar bennukoe, igi, anmar bennukosuli? ¿Igi be sogmosunna?
Ar Jesúsdi wemar-egi-istar-binsananaid mag daksoggu, amarga sogded: —¡Bemar wagar-darbo-damalad! ¿Ar ibiga bemar yamo an-wilubdakdanimala?
Mani Roma-dummadga-ukleged anga be oyogena. Jesúsga denario-gwagwen oyoarmalad.
Geb degi Jesús amarga sogde: —¿Ar wede we-manigi doa-wagar-wilub sisunna, degine, doa-nug narmakar naibarsunna?
Jesús-abin sogdemalad: —Roma-Dummad-César, a-wagar-wilub, degi, a-nug narmakarbalid. Geb degi Jesús sogdesun: —Ar ibmar Césargadir, Césarba be ibsamardo. Ar ibmar Bab Dummadgadirdi, Bab Dummadba be ibsamardo.
Dulemar-Jesússe-ibmar-egisnonimalad weyob Jesús ega soge itosmargu, geger abin-itodmalad. Geb degi emardi Jesúsgi bangudmarsunnad.
Amba a-ibagi Saduceomar Jesússe nonimalad. Amarde sogmalad, dule burgwisale, gannar geg bar durguye. Agala Saduceomar Jesússe we-igar egichiarmalad,
ega sogdemalad: —Odurdaked-saila, Moisés sogsa-gusdo: Ia mimmi-nikussuli ome-idu burgwisale, E-urba a-ome-nikuoye, Adi e-iaga anagan-urbegar. Dt. 25:5
Anmar-abargi machimala e-gwenadgan-walagugle-na-gumaladi weyob gusdo. Ia-dummad ome-nikusgu, anagan-urbissuli burgwisdo. A-sorbalid a-ome-nikunonimogu,
amba e-iayob mimmi-nikussuli burgwismodo. Geb degi a-sorbalid amba a-ome-nikunonimogad. Deyob bela e-walagugled a-ome-nikusmaladbiid, anagan-gwen-obessuli bela burgwismalad.
Geb a-sorba ome burgwismosunnad.
“Ar dule-gannar-durguoed-iba nonikile, a-omede, ¿wede doa-omega guosunna, ar bela na e-gugle nikusmaladbiid?”
Geb Jesús, Saduceomar-abin imakdegu, sogded: “Bab-Dummad-Garda-narmakar-maid wichulidba, degi, Bab-Dummad-gangued wichulidba, bemar noar sogmalad.
Ar ade dulemar gannar-durgued-ibagi ome-bar-nikuosurmalad, degine, gannar ome sui-nikunai bar guosurmogad, ar ade dulemar Bab-Dummad-angermar-nibnegginmaladyob gumaloed.”
Jesús Saduceomarga sogde: “Dule-burgwismalad-gannar-durgued-igarde, ¿ar bemarde Bab-Dummad-sogsad absodisurmarsi? Bab Dummad sogsa-gusad:
Ani an Abraham, Isaac, degi, Jacob, amar e-Bab-Dummad. Ex. 3:6 Degisoggu, Bab Dummad, dulemar-burgwarmalad-e-Bab-Dummadsulid. Bab Dummad, dulemar-dula-gudidimalad-e-Bab-Dummadid. Ar Abraham, Isaac, degi, Jacob, amar burgwismar-inigwele, Bab Dummadgardi amba dula gudidimalad. Degisoggu, bemar nue noar sogmardo.”
Ar dulemar Jesús weyob soge itosmargu, geger itodmalad, we-Jesús weyob dulemar-odurdakdiid.
Degi, Fariseomar wisguarmargu Jesús nue Saduceomar-abin imaksaye, Fariseomar na igar-amiarmarsunnad, Jesús-oburgwemalagar.
Fariseo-wargwen, Moisés-igar-nue-wisidi, Jesússe egichialid, yamo wilubdakegar:
—Odurdaked-saila, Bab-Dummad-igar-maidgi, ¿igid bur-igar-biriginedi?
Jesús, abin-sogde: “Dummad, Be-Bab-Dummad, bela be-gwagegi be sabguoed, bela be-san-burbagi, degi, bela be-binsaedgi. Dt. 6:5
Ar dule Bab-Dummad-sabgued, we-igar gebeddo, degi, bur igar-dummadbardo.
Agi, igar-sogbogi, amba deyobsaarbardo: Ar na be-san na be sabguedyobi, dule-baid be sabgumogoed. Lv. 19:18
Ar wemar-igar-warbogwadgi, bela igar-baigan-mamaid, degi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad-sunmaksamalad, ase bergusiid.”
Fariseomar-danar-bukwadse Jesús ese egichialid,
ega sogded: —¿Cristogi bemar igi binsamarsunna? ¿Wede Cristo doa-wagwa-sunna? Abin-sogdemar: —Rey-David-wagwa.
Jesús amarga sogdesun: —¿Ar degite, ibiga Bab Dummad Burba Nuedba David Cristoga sogsunna, ‘An-Dummadye,’ deun soggu?
Bab Dummad an-Dummadga soged: ‘An-argan-nuedsik be sige, be dule-dummadga guegar, bela be-istarmaladgi-nakwedse an be-imakedsegad.’ Sal. 110:1
Ar David Cristoga soged, ‘Be an-Dummadye.’ Degite, ¿Cristo igi e-wagwaga gubarsunnoe?
Ar dule-wargwensaar Jesús-gwen-abin imaksasurmalad, degine, bipisaar dule ese ibmar gwen a-ibagi bar egisbi itossurmalad.
Geb degi Jesús dulemar-bukidaradga, degi, e-sapinganga sunmakde, sogded:
“Fariseomar, degi, escribamar Moisés-igar-mamaid nue-wisi gandikidba odurdakmalad.
Ar degisoggu, Fariseomar bela bemarga Moisés-igar-maid-sogmaladba be damar, degi, eba be imakmarbar. Ar Fariseomar-damaladbardi mer be damalo, ar ade unni nabir sogmalad, imakeddi eba geg imakmalad.
Ar wemar-Fariseomar dulemarga beedse-dutusur igar-mesmalad. Ar degite emar dulemar-gwen-bendaksurmalad igar-mesisadba dulemar nanamalagar.
“Ar Fariseomardi bela ibmar-imakmalad yamo dulemar e-dakmalagar. Degine, amardi bebegi, degine, sakwagi Bab-Dummad-Garda-saboged-sagu nasik-damalad, degine, e-mor-duku-durbamakarmalad osuosmalad, adi dulemar egi binsamalagar, emarde dule-nueganye.
“We-Fariseomar ibagi mas gullealir, dummagan-gan-sigedginbi sigbi-damalad, degine, Judiomar-onmaked-neggi dummagan-gan-sigedginbi sigbi-damarbalid,
We-Fariseomar yeer itodamalad ibmar-ukleged-neggi dulemar bela ese goledbimalar, degine, yeer itodamalad, dulemar ese goled, odurdaked-sailaye.
“Ar bemardi bese gorbisur be abemalad, odurdaked-sailaye, ar bemargardi unnila wargwennagwad bemar-odurdaked, Cristo, degine, bela bemar na-gwenadgan gumalad.
We-napneggi mer dulemar-baiganga an-babye be sogo. Ar unnila wargwennaa be bab-nikmalad, be-Bab-nibneggi-maid.
Mer odurdaked-sailaye, na be bimalo, ar unnila be-odurdaked-saila wargwennaa gued, Cristo.
“Ar bemar-abargi bur-dummadidi, a bela-bemar-maiga guoed.
Ar ade dule-wargwen na nug dummarba na saele, a-dule-nug bur-bipii guoed. Ar dule na nug bipii na saerdi, adi a-dule-nug bur odummolegoed.
“¡Ar bemardi, escribamar, Fariseomar na be dule-wilesmar, wagar-darbo be damalad! Ar bemar Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse dulemar-dogbimalad-idu yawagak be edidimalad, ar bemar ase dogsurmalad, degine, dulemar-ase-dogbimalad gwen dogega be imaksurmalad.
“¡Bemar escribamar, Fariseomar, na be dule-wilesmar, wagar-darbo be damalad! Ar bemar yamo yardakar ammamar-ei-sui-burgwismalad-ibe neg atursa-damalad, degine, dulemar yeer bemar-dakegala yamo suitii Bab Dummadse bemar gorgwis-damalad. A-ular bemar bur-bule sabsur odurdaklemaloed, deyob bemar damaladba.
“¡Bemar escribamar, Fariseomar na be dule-wilesmar, wagar-darbo be damalad! Ar bemar demar, degi, yar bela be ebirdimalad, dule-wargwen-e-gwage ogwaegar, bemarba naguegar. Bemarba nagusale, aka be ilabo bur-bule soo-sailagi-odurdaklegoedga be imakdimalad.
“¡Ar bemar dule-wilesmar, bemar dulemar-idumalad-ibya-sulidmalad! Emi bemar soged: ‘Ar dule-wargwen sogsa-dibe Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-nuggi napira an bega sogye, an ibmar saoye. Gwen akarsulid, degi-sogsadba ibmar-imaksulir. Ar dule Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi-or-siid-nuggi, adi degi-sogsardi, degi-sogsadba saer-gebed.’
“¡Bemar binsaed-gwen-niksurmalad, ibya-sulidyob be damalad! Ar igid bur-sunsogedsunna, ¿or bur-sunsogedi, igi, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg bur-sunsogedi. Ar Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg or swilidikidga imaksursi?
“Ar bemar sogmarbalid: ‘Dule-wargwen sogsa-dibe: Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-gummakar-ukleged-galu-nuggi napira an bega sogye, an ibmar imakoye. Degi sogsadba imaksasulir, gwen akarsulid. Ar dule Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-ukleged-nuggi degi-sogsardi, adi na degi-sogsadba eba saer-gebye.’
“¡Bemar binsaed-gwen-niksurmalad, ibya-sulidyob be damalad! Ar ade igid bur-sunsogedsunna, ¿Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-gummakar-ukleged-galu, igi, we-ibmar a-birgi mesleged? ¿Ar Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-gummakar-ukleged-galu ibmar swilidik imaksursi?
Ar ade dule Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-ukleged-galu-nuggi sogsale, napira an bega sogye, an ibmar imakoye, a-dule bato Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-gummakar-ukleged-galu-nuggine degi-sogsadi ¿bela agi ibmar-ambikued eba galesmosursi? Bela eba galesmoga.
“Ar ade dule Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-nuggi sogsale, napira an bega sogye, an ibmar imakoye, ar a-nuggi, degi, Bab-Dummad-a-neg-yaba-maid-nuggi bato sogsabalid, napira an bega sogye, an ibmar imakoye.
Ar dule nibneg-naid-nuggi sogsale, napira an bega sogye an ibmar imakoye, bato Bab-Dummad-e-olo-gana-siged-nuggi sogsado, degine, Bab-Dummad-a-ganagi-siged-nuggi sogsabardo.
“¡Ar bemar escribamar, Fariseomar, na be dule-wilesmar, wagar-darbo be damalad! Ar bemar ibmar-burwiganase-bakar menta, eneldo, degi, comino ambegi-gwensak Bab Dummadga be ukdimalad, ar degite bur-ibmar-sunsoged, Moisés-igar-maidgi igar-maid: Dulega igar-nudaked, dulemar wile-daked, degi, nue-inikii nanaed, amardi gwen be imakdisurmalad. Ar wemar bemar imaked nabirid, degine, amba ibmar-burwigana-bemar-imakdiid imakbalodo.
“¡Bemar ibya-sulidyob emar-idudimalad. Bemar ibmar-burwiganagi alamaknanaimalad. Ibmar-dummagandi bemar gwen imaksurmalad, gwi gobedgi nair sumaladyob, degite, moli-yargan-mureged gobedgi nairdi domaladyob be damalad!
“¡Bemar escribamar, Fariseomar, na be dule-wilesmar, wagar-darbo-damalad! Ar bemar askinbi-na-dule-nued-imakmalad-dulemalad, noga, degi, bate unnila askinedbi nue bemar enukmaladyobid. Ar yabardi ibmar-atursamalad, degi, igar-inikigwad-gwen-imaksurmalad, ibmar-iskana ena be sedidimalad.
¡Fariseo ibya-sulid! Bemar na ulubgi nue nudaked bur nabirid, geb askine be nued gudmogoed, igi nog-yabalid, degi, bate-yabalid, a-inse dulemar nue enukmaladyob, adi magabalid bato nue enukar guddamogadyob.
“¡Bemar escribamar, Fariseomar, na be dule-wilesmar, wagar-darbo-damalad! Ar bemar neg-uan-aski sipuu magaleyob, ibiyobi aski yeer-daklege, ar yabardi garbi ena, degi, ibmar-iskanabi ena bukwad.
Ar bemar amba deyobmarmodo, askindi ar nue be baiganse oyomardo bemar igar-maidba-inikii-ibmar-imakmalad-dulemarye, ar bemar ulubgindi wagar-darbo be damardo, ulubgi galagwensulid bukidar be sedimardo.
“¡Bemar escribamar, Fariseomar, na be dule-wilesmar, wagar-darbo-damalad! Ar bemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbesmaladga neg-uan be sobmalad, degi, inikii-ibmar-imakdii-dule-nanasmaladga be yeer-dakle e-neg-uan-wilubgan imakmalad,
bemar sogmalad: ‘Anmar-dadgan-ibagi anmar gudigusana, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad-oburgwenana-gusmargua, anmardi eba gwen akassurmalanye.’
Ar bemar na-dukin na be san oyomardo, bemar we-dulemar-Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad-oburgwismalad-e-wagan gumarye.
Degisoggu, be-dadgan ibmar-iskana-imaksamalad amba napidi, obelogegala, bemar deyob imakmarmosunnad.
“¡Naibe-bulegan, ayob bemar iskana gumalad! ¿Ar igi bemar soo-sailagi-odurdaklemaloedgi wakinno na be itomala? Bemar wakinnosurmala.
Degisoggu, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad, degi, binsaed-ibegan, degi, escribamar an bemarga barmimarsunnad. Gwen-gwen bemar amar-oburgwemaloed, nakrusgi biokmaloed, baigandi bemar sabsur Judiomar-onmaked-neggi bibyomaloed, amar-baregindii neggwebur-baid-baidse be gumaloed.
“Deyob bemar imakoed, adi bemargi ataklemalagar, bela we-napneggi dulemar-ibmar-oakalossurmalad binsa be-dadgan oburgwis-gusmalad, Abel-dule-nued-akar, Zacarías, Berequías-e-machise. Deun be-dadgan, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-sunnad-siid, degi, Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-gummakar-ukleged-galu-siid-abargi, Zacarías-oburgwisgusmargu.
Napira an bemarga soged, we dule-nuegan-oburgwilesmalad emi bemar-dula-gudidimaladgi ataklemaloed.”
“¡Jerusalén-dor, Jerusalén-dor, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad be oburgwedimalad, bemarse-barmilearmalad bemar akwagi be makdimalad! ¡Ilabigwa bela be-mimmigan danar an na urbebi-gusana, ar igi gannir na e-sakan-urba na e-mimmigan-urbe-daedyob, bemar yapagusmalad!
Degisoggu, be-neg, nega-dule-sulidganyob gunonisunnoed, bei melledoed.
Ar an bemarga sogsun, emigindi bar be an-dakosurmalad, ar geb bemar sogedse: We, Bab-Dummad-nuggi danikid, bela ega ib-nuedga guena-gadin.” Sal. 118:26
Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi Jesús nodgua, agi bangudgu, e-sapingan ese walikgunonikid, ega oyoarmalad, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg yeer-dakle siid.
Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: —Ar we-neg yeer-daklegendo, degite napira an bemarga soged, bela we-neg-bemar-dakedi, bipisaale akwa-gwagwensaar-birgi na askin-askin bar sigosulid, bela egwallegoedbiid.
Jesús Olivos-yarse naded, agi sii, e-sapingan bachikii ese nonimalad, ese egisnonimalad: —¿Sana degite Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg ayarosunna? Be-danikid-iduar, ¿ibi-wilubgan oyoledagosunna? Neg-dukumosar, ¿igi neg gudagosunna? Anmarga be soge.
Jesús na e-sapingan-abin imakdegu, sogded: “Nue salakarmar, mer dulemar be-yardaked be-imakmalo.
Ar bukidar yamo anyob imaknonimaloed, sognonimaloed: ‘Ani an Cristo, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule.’ A-dule dulemar-bukidar-yardakoed, eba bukidar nagudmaloed.
“Bila-onogedgibi naguar bemar itoar-dibe, degine, bila-onoged daniye, aginbi sunmakarmar bemar itoarbar-dibe, nue salakarmar, mer surbinsa be itomalo, ar wegid-igargan degi-guedsegad. Degi-inigwele, negdi amba yo dukumoed.
Dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmalad na bila ononanai-gudamaloed, degi, reymar na muchub-muchub egi yolenanai na gudamarbaloed. Yar-baid-baidgi uelemalad-bukidar ainioed, ukud-dummad nagubaloed, degine, negabandur-dummagan nagumai-gudabaloed,
Degi-inigwele, bela we-ibagan-bulegan unnila igi dutu achunnalile e-bonigan nunmaked-itoar daeyobdo. Ar a-sorbardi bur-bule ibagan-bulegan nonikoed.
“Neg deyob gunonikile, bemar-sabsur-odurdaklegega dulemar dummaganse be-ukmaloed, amar be-oburgwemaloed. Ar bemar an-sapingansoggu, a-ular bela-dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmalad istar be-dakmaloed.
A-ibagangine bukidar anba-naigusmalad angi bangudmaloed, na muchub-muchub uknanai-gumaloed, degine, na muchub-muchub na istar dake-gumaloed.
“Degine, yamo, bukidar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemaladyobi na san imaknonimaloed, amar bukidar-dulemar-yardakmaloed, adi eba nagumalagar.
Ar ibmar-iskana-yaisulidba, bukidar-anba-nagusmalad bar an-sabguosurmalad.
Ar ibagan-bulegan-berguedse, dule gwen galakussuliddina, adi nue abonolegodo.
“We-Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid-gaya-burba-nued bela we-napneg-naidgi sunmaklegweler-gebed, adi bela dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmalad Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid-gaya-burba-nued wisguegar, geb agi we-napneg bergunonisunnoed.”
Jesús sogdebar: “Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged-Daniel, wegi-narmaksa, sogsado: Bab Dummad ibmar-istar-dakedi, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-islidikidse dognonikogu, Neg-nued neg-iskanaga imakoed, Ar ade a-negse dogedsulinad. Dn. 9:27; 11:31 Ani Jesús, an bemarga sogdo: Bemar deyob neg dakalile, we-Daniel Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged-sogsa-gusadba gunaido. Emi be nabir-garda-absodimalad mag ittos namaloed.
Degisoggu, a-ibagi, Judeagi be gudiile, yalaganba be wakinsun.
Ar agi dule-wargwen neg-uas-birgi siile, aidealir, mer neg-yaba ibmar-oniega doged-sao, bur yog wakinnar imako.
Ar dule-wargwen sapurba gudiile, mer gannar negse bar daged sao, mor sudagegar, bur yog wakinnar imaked, nabirid.
“¡Ar ammamar-gurgin-nika-gudidimalad, degi, mimmigan-gwaruu-onunanaimaladdi a-ibagangi be nue wilemaloed, ar ade geg be abarmak-gumaloed!
Bab Dummadse be gormarsun, we-ibagan-bulegan mer di-wied-ibagi guega, degi, obunnoged-ibaginsurbar.
Ar a-ibagangi ibagan-buled, naibi-itoleged naiguoed. A-ibagan naibi-itolegedyobid Bab-Dummad-neg-obinnisad-akar gwen itoledisulid, degi, a-sorba ayobid bar itolegosurbalid.
“Ar Bab Dummad a-ibagan-wileged giar imaksasulina, dulemar a-ibagangi gwen wakinosurmalanad, bela burgwemaloenad. Emigindi Bab Dummad na e-sordamar bato nugsaar-ese-gollesmalad-sabedba a-ibagan giar nasiksad.
“Degisoggu, dule-wargwen bemarga sokar-dibe: ‘¡Be dakena, wegi gudii, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule!’ Degi, bemarga sokarbar-dibe: ‘¡Be dakena, weba Cristo gudibar!’ Degi-dule-bega-sogedba mer be ibsamalo.
Ar ade yamo binsa Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-duleyob, degi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbegedyob-na-imakmalad nonimaloed. Amar galagwensuli ibmar-wilubgan-dummagan imakdamaloed, degi, ibmar-dakledisurmalad imakdamarbaloed, adi dulemar-yardakegar. Amba Bab-Dummad-sunnad-na-nug-imasmaladse-bakar sunna ese yardaklegena, ese yardaklesmarmogaled.
Degisoggu, nue salakarmar, ar iduakwaa bato an bemarga sogsamalad, mer yardaklemalo.
“Ar degisoggu, bemarga sokarmar-dibe: ‘Cristo nega-dule-sulidganba gudiiye.’ Mer ase be namalo. Ar igi bemarga sokarmarbar-dibe: ‘Cristo neg-yaba duku-maiye.’ Mer be itomalo.
“Ar igi mar-ibyed ukiar dada-nakwedsik gaar-dae, degi yog neg-mee dad-argwanedsik neg imake, debayobi, ani Dule-Machi, an nonimogoed.
Ar bia san-burgwaled mai, agi mulamar danar ambikunoni-damalad. Debayobi dulemar mag dakmogoed, an gannar we-napnegse danikir.”
Jesús sogdebar: Ibagan-naibi-itoleged-sorba dad-ibeler bar gaosulid, nii bar gaosurmogad. Niskwamardi nibneggi-nanaid babatidagoed. Nibneggi ibmar-dummagan gala-nika-nanaid bela giglimakoed. Is. 13:10; 34:4
“Geb degine, mogir-imbaba ani Dule-Machi danikoed-wilubgan dakledagoed. Geb degi we-napneggi bela dulemar-baid-baid-danar-danar-bukmalad bukib binsadamaloed, degi, ani Dule-Machi, mogir-imbaba an-ganguedba, degi, an bela-bela-yeer-daklegedba dani bela an-dakdamaloed.
An-angermar gala-binnasur-goled-abargi an barmidoed, an-sordamar-bato-nugsalesmalad napneg-ugakase, degi, bela nibneg-ugakase anga wenaegar. Geb degi bela danar ambikunonimaloed.
“Sapi-higuera e-wilubgangi be durdakmar. Ar e-anagan dudumaksale, degi, e-gagan aramaksale, bemar nue wisid, yor omodanikid.
Amba deyobmodo, we-ibmarmar-an-bemarga-sogsamaladi bela deyob guar bemar dakalir, bemar wisdo, ani Dule-Machi, an-danikid nue omosad.
“Napira an bemarga soged, we-dulemar-burgwed-idu we-ibmargan bela guedsegad.
Nibnegdi, degi, napnegdi bela berguoed, an-gaya-burbadi gege bergued, adi degi-sadeguoed.
“Ar an-danikoed-ibadi, degi, a-wachidi dule gwen wichulid, angermar-nibnegginmaladse-bakar gwen wichurmalad, unnila an-Bab-Dummadbi wisid sana an danikoed.
“Ar igi Noé maigu-gusa, deyob ani Dule-Machi, gannar-danikoed-ibagangi gumogoed.
Deun dii-mured-iduar mas gunbukwa, gobbukwa, ome-nikubukwa, degi, na e-sisgwaga sui-ukbukwa-gusmalad, Noé geb ur-dummad-na-sobsad-yaba dogsadse.
A-dulemar mag gwen itossurmalad. Dii-muludgu, bela a-dulemar burgwismalad. A-Dule-Machi-danikoed-ibagangi, amba deyob gumogoed, dulemar an-edarbebukwasuli ukiar an nonikoed.
“A-ibagangi warbo sapurba na gudimalad, wargwen nibnegse seledoed, baiddi obelegoed.
Omegan-warbo na ibmar-gwag nagnanaid, wargwen nibnegse seledoed, baiddi obelegoed.
“Degisoggu, nue salakarmar, nue atakmar, ar ade bemar wichulid sana be-Dummad danikoe.
Ar wedi bemar nue wismalad, ar dule-neg-ibed wisina igi-wachigi dule-ibmar-atursaed danikoe, e-neg-ibed edarbisaled, dule ei ibmar-atursaega imaksasuliled.
Ar degisoggu, bemar guagwar gudii-samar, ar ade ani Dule-Machi, danikoed bemar wichulid, wede sana an danikoe.”
Jesús egisdesun: “¿Ar doa degite mai-nued, nue-binsaed-nikaa, geg galakuedga guosunna? Mai-deyobidi, na e-dummad na e-neg-dakega nug saodo, adi wachi-sekalaa mai-baiganga mas dakegar.
Ar we-maigi nued binsalegodo, adi e-dummad gannar nonikir, daknonikir, ar nue deyob arbanai.”
Geb degi Jesús sogde: “Napira an bemarga soged, mai-e-dummad bela na e-ibmar-nikadi we-maiga ukoed, bela ega ibmar-dakegar.”
Jesús sogdebar: “Ar mai-iskanardi, na e-gwagegi sokar-dibe: ‘An-dummad amba yoggudoed.’
A-ular mai-baigan-sarsoalir, degi, dulemar-mungumaladba akaalir, eba mas gunnalir, eba gobbalir.
Ar na e-dummad a-ibagi, a-wachigi danikoed-edarbedisulidgi nonikogu,
daknonikoed, mai deyob gudii. Degisoggu, dummad sabsur mai-odurdaknonikodo, a-e-mai dulemar-wagar-darbo-damaladba eskaryagi metodo, agi bosii, degi, dummad-odurdaklesiidba nugar gorsii-gusunnoed. Debayobi, ani Dule-Machi, an-maigan an imakmogoed.”
Degi Jesús sunmakdebar, sogdebar: “Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid weyobdo, igi yagana-ambe-guedi na gwallu susmala, ome-nikunaid-ibase naegar, suiga-guoed-abindaknaegar.
E-atale dakleargu, nue-binsaed-nikaa damardo, degi, e-atarbali gwen binsaed nikmarsurdo.
E-ataled-binsaed-surmaladi, gwallu na sesmargua, gwen e-gwallu-dii-baid butegi enossurmalad.
Ar e-atar-binsaed-nikaa-damaladi gwalluba mesa na gwallu-dii bute-baidgi sesmalad.
Ar suiga-guoed yoggudsoggu, bela gabed itoarmargu, gabidmalad.
“Nega-gabigwengi binnasur dule gole itoarmalad: ‘¡Suiga-guoed dani, abin daknamar!’
“Geb degi bela yagana gwisguarmarsun, na e-gwallu nudakarmar gatik nued gaegar.
Ar e-atar-binsaed-suli-damaladi, e-atar-binsaed-nikaa-damaladga sogdemalad: ‘Bemar gwallu-dii anmarga wis udamar, ar ade anmar-gwallu akinmaid.’
“Yagan-binsaed-nikaa-damalad sogdemalad: ‘Ar mer anmarga gwallu-dii akuegala, degi, bemarga mer akumogagala, bemar dulemar-gwallu-dii-ukmaladse bur be baknamar.’
“Ar yagan-binsaed-suli-damalad gwallu-dii geb baknadmargu, a-sorba suiga-guoedi nonikid, yagan-binsaed-nikaa-damalad guakwaa bukmarsoggu, eba mas-gunnega dogdemalad, a-sorba yawagak atidsunnad.
“Geb yagan-ataledi-gwallu-dii-bakdimalad nonimarmogad, suiga-guoedga sognonimalad: ‘¡Dummad, anmarga be yawagak egamar!’
“Ar dummad abin-imakdegu, sogded: ‘Napira an bemarga soged, aku an be-dakmalad.’ ”
Degi Jesús sogdebar: “Degisoggu, nue nakulemar, ar be wichurmalad ibi-ibagi, igi-wachigi Dule-Machi danikoed.”
Jesús sogdebar: “Ar ade Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid weyobdo, igi dule-wargwen dikasur na e-neggi nasokargu, e-maiganse gocha, amarga na e-ibmar uksa-nade, ega dakegar.
Emarga-uksadi na e-mani-onoged-sik gurgin-nikadbar. Wargwenga mani-talento-atar ega uksad, baidga mani-talento-bogwa uksad, degi, baidga talento-gwensak uksamogad. Mani-ibeddi dikasur nadsunnad.
“Ar dule-talento-atar-abingasadi nadgu, na egi mani onoded, egi atar onosbalid.
Ar dule-talento-bogwa-abingasadi amba deyob imaksamogad, gwabo egi onosbalid.
Ar dule-talento-gwagwen-abingasaddi nadgu, napagi digdapid, e-dummad-mani napa-yaba odukusad.
“Ar degi-undaradgine, we-maigan-e-dummad nonikid, e-maigan-ebo mani-igar naboalid.
Dule-talento-atar-abingasadi nonigu, talento-atar senonibalid, ega sognonikid: ‘Dummad, talento-atar be anga uksad, an talento-atar egi onosbalid, talento-ambe an bega sedanisunnad, be sue.’
“E-dummad ega sogded: ‘Nued, be mai-nued, mai-gwen-akussulid. Ar ibmar-ichesaaledgi gwen akussuli be arbasad, ibmar-ichesur an bega uksunnoed. Degisoggu, an-werguedba be wergumosun.’
“Ar dule-talento-bogwa-abingasad nonimogu, sognoni: ‘Dummad, talento-bogwa be anga uksad, talento-gwabo an egi onosbar, talento-bake an bega sedanisun, be sue.’
“E-dummad ega sogde: ‘Nued, be mai-nued, mai-gwen-akussulid. Ar ibmar-ichesaaledgi gwen akussuli be arbassoggu, ibmar-ichesur an bega uksunnoed. Degisoggu, an-werguedba be wergumosun.’
“Ar dule-talento-gwagwen-abingasad nonimogu, sognonikid: ‘Dummad, an be-wisdo, be dule-buledid, be ibmar-weed ibmar-digsasulidgi, degine, be-arbassulidgi ibmar be weed.
Degisoggu, an be-dobgusad. An nadgu, be-talento napa-yaba an odukusad. Ar begadid an bega uksun.’
“E-dummad, abin-sogdegu, ega sogded: ‘Be mai-iskana, mai-wiegala, be wisinad, an-ibmar-digsasulidgi an ibmar-weed, degine, an arbasulidgi ibmar an webalid.
Ar degisoggu, mani-onogosur be itogu, mani-urbemalad-negse be an-mani uknaenad, adi an nonikogu, an-mani onolesad, degi, e-burba an na sunonikoenad.’
“Dule-mani-ibed e-mai-baiganga sogded: ‘Degisoggu, talento-e-annik be sumarsun, dule-talento-ambe-nikadga be ukmarsun.
Ar dule-ibmar-nikadi, ega bur uklegoed, adi bur-bule ibmar-nikuegar. Ar dule-ibmar-satedi annik ei sulegoed, amba wis nikad ei bur sulegoed.
Ar mai-wichur-arbaedi, magaba neg-sichidse metna, agi bosii-guoed, degi, dummad-wilesiidba nugar gorsii-guoed.’ ”
Jesús sogded: “Ani Dule-Machi, na an-ganguedgi-danikoed-ibagi, bela an-angermar-gwage-swilidikmalad-abargi, geb degi an ologangi an-yeer-daklegedgi signonikoed, dulemarga igar-itogegar.
Geb degi bela dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmalad an-asabin ambikunonimaloed. Agi geb bachik-bachik an oambikuoed, igi sibad-wawaad-edarbed sibad-wawaad, degi, sibad-absar-sulid-ebo akar urbe, deyob an dulemar-imakmogoed.
An-argan-nuedsiki sibad-wawaad an urboed, degi, an-argan-sapiledsikdi sibad-absar-sulidi an urboed.
“Geb degi an-reyga-maidba an-argan-nuedsik-bukmaladga an sogdagoed: ‘Bemar dagmar, an-Bab-Dummadga be nuedmalad, bemar an-Bab-neg-dakmaid ibgudamar, ar we-napneg nagudgu, bato bemarga nugsales nagusad.
Ar an ukur itosgu, masgi be an-oguchamalad, an uku-uku itosgu, be an-ogobsamalad, an-neggwebur-sulidgi an gudigusgu, be an-akwismalad.
An mor-sate gudigusgu, mor be anga uksamalad, an uelesgu, be anse atakapmalad an-bendakegar, an eskaryagi mellesigusgu, be anse arbimalad.’
“Geb degi dulemar-igar-napiragwadba-damalad an-abin imakdemaloed, sogdamaloed: ‘Dummad, ¿sana ukudmada an be-daksamala, an deun masgi an be-oguchamala, uku-uku be itodigu, sana an be-ogobsamala?
¿Sana be-neggwebur-sulidgi be gudigu, anmar be-susmala? ¿Sana mor-sate an be-daksamargu, mor an bega yosmala?
¿Sana deun be uelemaigu, an bese atakapmala be-bendakegar? ¿Sana be eskaryagi mellesigu, an bese atakapmala?’
“Ani an-Rey, an abin-imakdoed: ‘Napira an bemarga soged, ar an-gwenadgan-dummagansulidse-bakar deyob bemar bendaksasoggu, be deyob an-bendaksamaladyobsundo.’
“Geb degi dulemar an-argan-sapiledsik-bukmaladga an sogdagoed: ‘Angi be bangumar, bemar bato ukabsalesmalad, soo-saila-geg-berguedse be namar, nia-sailaga, degi, e-angermarga a-neg bato guagwar sigisadse.
Ar ade ukumada an gudigusgu, gwen masgi be an-oguchasurmalad, uku-uku an itosgu, gwen be an ogobsasurmalad.
An-neggwebur-sulidgi an gudigusgu, gwen be an-akwissurmalad, mor-sate an gudigusgu, gwen be anga mor yossurmalad, an uelemaigusgu, gwen be an-bendakapsurmalad, degi, eskaryagi an mellesii-gusgu, gwen be anse atakapsurmalad.’
“Geb degi amar an-abin imakdemarmogoed: ‘Dummad, ¿sana ukur be gudii, uku-uku be itodii, be neggwebur-sulidgi be gudii, mor-sate be gudii, be ueledii, eskaryagi be mellesii an be-daksamala, deun anmar be-bendaksasuli?’
“Geb degi wemar-abin an imakoed, an sogoed: ‘Napira an bemarga soged, ar an-gwenadgan-dummagansurmaladga deyob bemar imaksasurmarsoggu, anga bemar imaksasurmarmosundo.’
“Degisoggu, wemar-iskanamar, odurdakleged-neg-sadeguoedse barmiledmaloed. Dulemar-nuegandi, burba-geg-bergued-negse namaloed.”
Jesús bela-wegi-ibmar-sogsad-sorba, e-sapinganga sokalid:
—Bemar wismalad, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba ibabose nagudoed. Agine, ani Dule-Machi, uklegoed, adi nakrusgi biokmalagar.
Degine, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, escribamar, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan-neggwebur-sedimalad, bela amar danar dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad, Caifás-nugad, a-neg-imbase ambikunonimalad.
Agi igar-itosmalad, adi yamo-yardakar Jesús-gaegar, geb degi oburgwemalagar.
Judio-dummagan na ga sogdemalad: —Mer ibagi anmar Jesús-gamalo. Degiir, dulemar Jesúsbina urwedamaloed.
Jesús Betania-neggweburgi, Simón-naibe-buna-ya-maleged-nika-gudigusad-neggi sii,
deun Jesús mesa-naba mas gunsigu, ome-wargwen ese nonikid, gwallu-wawaad-nuedi, bute-alabastro-akwagi-sobaledgi siid, Jesús-nonogi eononikid. A-gwallu-wawaad gargerba-bakleged.
Jesús-sapingan ome-weyob-imaksad daksamargu, uludmalad, sogdemalad: —¿Wede ibiga binsarsunna we-ome we-gwallu-wawa-nued wiosa?
Ar wede sunna we-gwallu-wawaad mani-dummad uklegoenad, degi, we-mani dule-wileganaga adi nabir uklegoenad.
Ar degi-sogmalad Jesús mag daksagu, sogded: —¿Ar ibiga bemar nue omese urwemala? Mer ese achamar. Ar ome ibmar-nued anga imaksad.
Ar dule-wilegedi gusgu bemarba gudigu-sadeguoed. Andi bemarba gudigu-sadeguosulid.
Ar ome we gwallu-wawaad an-sangi eosadi, we eosdo an-diglegoed-iduar, ar gusgu anmar-igar-maidba.
“Napira an bemarga soged, bia an-gaya-burba-nuedgi we-napneggi sunmaklegoe, we-ome-ibmar-imaksadgi sunmaklemogoed, adi we-ome ibmar-imaksadgi binsamalagar.”
Jesús-e-sapingan-ambe-gakabogwad-wargwen, Judas-Iscarioteye-nugad, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganse nade-gusad.
Amarga sogdapid: —¿Ibi bemar anga ukmaloe, an bemarga Jesús-ukmalar? Judio-dummagan Judasga mani-sibu dulagwen-gakambe uksamalad.
Geb agi Judas igar-amiarsunnad, igi saele darba Jesús-uko-dibeye.
Judio-ibagi, Madu-Ina-Niksuli-Gulleged-Iba-gebe-onodedgi, e-sapingan Jesússe nonimalad, ega sognonimalad: —¿Bia anmar guagwar bega neg amimaloe, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibagi mas-gulleged gunnegar?
Jesús amarga sogde: —Neggweburse be namar, an-bega-dule-wargwengi-sogoedse. A-dulega be sogmaloed: ‘Odurdaked-saila sogye: An-ibagan omosye. Be-neggine an sapinganmala, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba an dakmaloye.’
Ar igi Jesús emarga sogsamala, e-sapingan deyob imaksado. A-neggi ibagi na mas-gunmalaga bela ibmar guagwar urbismarsunnad.
A-ibagi neg-mutikudgu, Jesús na-e-sapingan-ambe-gakabogwadmala mesa-naba mas-gunnega signonimalad.
Mas gunbukmargu, Jesús sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, bemar-wargwen darba an-ukoed.
A-ular e-sapingan nue-wile itodmalad, na wargwen-wargwen Jesúsga sogdemarsunnad: —¿Dummad, ani an be-ukoye? Sur an insa.
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —Ar dule-wargwen e-argan bategi anba odogoedi, a darba an-ukoed.
Napira an bemarga soged, ani Dule-Machi, ar igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi angi narmakar nai, ar deyob an guoed, an burgoed. Ar dule-darba-an-ukoeddina adi nue wilegoed, sabsur-odurdaklegoedba. A-dule gwalulessulina, bur nabirinad.
Geb degi Judas, darba-Jesús-uknaid, Jesúsga sogded: —Odurdaked-saila, ¿ani an be-ukoye? Jesús ega sogde: —Ar bede soged.
Mas gunbukmargu, Jesús madu susgua, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsa-gusad. Geb a-sorba Jesús madu biske-biske imaksad, e-sapinganga ukded, sogded: —Be sumar, be gunmar, we-madu an-sanad. Jesús na e-sapinganmala we-madu guchamarsunnad.
A-sorba Jesús nog susbalid. Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsabargu, e-sapinganga ukdebalid, sogdebalid: —Bemar bela we gobmar.
We, an-abe. An-abe Bab Dummad dulemarbo igar-bini-mesnaid-wilubganad, degi, an-abe dulemar-bukidar-ular milegoed, adi iskued ega eliegar.
An bemarga soged, emigindi uva-nisdi we-sorba bar an gobosulid, geb an-Bab-neg-dakmaidse an bemar-abargi an gobdapbaloed. Jesús na e-sapinganmala we-vino gobsamarsunnad.
Bab-Dummad-nuggi namaksamalad-sorba, Olivos-yarse nadmarsun.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: —Belagwapa emi-mutik bemar angi bangudmaloed, ar ade Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid, sognaid: ‘Sibad-wawaad-edarbed an oburgoed, Geb agi sibad-wawaad bela duurmakdoed.’ Zac. 13:7
Jesús sogdebar: —Geb gannar-an-durgusad-sorba, bemar-idu Galilease an naoed.
Pedro, abin-imakdegu, sogde: —Bela begi bangudmalale, andi begi gwen banguosulid.
Jesús, Pedro-abin sogded: —Napira an bega soged, emi-mutik, gannir-namaked-iduar, ilapaa be an-osulogoed.
Pedro, abin-sogde: —Ar an beba burgweye sogele, amba an be-osulogosulid. E-sapingan-baigan bela degibi sogdemalad.
Jesús na e-sapinganmala Getsemaní-neg-nugadse nonimarsun. Agi e-sapinganga Jesús sogde: —Wegi bemar ambikumar, andi weba Bab Dummadse gornagwelo.
Pedro, degi, Zebedeo-machimala-warbogwadbi eba sesa-gusad. Geb agi Jesús na nue-wilegoedba nue-wile itoalid, degi, nue-surbinsa itoarbalid.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapingan-walapaagwadga sogde: —Andi an ulubgi nue-bukib-itogedba sunna an burgwisar-itoleged. Wegi be ambikumar, nue atakmalo, Bab Dummadse be gormalo.
Jesús sikwas nadgu, yokorgi sindigar napagi dulluu sigdapgu, Bab Dummadse gote, sogded: “An-Bab, an-idu igar-buled naid, ina-gaibid gobedyob beedse an egi wilegoed, sunna be anga osulogena-gadin, degite an-sogedbarsur, unnila be-sogedbarbi be imakoed.”
Geb degi Jesús Bab-Dummadse-gorsiid bergusgu, na e-sapinganse nonikid, daknonikid, bela gabmamai. Geb degi Jesús Pedroga sogded: —¿Ar wachi-irgwensaar anba wis ataksii geg be gue, Babse golega?
Nue atak, Bab Dummadse be gole, adi iskuedgi-wilubdakleged mer bemarse warmakmalagar. An wisi bemar-burbadi guagwar gudiid Babse golega, bemar-sandi degisulid, adi nolloo gued.
Jesús gannar nadbargu, gannar Bab Dummadse gotebalid, sogdebalid: “An-Bab, an-idu igar-buled naid, ina-gaibid gobedyob beedse an egi wilegoed, geg be anga osulogele, igi-barsa, degite, be-sogedba be imakoed.”
Jesús Bab-Dummadse-gorsiid bergusgu, gannar na e-sapinganse nonibargu, daknonikid, gabmamai, ar ade gabed nue egi obin itomalad.
Degi Jesús na e-sapingan gabmamai obesad, gannar nadbalid. Degi gannar ilapaagi Bab Dummadse goted, gannar idu sogsadgii sogdebalid.
Geb degi Jesús e-sapinganse nonikid, ega sognonikid: —Bemar gabmarsun, bemar obunnomarsun. Emigindi wachidi omossun. Ani Dule-Machi, dulemar-iskudidimaladse darba uklesokarsun, adi an-oburgwemalagar.
Degisoggu, bemar gwisgumarsun, namarsun. Be dakmar, dule-darba-an-uksaddi bato anmar-walik gusad.
Jesús amba e-sapinganga sunmakgwichi, e-sapingan-warambe-gakabogwad-wargwen, Judas-nugad, ese nonikid. Aba dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan-neggwebur-sedimalad dulemar-bukidar-barmiar-gusmalad. We-dulemar-bukidar espunyar-yalaba, degi, suarmar annik-annik, Judasba duurmakdani-gusmalad.
Judas, Jesús-darba-uksadi dulemar-nonimalad-ebo igar-nabosad, ega sogsad: “Ar dule-e-wagar an uoed, ega sogegar, be nued sogeye, a-dule bemar gamaloed.”
Geb Judas yog Jesússe naar imaksad, ega sogded: —Odurdaked-saila, ¿be nuedi? Geb degi ei-wagar usa imaksad.
Degi Jesús Judasga sogded: —An-ai, ¿ibiga be daniki? Geb degi dulemar Jesússe nonimalad, geb Jesússe achadmargu, Jesús-gasmarsunnad.
Ar e-sapin-wargwen Jesús-naba-gwichidi, espunyar onosgu, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad-e-mai naibi imaksad, e-uaya ei siksad.
Geb degi Jesús aga sogde: —Be espunyar e-uka-yaba be mese, ar bela dulemar-espunyar-ebumaladi, espunyargi burgoed.
¿Ar be insagua, emispinne geg an-Babse gochar be insae, mili-miliba geg angermar anga barmida be insae? Anga barmialile.
Ar deyob gusale, ¿degite, igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar-naidba bar gusarsunna? Ar a-Gardagi sognaid, an burgwer-gebye.
Geb agi Jesús dulemarga sogded: —¿Ibiga bemar dule-iskana-ibmar-atursaedyob an-gadanimala, emide espunyar, degi, suarmar-yalaba bemar an-gadanimargu? Bane-bane bemarba an gudigusad, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi dulemar-odurdakdii, degite agindi bemar gwen an-gassurmalad.
Emigindi ar igar-maidbali, adi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad-narmaksadba guegala deyob gunonikid. Degi Jesús-sapingan Jesús wargwen mete, e-idu bela duurmakdemarsun.
Dulemar-Jesús-gasmaladi, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad, Caifás-nugadse Jesús-sesmalad, bia escribamar, degi, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan igar-itogega bukmaladse.
