Degi Jesús na e-sapingan-odurdakega burbar sunmakdegu, amarga sogded: “Bab-Dummadse-goled nue abeleged, mer galakued imakmalo.”
Jesús burbar sogdesun: “Ibagwengi, neggweburgi dule-igar-naboged mai-gusad. A-dulede Bab-Dummad-gwen-dobsulid, degi, dulemargi gwen binsaed-nikaa dasurbalid.
“A-neggweburgi mukwa-wargwen ei-sui-burgwisad gudigusmogad. A-mukwade dule-igar-nabogedgi gannar-gannar alamaknaidgi ega sognoni-daed: ‘Dule-istar-an-dakdiid-ebo anga igar-nabiroye.’
Dule-igar-naboged gebe-guargua yapa mukwaga igar-nabo-gusad. “A-undaradgine na ulubgi sokalid: ‘Bab Dummad an dobsur-inigwele, degine, dulemargi-gwen-binsaed-nikaa an dasurbar-inigwele,
ar we-mukwa angi alamaknaigusoggu, ega igar an nabogoye, ar degiile, abakalegi anse-nanagwisguadba budar an dakalirye.’ ”
Geb degi Dummad-Jesús sogdebar: “Nue bemar itomalana, dule-igar-naboged, iskana-daedi, igi sogsa-gusad.
¿Ar bemar insagu, Bab Dummad na e-dulemar-susadga igar-napiragwad imakosur be insae, ese mutikidba, degine, ibginedba gordimaladga? Imakoe. ¿Bab Dummad undaradgi geb ese-gormalad abinsao be insae? Suli.
An bega sogmar, Bab Dummad abga e-sordamarga igar-napiragwad imakoed. “Ar ani Dule-Machi, we-napnegse gannar danikir, bemar insagu, ¿dulemar Bab-Dummad-bensurmalad-nika we-napneggi daknoniko be insae?”
Ar dulemar, na dukin nuedye, baigandi iskanaye, sogdimaladga, Jesús we-igar-burbar-maidgi-sunmaklegedgi sogded:
“Ibagwengi, machergan-warbo nadmalad Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse: Gwensak Fariseo, baiddina Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbaed-dule.
“Fariseo gwichi Bab Dummadse gorgwichid, na dukin weyob soggwichid: ‘Bab Dummad, dog-nuedye an bega soged, ar an dulemar-baidgii dasulid, an atursilisulid, igar-inikigwadbi aimarga an imaked, an ome-dikarba-yoledisulid, degine, we-dule-Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbaed-daedyob an dasulid.
Bab-Dummadse-golega itoged-irgwengi, ilabo an mas-gunsuli gudidaed, bela an mani-onoged-irba ambegi-gwensak an ukdaed.’
“Ar dule-Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbaeddi Bab Dummadse gorgwisgu, bannaba gwichi, nonose-bakar gwen onakbisur gwichid, na e-binasgar sarsogwis soggwisdo: ‘Bab Dummad wile be an-dake, an dule-iskudiid-duled.’
“Ani Jesús, an bega sogmar, ar we-dule bur gwage nugus-naddo, Fariseoba. Ar ade dule-wargwen na nug dummarba na saele, a-dule bur nug-bipii guoed. Ar dule na nug bipii na saerdi, adi a-dule bur nug odummolegoed.”
Degine, Jesússe mimmigan-sedani-gusmalad, Jesús ega ebugegar, adi Bab Dummad nued mimmigangi binsaegar. Jesús-sapingan deyob dakarmargu, dulemar-mimmigan-senonimaladse uluarmalad.
Ar Jesús na e-sapinganse gochagu, ega sogded: —Mer ese urwemar. Mimmigan anse daged be imakmar, mer be bargamar, ar Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid we-mimmiganyob damaladgadid.
Napira an bemarga sogmalad, ar dule-wargwen Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid mimmiganyob abingasulile, geg Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse doged.
Dule-wargwen nue-nug-nikagwad Jesússe egisnonikid: —Odurdaked-saila-nued, ¿ibi an imaker-gebe, burba-geg-bergued an abingaegar?
Jesús, abin-sogded: —¿Ibiga dule-nuedye be anga soge? Dule-nued sulid, unnila Bab Dummadbi wargwennaa dule-nued gued.
Ar Bab-Dummad-igar-mesisad be wisid: Mer sui-dikarba, degi, ome-dikarba yolemalo, mer dule-oburgwemalo, mer atursamalo, mer gakansaar aimargi sunmakmalo, be-babgi, degi, be-nangi, nue-binsaed-nikaa damalo. Ex. 20:12-16; Dt. 5:16-20
Dule, abin-sogded: —Gusgu an sapingwagwad-akar bela we-igarmar-mamaidba an nanadiid.
Jesús, weyob dule-ega-soge itosgu, ega sogded: —Ibmar-gwensak amba be napi. Bela ibmar-be-nikad manigi be uknae, geb agi mani wileganaga be mimmioed. Geb degiir be nibneggi ibmar-nued be nikuoed. Geb a-sorba anba be dagoed, an-sapinga guegar.
Dule, weyob Jesús-ega-soge itosgu, nue-bukib-binsaded, ar ade dule nue-mani-ibedid.
Jesús, dule-nue-bukib-binsa-ito daksagu, sogded: —¡Ibiyobi dulemar-mani-ibganga Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse-doged-igar dutusuli, ar ade dogdar maniginbi binsamalad!
Ar ade moli-yargan-mureged bur-baisursunna iko-ibyagi doged, ar dule-mani-ibeddi bur-beedse Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse doged.
Ar dulemar weyob Jesús-ibmar-soge-itosmalad, sogdemar: —¿Ar doa degite sunna abonolegosunna? Deyob sogsamardo, ar ade binsamalad, mani-ibgan baisursunnaa bur abonolegoye.
Jesús, dulemar-abin sogded: —Ar dulemargardi ibmar-geg-guedi, Bab Dummadgardi bela ibmar sunna guedbiid.
Geb degi Pedro, Jesúsga sogded: —¿Anmardina? Emide wegi anmar na-ibmar-nikamalad bela an na obesmalad, adi anmar beba naegar.
Geb degi Jesús, abin-sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, ar dule-wargwensaar Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid-ular na e-neg, e-babgan, e-gwenadgan, e-ome, e-mimmigan, obesale,
bur-bule, we-napneggi ibmar-abingaosurdeeye soglesulid, degine, burba-geg-bergued yoedse amba-deyob abingabaloed.
Jesús na e-sapingan-warambe-gakabogwad bachikii sesgua, ega sogded: “Anmar Jerusalénse nadapid, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad bela angi Dule-Machigi narmaksadba igargan anga guedsegad.
“Ani Dule-Machi, Judiosurmaladse uklegoed, amar angi dodomaloed, istar angi sunmakmaloed, degi, angi wiakmarbaloed.
Ar sabsur an-bibyosmalad-sorba, an-oburgwemaloed. Geb ibapaagwadgi gannar an durguoed.”
Ar Jesús-e-sapingan-ambe-gakabogwad aku itosmalad, ar ade amba egi odukuar we-gaya-burba maid, degisoggu, aku-ito gusmarsundo.
Ibagwengine, Jesús Jericó-neggweburse warmaknadapgua, deunni dule-ibya-sulidi, igar-naba sii, mani egissii-gusad.
Dule-aku-ataked dulemar-bukidar duurmaknadap itoargu, amarse egichided: —¿Igi neg-gunai?
Ega sogdemalad: —Jesús-Nazaretgined nadapye.
Geb degi dule-aku-ataked binnasur gote, sogded: —¡Jesús, Rey-David-wagwa, wile be an-dake!
Dulemar-Jesús-iduar-nadapmalad dule-aku-atakedse uludmalad, adi mer binnasur golegar. Ar dule-aku-ataked aka-bur-bule binnasur gorsigisad: —¡Rey-David-wagwa, wile be an-dake!
Geb degi Jesús gwisgusgua, dule-aku-ataked ese sedaged imaksad. Dule-aku-ataked ese nonigu, Jesús ese egichialid,
ega sogded: —¿Ibu bega imakbi be an-abege? Dule-aku-ataked, Jesús-abin-sogded: —Dummad, mag-atak be an-imake.
Jesús ega sogded: —Be-ibya nugusun. Be an-bengussursoggu, be nugussun.
Geb degi dule sunna mag-atak gussunnad. Dule-nugusad Jesúsba nadapgu, Bab-Dummad-nug ogannonadap-gusad. Bela-dulemar dule-nugusad-daksamargu, Bab-Dummad-nug ogannodmarsunnad.
Jericó-neggweburse Jesús modapgu, a-neggweburgi nadap-gusad.
Agi dakleargu, machered-wargwen, Zaqueo-nugad, Jericógi mai-gusad. Zaqueo dakleargu, dulemar-Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbamalad-e-dummadid, degine, dule-mani-ibedbalid.
A-dulede Jesús-dakbigualid, wede Jesús doasunye. Ar Jesúsba-dulemar-nadapmalad bukidarsoggu, Zaqueo geg Jesús-dake-gualid, ar ade Zaqueo dule-matukwagwad.
Zaqueo aimar-idu abarmakde-gusad, sapi-sicómorogi nakwegar, ar ade Jesús a-igargi nasoed.
Jesús a-sapi-gwichid mosgu, niba atakdegu, Zaqueo-dakde, ega sogded: —Zaqueo, gwae be dage, aidedage, ar ade emi-ibagi an be-neggi obunnoger-gebed.
Geb degi Zaqueo gwae-gwae aidealid, weligwar na e-neggi Jesús-abingasad.
Dulemar daksamargu Jesús Zaqueo-negse dogsa, bela sunmakedbi-guarmalad, sogdemalad: “Dule-iskudiid-negse Jesús dogsaye.”
Geb degi Zaqueo gwisgusgu, Jesúsga sogded: —Dummad, emide wegi an-ibmar an-na-nikadi, negabar dule-wileganaga an ukoed. Ar dule-gwensak-dibe an ibmar-atursasale, an ega ilabake bur-melu an ega ukoed.
Jesús, abin-sogded: —Emi-iba we-neg-yaginmaladga iskuedgi-dule-abonoleged nonisun, ar ade we-dule, Abraham-e-wagwamogad.
Ar ade, ani Dule-Machi, dulemar-yoggusmalad amiega, degi, dulemar-iskuedgi-abonogega an nonikid.
Ar Jesús Jerusalén-neggwebur-walik gudisoggu, dulemar Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid bato emarse oyolesokarye bimalanad. A-ular Jesús dulemar-e-itosimaladga
burbar sunmakedgi sogded: “Dule-wargwen, nue-nug-nikadi, yar-baidse dikasur nade-gusad, reyga nugsalegegar. A-dulede, gannar-danibaloye sogsa naded.
“A-dulede nasokargu, ega-arbamalad-warambegwadse gochad. Amarga mani-ichesur uksagu, ega sogded: ‘Wegi be anga mani-onomalo an gannar dagedse.’
“Ar na e-neggweburginmalad dule-reyga-guoed istar dakmarsoggu, naded-sorba dulemar-barmisad, dummaganga sogegar: ‘We-dule anmar-reyga gubi anmar abesurye.’
“Degine, reyga-gusad-sorba gannar nonigu, e-maiganga-mani-uksadse gochad, adi amarse egisega igi mani imaksamala.
“Mai-gebesailad nonigu, reyga sognonikid: ‘Dummad, be-anga-mani-uksadgi ambe an onosbalid.’
“Dummad ega sogdesun: ‘Nued, be, mai-nued. Ar ibmar-ichegwadgi be nued arbassoggu, neggwebur-gwaambedgi be dummadga guo.’
“Baid-mai reyse nonimogu, ega sognonikid: ‘Dummad, be-mani an bega gwaatar onosbalid.’
“Dummad we-maiga amba deyob sogdebalid: ‘Neggwebur-ataledgi be dummadga gumogo.’
“Baid-mai nonibargu, reyga sognonikid: ‘Dummad, wegi an bega be-mani sedani, muswegi an bega nue-sabosad.
Ar an be-dobgusad, ar bede dule-yaisur-daed-duled, ar be ibmar-urbissulid be sudaed, ibmar-be-digsasulid be wedaed.’
“Geb degi rey a-maiga sogdesun: ‘Be mai-iskana, ar na be-dukin-ibmar-sogsadba an bega sogsun. Ar be wisinad an dule-yaisur-daed-duled, an ibmar-urbissulid an sudaed, an ibmar-digsasulid an wedaed.
¿Ar ibiga degite mani-urbileged-neggi be mani urbiapsuli, adi gannar an nonikogu, mani-nosad an sunonikoenad?’
“Ar rey dulemar-bukmaladga sogdesun: ‘We-dule-mani-ganikid e-annik be sumar, dule-mani-ambe-onosadga be ukmar.’
“Dulemar, rey-abin sogdemalad: ‘Dummad, ar a-dule mani-ambe bato nikad.’
“Dummad, amar-abin sogded: ‘Ar dulemar-bela-ibmar-nikmalad aga bur napi uklegoed. Ar dule-ibmar-suliddi, amba ar ibu wis nika, ei bur sulegoed.
Deginbali, istar-an-dakmalad, egi-dummadga-gubisur an-abesmalad, anse sedamar, an-asabin amar-e-dukar egwanmaloed.’ ”
Jesús weyob ibmar sogsagu, e-sapingan idumai, Jerusalénse nadap-gusmalad.
Emi dakleargu, Jesús, Betfagé-neggweburse, degine, Betania-neggweburse warmakdanimargu, Olivosye-yar-nugad-siid inikgusgu, Jesús na e-sapingan-warbo-barmisad,
amarga sogsad: —Neggwebur-bipii anmar-asabin-siidse be namar. A-neggweburgi bemar dogdapmalar, moli-bipi-uaya-suid, dule-egi-yo-gwen-siged, be-idu atinnar-nai bemar dakdapoed. Be esikmalo, geb degi be anse sedamaloed.
Ar dule-wargwen bemarse egichialile: ‘¿Ibiga bemar moli-bipi-uaya-suid esiknanai?’, ega bemar weyob sogmaloed: ‘Ar Dummad we-moli-binasoged.’
Jesús na e-sapingan-warbo-barmisad nadmargu, dakdapmalad, ar igi ega soglesmaladba.
Jesús-sapingan moli-bipi-uaya-suid esiknanaigu, e-ibedmar ega sokarmalad: —¿Ibiga moli-bipi-uaya-suid bemar esiknanai?
Abin sogdemalad: —Ar Dummad moli-bipi-uaya-suid-binasoged.
Jesús-sapingan moli-bipi-uaya-suid Jesússe senonimarsunnad. Geb degi moli-bipi-birgi na e-mormar ogichamargu, Jesús-onakwismarsun, moli-bipi-birgi.
Jesús, Jerusalénse nadapgu, e-iduar igargi dulemar mor ogitemalad.
Olivos-yar-aideged-walik gusgu, bela bukidar dulemar-Jesúsba-nagusmalad, weligwar itodmalad, bela ibmar-dakledisulid emar daksadba, binnasur Bab-Dummad-nug ogannodmalad,
sogdemalad: ¡We, rey Bab-Dummad-nuggi danikid bela ega ib-nuedga guena-gadin! Nibneggi bogidikid gusun, degine, nibneggine Bab-Dummad-nug ogannomarsun. Sal. 118:26
Degine, dulemar-bukidarad-abargi Fariseomar-war-wargwen Jesúsga sokarmalad: —Odurdaked-saila, beba-nanaimaladse be urwe, mer deyob sogmarye.
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —An bega sogmar, ar wemar bogiledele, akwamar oimakarmalaled an-nug odummomalagar.
Jesús Jerusalén-neggwebur-walik-mosgu, Jerusalén dakdegu, ega bode,
sogded: “¡Ar emi-ibadse geb-be-wisina, igi be imaker-gebe bogidik ambikuegar, bemar bogidik ambikusmalaled! Ar emigindi, we begi odukuar nagusad, adi mer mag be itomalagar.
“Ar ibagan begi danikoed, be-istarmalad be-ebilis napa gwisnonikoed, be-ebilis ambikunonikogu, geb degi bela begi gwichigudamaloed.
Degi geb napagi be-omukumaloed, be-dulemar-oburgwemaloed, degine, akwamar be-birgi bubukwad bar be-birgi ambikuosurmalad. Ar deyob be guoed, bese atakleapid-iba aku be daksad-ular.”
Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse dogdapgu, dulemar-agi-ibmar-baknanaid, degi, ibmar-ukbukmalad sabsur onisad.
Jesús amarga sogded: —Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Bab Dummad soged, An-nega anse-goled-negye. Is. 56:7 Ar emigindi, bemardi atursamalad-negga imaksamalad.
Jesús bane-bane Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi Bab-Dummad-igargi dulemar-odurdakdii-gusad. Ar dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagandi, escribamardi, degi, dule-dummagan-neggweburgi-neg-semamaiddi Jesús-oburgwebi-gusmalad.
Ar amar geg Jesús-oakalo-gusmardo, ar ade bela dulemar Jesús-nue-itobukwa-damalad.
Ibagwengine, Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi dulemar-odurdaksigu, degine, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmaksigu, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, escribamar, degine, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan Jesússe nonimalad.
Amar Jesúsga sognonimalad: —Be anmarga soge: ¿Doa-nuggine wede be we-ibmar imakdii? ¿Ar doa bega gangued uksasunna, we deyob be ibmar imakegar?
Jesús, abin-sogded: —An bemarse ibmar-soggwen egismogodo. Bemar anga sogmalana:
¿Doa Juan-Bautista-barmiar be insae, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imakega? ¿Bab Dummad barmiali, igi, dulemar barmiali? Anga be sogmalana.
Degi, Judio-dummagan muchub-muchub na sogdemalad: “Bab Dummad barmiarye anmar sogmalale, anmarga sogdagoed: ‘Degite, ¿ibiga bemar Juan-Bautista-bengusmarsunna?’
Dulemar barmiarye anmar sogbalile, dulemar bela akwagi anmar-makmaloed. Ar ade bela nue sogmalad, ‘Juan-Bautista, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged-sunnadye.’ ”
Degisoggu, Judio-dummagan, Jesús-abin sogdemarsun: —Anmar wichurmalad doa Juan-Bautista-barmiali.
Degi Jesús, abin-imakdemosun: —An bemarga sogosurmarmodo, wede doa-nuggi we-ibmar an imakdii.
Geb degi Jesús dulemarga burbar-sunmaklegedgi sunmakdesun, sogded: “Ibagwengi, dule-wargwen nainugi uva digsado. Nainu-ibed dulemar-arbamaladga na e-nainu urmaksado, adi a-dulemar nainugi uva wealir, e-ibedga wis ukmogoye, na deyob ebo igar-mesisbardo. Geb degi nainu-ibeddi undar na yoggunaded.
“Uva-weed-ibagan mosgu, nainu-ibed na e-mai nainugi-arbamaladse barmialid, adi uva-na-egadid suegar. Ar nainugi-arbamaladdi nainu-ibed-e-mai ese nonigu, sabsur sarsosmalad, geb degi unnila arganagwabi gannar barmismalad.
“Geb degi nainu-ibed e-mai-baid-barmiarbalid. Ar we-mai sabsur sarsosmarbalid, degi, egi dodosmarbalid. Geb degi unnila arganagwabi gannar barmismalad.
Degi, nainu-ibed irbaagi gannar na e-mai-baid barmiarbalid. Ar dulemar-nainugi-arbamalad we-mai nue-naibi imaksamarbargu, nainu-dikarba metemalad.
“Geb degi nainu-ibed sokarsunnad: ‘¿Emide, igi an saosunna? An-machi na nue-sabedi an barmidodo. Ar an-machi-dakdamalogu, adi egi-binsaed-nikaa-damaladba gwen oakalogosurmarsua.’
“Ar nainugi-arbamalad, nainu-ibed-machi dani dakarmargu, na ega sogdemalad: ‘We-dule-danikidi e-bab-burgwisar, nainu bela egadbi guoed. Degisoggu, anmar we-machi-oburgwemarsun, adi nainu anmargadga guegar.’
Machigwa-gasmargu, nainu-dikarba metemalad, geb degi oburgwismarsunnad.” Jesús dulemar-e-itobukmaladga sogded: “¿Degite, nainu-ibed, igi dulemar-nainugi-arbamalad-imaknoniko be insae?
Nonikogu, dulemar-nainugi-arbamalad-oburgwenonikoed. Geb degi dule-baiganga na e-nainu urmaknonikoed.” Ar weyob Jesús ibmar soge itosmargu, sogdemalad: —¡Bab Dummad, mer weyob ibmar-imaked anmar-imakena-gadin!
Ar Jesús, na ede akwa-nuedyobsoggu, nuu Judio-dummagan-dakdegu, amarga sogded: —Degite, Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Dulemar-neg-sobmalad akwa istar daksamalad, a-akwa, akwa-sunsogedga bur gunonikid. Sal. 118:22 ¿Wede ibi obarsunna?:
Ar dule-wargwen we-akwa-nuedgi argwachale, we-dule bibiskoed. Ar we-akwa dulegi argwachardi, adi we-dule ese ubigwar guoed.
Dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degine, escribamar, Jesús-gabi-guarmalanad, ar ade mag-itosmalad Jesús we-ibmar-burbar-sogsadi yamo emarga sognaid. Degisoggu, Jesús-gabi-guarmalanad, degite, dummagan dulemar-dobedba-geg-Jesús-oakalogusmalad, ar ade Jesús-gasmalar, dulemar-bukmalad Jesús-bina uluarmalaled.
Judio-dummagan arbakee dulemar-argaed Jesússe barmiarmalad. Amar yamo dule-nuedyob na imakarmalad, adi Jesús ibmar-noar-sunmakedgi gamalagar. Jesús ibmar noar sogsale, gamaloed, dummad-neg-dakmaidga ukmalagar, adi Jesúsga igar-itogegar.
Dulemar-argamalad Jesússe egichiarmalad, ega sogdemalad: —Odurdaked-saila, anmar be-wisdo, be inikigwadba ibmar soged, degi, inikigwadba be ibmar odurdakbalid, degine, begardi dulemar emarbi be daked, ar ade Bab-Dummad-igar-maid, napiragwadba be dulemar-odurdakdiid.
Emide, ¿we igar-nuedi, Roma-dummad, César-nugad, anmargi-mani-gaed bennuked? ¿Anmar bennukoe, igi, anmar bennukosuli? ¿Igi be sogmosunna?
Ar Jesúsdi wemar-yamo-e-yardakdanikid mag daksoggu, amarga sogded: —¿Ar ibiga bemar yamo an-wilubdakdanimala?
Mani be anga oyogena. Jesússe mani oyosmargu, Jesús sogded: —¿Ar wede we-manigi doa-wagar-wilub sisunna, degine, doa-nug narmakar-naibarsunna? Jesús-abin sogdemalad: —Roma-Dummad-César, a-wagar-wilub, degine, a-nug narmakarbalid.
Geb degi, Jesús, abin-imakdemosunnad: —Ar ibmar Césargadir, Césarba be ibsamardo. Ar ibmar Bab Dummadgadirdi, Bab Dummadba be ibsamardo.
Ar we-dulemar Jesús-sunmakedgi dulemar-asabin geg Jesús-yardakgusmalad. Ar bur-bule geger dakdemalad igi Jesús e-abin imaksad. Degisoggu, gwen bar-akar ega sogsasurmardo.
Geb degi Saduceomar Jesússe nonimarmogad. Amarde sogmalad, “Dule burgwisale, gannar geg bar durguye.” Agala Saduceomar Jesússe we-igar egichiarmalad,
ega sogdemalad: “Odurdaked-saila, Moisés anmarga Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar obesad: Ia mimmi-nikussuli ome-idu burgwisale, e-urba a-ome-nikuoye, adi e-iaga anagan-urbegar. Dt. 25:5
“Dakargu, machimala e-gwenadgan-walagugle-na-gumaladi weyob gusdo. Ia-dummad ome-nikusgu, anagan-urbissuli burgwisad.
A-sorbalid a-ome-nikunonimogu, amba e-iayob mimmi-nikussuli burgwismogad.
Geb degi a-sorbalid amba a-ome-nikunonimogad. Deyob bela e-walagugled a-ome-nikusmaladbiid, anagan-gwen-obessuli bela burgwismalad.
Geb a-sorba ome burgwismosunnad.
“Ar dule-gannar-durguoed-iba nonikile, a-omede, ¿wede doa-omega guosunna, ar bela na e-gugle-nikusmaladbiid?”
Geb degi Jesús, Saduceomar-abin imakdegu, sogded: “Dulemar we-napneggi, na ome nikumalad, degi, sui-na-nikunanai-damalad.
Ar dulemar-nabir-Bab-Dummad-negse-dogmaloeddi, degi, gannar-durgumaloeddi, amar gannar ome-nikunai, degi, sui-nikunai bar guosurmalad.
Ar ade we-dulemar gannar-durgunonikidba geg bar burgwemalad. Amar angermaryob gunonimaloed, Bab-mimmiganga gumaloed.
“Ar burgwismalad gannar durguoye sogleged, Moisés anmarga oyosmogad. Moisés deun sapi-bula-gummakmai-daksadgi narmaksagu, Bab Dummadgi sogsa-gusad, Abraham e-Bab-Dummadye, Isaac e-Bab-Dummadye, degine, Jacob e-Bab-Dummadye. Degisoggu, Moisés anmarga oyodo, dule-burgwismalad gannar durguoye.
Ar ade Bab Dummad, dulemar-burgwarmalad-e-Bab-Dummadsulid. Bab Dummad, dulemar-dula-gudidimalad-e-Bab-Dummadid. Ar Abraham, Isaac, degi, Jacob burgwismar-inigwele, Bab Dummadgardi amba dula gudidimalad, ar ade Bab Dummadgardi bela dulemar dula gudidimalad.”
Escribamar-war-wargwen Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Odurdaked-saila, nue imas be sogsado.
A-sorba bar gwen ibmar Jesússe egisbi ito nadsurmalad.
Geb degi Jesús Judio-dummaganga sogded: “¿Degite, ibiga sogmarsunna, we Cristo Rey-David-wagwaye?
Ar David-sunnad soged, Salmos-narmakar-naidgi: Bab Dummad an-Dummadga soged: ‘An-argan-nuedsik be sige, be dule-dummadga guegar,
bela be-istarmaladgi nakwedse an be-imakedsegad.’ Sal. 110:1
Ar David, Cristoga soged, be an-Dummadye. Degite, ¿Cristo igi e-wagwaga gubarsunnoe?”
Bela dulemar Jesús-itobukwadgi, Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded:
“Escribamargi nue salakarmar, mer amaryob bemar damalo. Ar amardi na yeer ito-damalad mor oyaarmakdiir, degine, dulemar bela ese ibmar-ukleged-neggi goledbimalale, amba yeer ito-damarbalid. Amardi Judiomar-onmaked-neggi dule-dummagan-gan-sigedginbi sigbi-damalad, degine, ibagi mas gullealir, dummagan-gan-sigedginbi sigbi-damarbalid.
“We-escribamar yamo-yardakar ammamar-ei-sui-burgwismalad-ibe neg atursa-damalad, degine, dulemar yeer e-dakegala yamo suitii Bab-Dummadse-gorgwis-damalad. Ar we-escribamar bur-bule sabsur-odurdaklemaloed, deyob damaladba.”
Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi sigua, dakded, mani-ibgan mani-urbed-ulu-yagi Bab-Dummadga-mani-urbenoni-damalad.
Daksabalid, mukwa-wileged-wargwen, ei-sui-burgwisad, mani-esnon-gwabo egwachamogad.
Jesús sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, we-mukwa-wileged, ei-sui-burgwisad, we bur-bule dulemar-baiganba mani uksad.
Ar baigan Bab-Dummadga-mani-uksaddi, gwabgusad uksamalad. We-mukwadi belagwapa na nika-gudiid, e-wilesagwadgine na bela uknonikid.
Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-sobaledgi dulemar sunmakbukmalad, e-akwamar yeer-dakleye, degine, dulemar a-neg yeer-daklegega-ibmar-uksamalad yeer-daklebarye. Agi Jesús sogded:
—Ar we-neg yeer daklegendo, degite we-ibmarmar bemar dakmaladi, ibagan nonikoed, bipisaale akwa-gwagwensaar birgi na askin-askin bar sigosulid, bela ayaroedbiid.
Jesús-sapingan, Jesússe egichiarmalad: —Odurdaked-saila, ¿sana degite, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg ayarosunna? ¿Degine, we-ibagan mosar, ibi-wilubgan oyoledagosunna?
Geb degi Jesús sogded: “Nue salakarmar, mer dulemarse yardaklemalo. Ar bukidar yamo anyob imaknonimaloed, sognonimaloed: ‘Ani an Cristo, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule.’ Degine, sognonimarbaloed: ‘Neg nue dukumossun.’ Degi-inigwele, mer eba be nagumalo.
“Bila-onogedgibi naguar bemar itoarmar-dibe, degine, neg-urwedgibi nai bemar itoarmarbar-dibe, mer be dobgumalo. Ar we-ibmarmar-inse guer-gebed, degite, neg bato emiskwaa berguo-deeye soglesulid.”
Geb degi Jesús amarga sogdebar: “Dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmalad na bila ononanai-gudamaloed, degi, reymar na muchub-muchub egi yolenanai na gudamarbaloed.
Degine, negabandur-dummagan nagumai-gudagoed. Yar-baid-baidgi ukud-dummad, degi, uelemalad-bukidar-ainimai-gubaloed. Dobed-dummad nagumai, degine, nibneggi ibmarmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid-dummagan oyolemai-gudagoed.
“Ar bela we-ibagan-bulegan-iduale, dulemar bemar-baregindamaloed, bemar-gamaloed, degine, Judiomar-onmaked-negse bemar-sedmaloed, eskaryagi bemar-metemaloed, degine, reymar-asabin, degi, dummagan-neg-dakmamaid-asabin bemar-sedmaloed. Bemar an-sapingansoggu, a-ular deyob bemar gumaloed.
“Ar we-ibmarmar deyob guoedi, adi bemar angi sunmakegalad.
Degisoggu, bemar gwagegi mer be binsamalo, an na san bendakegala, ¿igi an sogo-dibeye?
Ar ani an bega binsaed-nued ukoed igi be sogoe, bela dulemar-begi-gwisgudimalad begi nakosurmalad, ar ade geg be-abinsae-gumaloed.
“Ar be-babganse-bakar be-ukmaloed, be-iamar, be-urbamar, be-gwenadgan, be-aimar, amar, dummaganga be-ukmaloed, degine, bemar-gwen-gwen oburgwilemaloed.
Be an-sapingansoggu, a-ular bela-dulemar istar be-dakmaloed.
Ar degi-inigwele, be sailagia-wargwensaar bei gwen yogguosulid.
Ar bemar galakussulidba be abonolemaloed.
“Ar bemar dakalir, sordamar Jerusalén-ebiris bukwa, be wismardo, we-Jerusalén-neggwebur-bibisked-ibagan warmaknonikid.
Degisoggu, a-ibagi, Judeagi be gudiile, yalaganba be wakinsun. Bemar-Jerusalén-neggwebur-abargi-gudimalad, a-neggweburgi be nomarsun, degine, bemar-sapurba-gudimalad mer bar neggweburse dagmalo.
“Ar a-ibagangine dulemar-sabsur-odurdaklegoedba nunmaked-dummad guoed. Ar deyob guoed, adi bela Bab-Dummad-Gardagi-narmakar-naidba guegar.
Ar ammamar-gurgin-nika-gudidimalad, degi, mimmigan-gwaruu-onunanaimaladdi a-ibagangi be ani nue wilemaloed, ar ade geg be abarmak-gumaloed. Ar ade a-ibagangi we-napneggi ibagan-nunmak-itoleged nai-guoed, degine, Bab Dummad we-dulemargi nue odurdaked-dummad nasikoed.
“Degine, espunyargi ewarar burgwemaloed, degine, galesmalad bela neggweburmar akar-akar seledmaloed, degine, dulemar-Judiosurmalad Jerusalén nue ichononimaloed, we-dulemar Jerusaléngi-gudigumaloed-e-ibagan berguoedse.”
Jesús sogdebar: “Geb degine ibelergi wilubgan dakledagoed, nigi, degine, niskwamargi wilubgan dakledabaloed. Degine, napneggi dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmalad demar-uurmakedba, degi, demar-arwedba, surbinsa ito-damaloed.
Dulemar-bukidar dobedba, degine, ibmar-dummagan we-napneggi akar-gudagoedba negoedmaloed, ar ade nibneggi ibmar-dummagan gala-nika-nanaid bela giglimakoed.
“Geb degine ani Dule-Machi, mogir-imbaba an-ganguedba, degi, an bela-bela yeer-daklegedba-dani an-dakdamaloed.
Ar ibmar-wegimalad deyob guar be dakele, gannaa be itomar, degi, na be guakwaa gudigumar, ar ade be-san-burba-abonoleged-ibagan warmaksad.”
Degi Jesús na e-sapinganga burbar-sunmaklegedgi sogdebalid: “Nue be dakmalana, higuera-sapi, degi, sapi-baigan.
Wegi anmar-yargi sapimar bato gannar aramaksale, bemar nue wisid, yor omodanikid.
Amba deyobmodo, we-ibmarmar an-bemarga-sogsamaladi deyob guar bemar dakalir, bemar wisdo, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid bato warmakdanikid.
“Napira an bemarga soged, we-dulemar-burgwed-idu, we-ibmargan bela guedsegad.
Nibnegdi, degine, napnegdi bela berguoed, an-gaya-burbadi gege bergued, adi degi-sadeguoed.
“Bemargi na be-dukin nue salakarmarmo. Bemar gwagegi gadi mas-gunnedginbi mer binsadii-gumalo. Degine, mer munguedginbi, degi, we-napneggi-ibmar-naidginbi mer binsadii-gumarbalo, ar degiile, abakalegi we-ibagan bemar edarbedisulid ukiar bemargi danikile.
“Ar we-ibagan bela-dulemar we-napneggi-bukmaladgi ukiar nonikoed, igi ibmar-durgan ibmar-gaedgi ukiar gale-daedyob.
Degisoggu, guar be gudisamar, Bab Dummadse gordigumar, adi bemar unnitiba we-ibmar-gudagoedgi be wakinmalagar, degine, a-ibagangi adi Dule-Machi-asabin gwage-swilidik gwichi-gumogagar.”
Jesús, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi bane-bane neg-ibgi dulemar-odurdakdii-gualid, degine, neg-mutikdi gabnad-daed, Olivosye yar-nugadse.
Degine, neg-wagdar Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse, bela-dulemar Jesússe noni-damalad, e-odurdaked itogegar.
Dakleargu, Madu-Inasuli-Gulleged-Iba-warmakdanikidgine, a-iba bilebardo, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibaye.
Degine, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, escribamar, amar igar-amiarmalad, igi-saele Jesús-oburgwemalo-dibeye, ar ade dulemar-dobmarbalid.
Degi nia-saila-Satanás Judasgi dognonikid. We-Judasde, Jesús-sapingan-e-ambe-gakabogwad-wargwen-gued, Iscarioteye-nugbalid.
Degi Judas nade-gusad, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganse, degi, suar-ibmala-e-dummaganse. Amarse modapgu, ega sogdapid, ede Jesús emarga ukoye.
Judio-dummagan weligwar itosmalad. Judas-ebo igar-nabosmarsunnad, ega mani ukegar.
Judas sogsa-gusad, nue Jesús an bemarga ukoye. Degisoggu, Judas amidii-gualid, adi dulemar-darba Jesús-ukegar.
Madu-Ina-Niksulid-Gulleged-Ibagan mosgu, a-ibagi sibad-wawaad gunnega oburgwer-gebed, adi Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad insaegar.
Agine Jesús, Pedro-barmis, Juan-ebo, amarga sogsad: —Anmar-idu be namar, iba-onogegala ibmar guagwar be imaknamar, adi agi anmar mas gunmalagar.
E-sapingan-warbogwad Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Degite, ¿bia anmar be-idu guar neg-imakbi be abege?
Jesús, abin-sogded: —Emigi, bemar neggweburse dogdapmalale, dule-wargwen be-abingumaloed, gukingi dii gwidugi semai. A-dule-sorba be namaloed, bia dogdapoe, a-neggi bemar dogmarmogoed.
A-neg-ibedga be sogmaloed: ‘Odurdaked-saila bega soged: ¿Bia an sapinganmala Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibagi an mas-gunnoed-neg sii?’
Neg-ibed neg-dummad guagwar bato nue-saale niba-ailabirgi bemarga oyogoed. Agi bemar guar anmar-idu mas simaloed.
Jesús-sapingan-warbogwad nadmarsunnad. Ar igi Jesús emarga sogsa, deyob dakdapmalad. A-neggi ibagi na mas-gunmalagala, bela-ibmar guagwar urbismalad.
Degine, mas-gunned-wachi mosgu, Jesús mesa-naba na e-nuggi-barmilearmalad-warambe-gakabogwadmala signonikid.
Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: —¡Ibiyobi Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibagi an-burgoed-iduar bemarba we-mas-gunned an edarbedii-gusa!
Ar napira an bemarga soged, we-mas bar an gunnosulid, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidgi geb an gutapbaloed.
Degine, Jesús nog susgua, dog-nuedye sogsad-sorba, sogded: —We be gobmar, na be mimmimar.
Ar an bemarga soged, emigindi uva-nisdi we-sorba bar an gobosulid, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid-nonikidse geb an gobdapbaloed.
Geb degi Jesús madu susbar, dog-nuedye Bab Dummadga sogsagu, madu biske-biske imaksad. Geb degi e-sapinganga ukde, sogded: —We-madu an-san, bemar-ular uklegoed. Weyob bemar imakmaloed, adi angi bemar binsamalagar. Jesús na e-sapinganmala we-madu guchamarsunnad.
Madu imaksadyob, mas-guchamalad-sorba, Jesús uva-nis imaksabalid. Jesús nog susgua, sogded: —We-uva-nis, an-abe. An-abe Bab Dummad dulemarbo igar-bini-mesnaid-wilubganad. We-an-abe bemar-ular milegoed.
Ar emigindi, dule-darba-an-ukoeddi we-mesagi an-abargi simogad.
Napira an bemarga soged, ani Dule-Machi, ar igi Bab Dummad bato epenne angi sogsa-gusa, ar deyob an guoed, an burgoed. ¡Ar dule-darba-an-ukoeddina nue wilegoed!
Geb degi e-sapingan na muchub-muchub sogdemalad: “Wede doa darba Jesús-uko-dibeye.”
Jesús-sapingan na muchub-muchub gaarmalad, ar doa bur emarba dummad guo-dibeye.
Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: “Reymar-neggwebur-semamaid, amar dulemargi bur-dule-dummad na san-imak-daed, degisoggu, bela ega ibmar imakbi abe-damarsunnad. Dule-neggwebur-semaid, nued ibmar-imakmaye-nik sogle-daed.
Ar bemardi deyob guosurmalad, bemar dummadid, na dule-bipigwadyob na san imakoed. Be dulemar-iduedile, na be baigan-maiyob gumaloed.
Ar ¿doa bur dule-dummad-sunna, dule mesa-naba-sigedi, igi, dulemar mesa-naba-simaladga mas-dakedi? Dule-mesa-naba-siid, ¿a bur-dule-dummadsursi? Deyobdo. Ar an bemar-dummad-inigwele, bemar-abargi bemar-maiyob an gudiid.
“An-wilubdakleged-abargi bemarbi galakussuli anba be gudimalad.
Degisoggu, igi Bab Dummad, ega neg seega, an nug imaksa, deyob ani, an bemar-nug-imakmogad, adi bemar neg-semogagar.
Adi bemar an-neg-dakmaidgi an-mesagi mas gunnegar, degi, gobegar, degine, olo-gan-nuedgi-sii Israel-dorgan-sogambe-gakabogwadga igar-nabosii bemar gumalagar.”
Dummad-Jesús sogdebalid: —Simón, Simón, be dake, igi madubur-gwagwaled-e-uka-miega omukulege, deyob nia-saila-Satanás bemar-imakega bemar-egichis-gudiid, adi iskuedgi be-egwanegar.
Ar andi bega Bab Dummadse gochad, adi ulubgi be an-bensulid mer galakuegar. Gannar mag-neg-ito be anse aibilisale, be-gwenadgan be oganno nao, adi gatik anba nagumalagar.
Pedro, Jesús-abin sogded: —Dummad, an guagwar gudiid an beba naegar, unnila eskaryasebisur, ar burgweye soger, amba an ginbalid.
Jesús, abin sogded: —Pedro, an bega soged, gannir-namaked-iduar ilapaa be an-osulogoed.
Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: —Deun sagu suli, mani-seed-sagu suli, degi, sapat suli an be-barmismargu, ¿bemarga ibmar akusmala? Jesús-abin, sogdemalad: —Suli, unniguar anmar ibmar-nika-gudigusmalad.
Degi Jesús sogdebalid: —Emigindi, dule sagu-nikad na sedo, degi, mani-urbed-sagu sedbalo. Ar dule espunyar sulile, na e-suba uko, adi espunyar a-manigi bakegar.
Ar an bemarga sogmalad, ar angi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid, amba a-sogedba guer-gebed, sognaid: Dulemar iskudimaladyob imaklesmoye. Is. 53:12 Jesús sogdebalid: —Ar weyob angi narmakar naid, ayob guer-gebed.
Geb degi e-sapingan sogded: —Dummad, anmar espunyar-warbo nikmalad. Jesús, abin-sogded: —We unniguar.
Jesús mas-gunsiid-neggi nodgua, nade-gusad, bia gusgu Olivos-yarse nad-daedse. E-sapingan eba nade-gusmarmogad.
Emar-nadapidse warmaksamargu, Jesús e-sapinganga sogde: —Bemar Bab Dummadse gormar, adi iskuedgi wilubdakleged mer bemarse warmakmalagar.
Jesús na e-sapingangi banguded, nabir-akwa-mileged bangued-wilub. Agi yokorgi sindigar sigisgu, Bab Dummadse goted,
sogded: “Baba, an-idu igar-buled naid, ina-gaibid gobedyob beedse an egi wilegoed. Be anga osulobiele, be osulogo, ar degite an-sogedbarsur, unnila be-sogedbarbi be imakoed.”
Geb degi anger-wargwen-nibalid ese magarononikid, Jesús-ogannogegar.
Ar Jesús bela-bela nue-surbinsa-itogusgu, bur-bule Bab Dummadse gorsigisad. E-wimakedi abeyob napase dedemaknai-gusad.
Jesús Bab-Dummadse-gorsiid gwisgusgu, e-sapingan-bukwadse nonikid, daknonikid, bukib-binsamaladba gabmamai.
Jesús amarga sogded: —¿Ar ibiga bemar gabmamai? Bemar gwisgumar, Bab Dummadse gormar, adi iskuedgi wilubdakleged mer bemarse warmakmalagar.
Jesús amba e-sapinganga sunmakgwichi, dulemar-bukidar ese duurmaknonikid, Judas, e-ambe-gakabogwad-wargwen, a emar-idudanikid. A-dule Jesússe warmaknonigu, ei-wagar unoni ega sogegar, be nued sogeye.
Degi Jesús ega sogded: —Judas, ¿wegi wagar-uar ani Dule-Machi, darba be an-uke?
Jesúsba-gudimalad dakdegu, igi igargan gudagoe, Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Dummad, ¿anmar espunyargi dulemar-eware?
Jesús amba yo abin-imake, e-sapin-wargwen dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad-e-mai naibi-imaksad, e-uaya-nuedsikid ei siksad.
Geb degi Jesús ega sogded: —Mer ese be bar achae. ¡Be indake! Jesús dule-uaya ebusgu, dule-onudaksad.
Degi Jesús dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganga, suar-ibmala-Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-dakmalad-e-dummaganga, degi, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan-ese-nonimaladga sogded: —¿Ibiga bemar dule-iskana-ibmar-atursaedyob an-gadanimala, emide espunyar, degi, suarmar-yalaba bemar an-gadanimargu?
Bane-bane an bemar-abargi Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi gudigusgu, agi bemar akar gwen an-imaksasurmalad. Ar emigindi bemarga wilubgan nonikid, degi, nia-sogedba ibmar-imaked-iba nonibalid, adi bemar an-gamalagar. Geb degi Jesús-gasmarsunnad.
Dulemar Jesús-gasmargu, sesmalad, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-goled-bur-dummad-negse. Agine, Pedro bannabasaar Jesúsba nadap-gusad.
Degi suar-ibmala neg-imba-abargi soo-ogasmargu, a-dikarba sigismarsunnad. Pedro amar-abargi signonimogad.
Bunagwa-arbaed, Pedro soo-naba sii dakargu, nuu dakdegu, sogded: —We-dule amba Jesúsba gudigusmogad.
Ar Pedrodi osuloded, sogded: —Bunagwa, we-dule aku an daked.
Degi Pedro sikwas-ichee-naded-sorba, dule-baid Pedro-dakarbargu, ega sogdemogad: —Be-dule amba Jesús-sordamogad. Pedro, abin-sogded: —Dule, an a-sordasuli.
A-wachi-irgwen-nasad-sorba dule-baid sogdemogad: —Napiragwa, we-dule Jesúsba gudigusmogad, ar we Galilea-dolad.
Geb degi Pedro sogded: —Dule, an wichuli ibu be anga obare. Geb degi, Pedro amba sunmakgwichi yog gannir namakalid.
Geb degi Dummad-Jesús, Pedro-dakdegu, Pedro, ebinsaas-naded, igi Jesús ega ibmar sogsad: “Gannir-namaked-iduar ilapaa be an-osulogoed.”
Degi Pedro magaba nodgu, nue-ise-boar naded.
Dulemar, Jesús-mer-wakinnega-edarbebukmalad Jesúsgi dodoarmalad, degi, Jesús-sarsoarmarbalid.
Ei-ibya edichamargu, wagargi bibyos-damalad, geb ese egichiar-damalad: —Ar bela be ibmar wissoggu, be anmarga soge, ¿doa be-bibyossunna? Jesúsdi dulemar-gwen-abin-imaksasulid.
Degine, dulemar Jesús-nug-ichoegala bukidar egi sunnasur sunmakdemarbalid.
Neg-oibosgu, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan-neggwebur-sedimalad, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, escribamar ambikunonimalad, geb degi igar-nabiromalad-negse Jesús-senonimalad. Geb agi egichiarmalad:
—¿Be Cristo, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule? Be anmarga soge. Jesús, amar-abin sogded: —Ar an bemarga sogdele, be an-itossurmalaled.
Deginbali, an bemarse egichidele, bemar an-abin imaksasurmalaled, degine, be an-onossurmarbaliled.
Ar emigindi, ani Dule-Machi, Bab-Dummad-Gangued-Nikad e-argan-nuedsik sigidapsunnoed dummadga guegar.
Bela sogdemalad: —¿Ar degisoggu, be Bab-Dummad-Machisunde? Jesús, abin-sogded: —Ar bemar-soged an aaye.
Geb degi sogdemalad: —¿Ar ibiga dule-baid anmarga Jesúsgi bar ibmar-sogbi an abemarsunna? Ar anmar-sunnad an itosmalad na dukin sogsad, ede Bab-Dummad-Machiye. Degisoggu, we-Jesús-oburgwileger-gebed.
Geb degi bela-dulemar-igar-itobukmalad ainidmargu, Pilatose Jesús-sesmarsun, adi ega igar-itogegar.
Geb degi Judio-dummagan Jesúsgi sognai-guarmalad, sogdemalad: —We-dule anmar itosad, dulemar-binsaed gadii, sogdii, mer Roma-Dummad-Césarga mani ukoye. We-Jesús na dukin sogdiid, ede reyye, ede Cristoye.
Geb degi Pilato Jesússe egichialid, ega sogded: —¿Ar be Judiomar-E-Rey? Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Ar bede soged.
Degine, Pilato sogded, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganga, degi, dulemar-bukmaladga: —An dakgua, we-dule ibmar-gwen-oakalossur an daked.
Ar emar bur-bule sogdemalad: —We-Jesús dulemar-oimakdiid, bela Judea-yalaganba dulemar-odurdakdiid, Galilea-akar onoalid, emide wesegus naigusad.
Geb degi Pilato itoargu, dulemar soge, Galileaye, egisdesunnad: —¿We-dulede Galileaginedi?
Pilato itoargu, Herodes-neg-dakmaidgi Jesús daniki, Herodesse barmissunnad. Ar ade deun Herodes Jerusalén-neggweburse gudimogad.
Herodes, Jesús-dakargu, weligwar itosad, ar ade dikasurgus Jesús-dakbigudiid. Herodesde itodiid, dulemar bukidar Jesús-ibmar-imakdiidgi sunmake. Degisoggu, Herodes binsadsunnad, Jesús e-wagab ibmar-dakledisulid ega imako insaye.
Herodes ibmar-bukidar Jesússe egisnai-gualid, ar degite Jesús gwen Herodes-abin imaksasulid.
Degine, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, escribamar Herodesga Jesúsgi binnasur sunmaknanai-guarmalad.
Geb degi Herodes, na e-suar-ibganmala, Jesús ibgwensur dakded, egi dododed, reymar-mor-nued-yoedyob, ega yosmarsunnad. Geb degi Herodes Pilatose gannar Jesús-barmisad.
A-ibagine Pilato, degi, Herodes-ebo ailesad, ar ade iduardi ebo urwedimalanad.
Geb degi Pilato, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganse, neg-semamaidse, degi, bela-dulemarse gochagu,
amarga sogded: —We be-anga-senonimalad, be anga sognonimalad, we neg-oimakdiiye. Ar bemar-wagab an ese bela ibmar egichisgu, gwen an daksulid, we neg-ichodiid. Deginbali, egi-be-sunmakmalad gwen deyob an daksurbalid.
Ar Herodesse-bakar, an ese barmisgu, Jesús gwen ibmar oakalossuli daksamogad. Ar degisoggu, Jesús ibmar-iskana-gwen-imaksasursoggu, oburgwilege-wilubsulid.
Degisoggu, an nue odurdaksad-sorba an we-dule-onogodo.
Ar ibagi Pilatode gusgu igar-maidba dule-wargwen-eskaryagi-mellesiid ono-daed.
Ar dulemar-bukidar-bukwaddi bela dule-wargwennayob oimakdemalad, sogdemalad: —¡We-Jesús be oburgwe, Barrabás be anmarga bur onoge!
We-Barrabásde eskaryagi-mete-gusmalad, ar ade Jerusaléngi, Roma-dulemargi gwisgusgu, neg-oimakdigu, dule-oburgwisad.
Pilato Jesús-onobiedba idu-sogsadgii gannar dulemarga sogdebalid.
Ar dulemardi gannar oimakdemarbalid: —¡We-dule nakrusgi bioke! ¡We-dule nakrusgi bioke!
Geb Pilato gannar ilapaagi dulemarga sogdebalid: —¿Ar degite, we-dulede ibu-ibmar-iskana wede imaksasunna? An dakgua, ibmar-iskana gwen imaksasursoggu, oburgwilege-wilubsulid. Degisoggu, unnila an odurdakodo, geb degi an onosunnoed.
Ar emardi binnasur oimakdemalad, sogdemalad: —¡We-Jesús nakrusgi bioke! Ar degite, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, dulemar-oimakbukwad-sogedba bur imaklesad.
Geb degi Pilato dulemar-egisbukwadba imaksasunnad, Jesúsga nakrusgi-oburgwed-igar mesissunnad.
Dule Roma-dulemargi gwisgusgu, neg-oimakdii dule-oburgwisad-ular, eskaryagi mellesiid, a-dule Pilatose egichismalad ega onoye, a ega onossunnad. Geb Jesúsdi suar-ibmalaga uksasunnad, adi dulemar na igi Jesús imakbiedba imakmalagar.
Roma-suar-ibgan Jesús-sesmargu, dule-wargwen Simón-nugad, Cirenegined, Jerusalénse-dani abinguarmalad. A-Simón ise-gandikidgi gasmargu, e-gukingi nakrus mesismalad, adi Jesús-sorba nakrus-semai-guegar.
Dulemar-bukidar Jesús-sorba duurmaknadap-gusmalad. Omegandi ee bonadap, Jesúsga oimaknadap-gusmalad.
Ar Jesús omegansik aibiridgua, amarga sogded: “Omegan-Jerusalénginmalad, mer anga be bomar, na dukin be bomar, degi, be mimmiganga be bomar.
Ar ade ibagan-bulegan nonikoed, sognonimaloed: ‘Omegan-geg-mimmi-nikumalad, we-omegan-gusgu-geg-muu-neggi-gurgin-nikumalad, gwen-mimmigan-onussurmalad, we-omeganga bur ib-nuedga gusye, ar ade we-omegandi na-e-mimmiganba gwen wilegosulid.’
Geb degi dulemar sabsur-wilenaidba Yarmarga sogdamaloed: ‘Anmargi bur be batedamar.’ Degi yar-mulluganaga sogdamarbaloed: ‘Bur be anmar emurmar.’ Os. 10:8
“Sapi-dinnagwad bur-bule sapi-makidba gummaked, ar deyobmodo, ar yaisur an wiomalale, ar dulemar-iskudimalad-bursunna, bur-bule wiomalodo.”
Suar-ibgan dulemar-iskanamar-warbo Jesúsba semai-gusmarbalid, oburgwemalagar.
Dule-Nonogarye neg-nugadse omosmargu, agi nakrusgi Jesús-bioksamalad. Dulemar-iskanamar-warbogwad nakrusgi bioksamarmogad. Wargwen Jesús-nakrus-argan-nuedsik ogwichismalad, baiddi, Jesús-nakrus-argan-sapiledsik.
Degi Jesús sogded: —Bab Dummad, wemar iskunaisuliyob be dakoed, ar wichurmalad ibu imaknanai. Degi, suar-ibgan Jesús-morgi dodoarmalad, wilubdaknai-guarmalad, igid-mor emargadga guo-dibeye. A-sorba Jesús-mor mimmismarsunnad.
Degine, dulemar-bukidar dakbukwa-gusmalad, neggwebur-dakmamaidse-bakar Jesúsgi dodonai-gusmalad, sogdemalad: —We-Jesús dule-baigandi nabir bendaksad. Ar we Cristole, Bab Dummad susadile, na dukin bendakdo.
Amba suar-ibgan Jesúsgi dodonanai-gusmarmogad, inna-gaibid ega senonimalad, ega uknonimalad,
ega sogdemalad: —Ar be Judiomar-E-Reyle, na be dukin bendakdo.
Jesús-nakrus-birgi narmakar nai-gusbalid, Griego-gakaba, Latínba, degi, Hebreoba. Sognai-gusad: WE-DULE, JUDIOMAR-E-REY.
Dule-iskana-wargwen, Jesús-dikarba-nakrusgi-biokar-naimogad, egi dodonai-gusmogad, ega sogded: —Ar be dule-Bab-Dummad-yoedse-barmidagoye-sogsad-dulele, na be dukin bendakdo, degine, be anmar-bendakmodo.
Agine, nakrusgi-biokar-naid-baid Jesúsgi-dodonaid-abin-imakded, ese uluded, ega sogded: —¿Ar be we-Jesús sunnaa burgwe sognai-inigwele, degite be Bab-Dummad-dobsuli?
Ar anmardi napiragwadba wilenaid, ar anmar ibmar-imaksadba odurdaklenaid. Ar wedi, ibmar-iskana gwen imaksasulid.
Geb degi Jesúsga sogded: —Reyga-mai be-neg-dakmaidgi na-be-danikir, be an-insao.
Geb degi Jesús, abin-sogded: —Napira an bega soged, emi-ibagi nibneg-nued-naidgi be anba gudiguoed.
Degine, yorukugusgua, bela napneggi neg-sichid-nagusad, wachi-irbaase naigusad.
Degine, dad-ibeler gwen-bar-gassulid. Jerusaléngi Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi, Neg-Islidikid-irwa mor-naid, negabar achirmakde-gusad.
Geb degi Jesús binnasur gotegu, sogded: —Baba, be-argangi an-san-burba an uksun. Degi-sogsad-sorba, Jesús burkwis naded.
Roma-sordamar-dulatar-sediid, weyob-ibmar-gusad daksagu, Bab-Dummad-nug ogannoded, sogded: —Ar we-dule ibmar-gwen-oakalossulid, dule-nued-sunnadid.
Bela dulemar-bukidar, Jesús nakrusgi-burgwenaid-dakbukmalad, bela we-ibmargan-gusad daksamargu, bukib-binsamaladba, na dukin binasgargi na sarsonanai negse nadmalad.
Ar bela Jesús-mag-dakmaladdi, degi, omegan, Galilea-akar-eba-bipirmakdimaladdi dikasur we-ibmar-gunaid dakbukwa-gusmalad.
Deun Judio-igar-nabiromalad-wargwen, José-nugad mai-gusmogad. A-dulede Arimatea-neggweburginedid, Judea-yala-dolad. A-José dakleargu, dule-nued, dule-igar-napiragwadba-daed-duled.
We-dulede, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid nue edarbedimogad-duled. Josédi, Jesús-oburgweye sogsamaladba gwen naigussulid, degine, emar-ibmar-imaksamaladba gwen akassurbalid.
We-dulede Pilatose nade-gusad, Jesús-mui egisdapid.
José, Jesús-nakrusgi-burgwar-naid odesgu, atued-sipugi nue obipirmaksad. Geb degi José akwa-gwisar neg-uanga-siid-yaba, yo-dule-egi-diglegedgi Jesús-mesisad.
Deun a-ibagi Ibmar-Guagwar-Sied-Ibad, bato obunnoged-iba warmakdanikid.
Omegan Galilea-akar-Jesúsba-danigusmalad, José-Arimatea-sorba nade-gusmalad, daksamalad neg-uan bia siid, degi, daksamarbalid, igi Jesús-digles mesismalad.
Omegan gannar aibilismargu, ina-biseb-wawaad, degine, gwallu-wawagwad-nuegan guagwar urbismalad, adi Jesús muigi eonamalagar. Geb degine, omegan obunnoged-ibagi obunnosmarsunnad, igi Moisés-ega-igar-mesisadba.
Itoged-iba-gebe-nagudedgi, wakudaryalaba omegan-baiganmala neg-uanse nadmalad, gwallu-wawagwad-guagwar-imasmalad sesmalad.
Omegan neg-uanse nonimargu, daknonimalad, akwa-dummad bato ainirar sii.
Neg-uanse dogdemargu, dakdemalad Bab-Jesús-e-san sate.
Jesús-mui-satedbali omegan aku itobukmaladgi, wede igi gusa, agi machergan-warbo, mola-sibu-ise-dakar-dakar-gaed-yoimalad ese gwisgunonimalad.
Ar omegan dobe itodmarsoggu, napase dulluu atakdemarsunnad. Machergan-warbogwad omeganga sogded: —¿Ar ibiga bemar dulemar-burgwarmalad-abargi dule-dula-gudiid be amidimarsunna?
Jesús wegi maisulid, ar bato gannar durgusad. Jesús amba Galileagi gudigu, igi bemarga sunmaksa, a be insamala.
Deun Jesús bemarga sogsa-gusmargu: ‘Ani Dule-Machi, dulemar-iskudimaladse an ukleger-gebed, nakrusgi an biokleger-gebed, degi, ibapaagi gannar an durguer-gebed.’
Degi geb omegan insaas-naded, Jesús weyob ibmar sogsad.
Omegan-neg-uanse-gudimalad nonimargu, e-ambe-gakagwensakad Jesús-nuggi-barmilesmaladga, degi, bela-baiganga, sogdemalad, Jesús gannar durgusad.
We-omegan gaya-burba-nued Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilearmaladga sognonimalad wemardo: María-Magdalena, Juana, María, Santiago-e-nan, degi, omegan-baigan-eba-gudimalad.
Ar Jesús-nuggi-barmilesmaladdi omegan-emarga-ibmar-soged binsa ee gordimaladyob daksamarsoggu, bengudmalad.
Ar Pedrodi gwisgudgu, neg-uanse abarmakde gusad. Neg-uan mosgu, yaba atakdegu, atuedbi bukwa daksad. Ar Pedro weyob-ibmar-gusad geger dake, negse nade-gusad.
Degine, amba a-ibagi Jesúsba-nanaimalad-warbo Emaús-neggweburse nadap-gusmalad. A-neggwebur Jerusaléngi wachi-irbo-nanalegedgi egi siid.
Ebo na sunmaknadap-gusmalad bela wemar-ibmarmar gusadgi.
Ebo na sunmaknadapmargu, na muchub-muchub na ese egisnadapmargu, Jesús-sunnad ese warmaknonikid, eba nadap-gusmogad.
Ar wemar-warbogwad e-ibya bargalesad, adi mer Jesús mag-dake-gumalagar.
Jesús amarga sogded: —¿Wede ibigi bemar sunmaknadapi, degine, ibiga bemar bukib-itomala?
Emar-gwensak, Cleofas-nugad, abin-imakdegu ega sogded: —¿Ar unnila bebi-wargwennaa dule-gwapid Jerusaléngi bela emi-ibagangi ibmarmar-gusad wichulid gudiisi?
Geb Jesús, abin-sogded: —¿Ibu-ibmala? Geb abin-imakdemalad: “Jesús-Nazaretginedgi bela ibmarmar gusad. We-Jesús Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged, gandikidba nued Bab-Dummad-asabin, degi, dulemar-asabin ibmar-saed, degi, gandikidba-sunmaked-dulebalid.
Degine, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, anmar-neggwebur-dakmamaid Roma-dummadga Jesús-uksamalad, adi oburgwemalagar. Geb degine, nakrusgi Jesús-bioksa-gusmarbali.
“Ar anmardi we-Jesúsgi binsadii-gusad, we-dule Israel-dulemar-abonogoedye. Ar emigindi, ibapaagus we-igargan deyob-gusad-akalad.
“Ar omegan-anmar-abargi-bipirmakdimogad, amba yo-nue-neg-ibgued-idu neg-uanse nade-gusmalad. A-omegan geger-ito anmar-imaksad.
Ar ade Jesús-san neg-uangi gwen mai daksasurmarsoggu, anmarga sognonimalad, emarde ibya apurusmarye, angermar-daksamarye. A-angermar ega sogsamarye, Jesús dula gudiiye.
“Degine, anmar-sordamar neg-uanse nade-gusmalad, ar igi omegan sogmala, deyob dakdapmalad, ar Jesúsdi gwen daksasurmalad.”
Geb degi Jesús amar-warbogwadga sogded: “Bemar non-sered gumar, degine, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad-sogsamalad-bengumalad-dulemarbalid.
¿Ar Cristode bela-bela e-nug-odunguleged-iduar weyob wileger-gebsursi? Eye, deyob wileger-gebed.”
Geb Jesús sogdebar, Moisés sogsad narmakar naidgi, degine, bela Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbesmalad sogsamaladgi, degi, bela Bab-Dummad-Gardagi egi sognaidgi. Amar-warbogwadga Jesús bela sogsa-gusad.
Na neggwebur-nadapmaladse warmaksamargu, Jesúsdi yamo-imaksad edi nadegu saoeyob.
Ar emar-warbomalad Jesúsgi ise-alamaknai gusmalad, ega sogdemalad: —Bato neg-sedosgussoggu, neg-mutikgualid, degisoggu, anmarba be besun. Degisoggu, Jesús, emarba bessunnad.
Geb degi Jesús emar-abargi mesa-naba sii, madu susad, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsagu, madu biske-biske imaksad, geb emarga uksasunnad.
Geb degi e-warbogwad mag-Jesús-dakdemalad. Geb agi Jesúsdi egi binnidsunnad, gwen bar daksasurmalad.
Geb degi ega na muchub-muchub sokarmalad: —¿Ar igarba danigu, anmarga Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sunmakdanigu, anmar-gwagede nue-weligwar itodani-gussursi?
Wemar-warbomalad a-wachigi yoga gwisguar imaksamalad, gannar Jerusalénse ali-gusmalad. Jerusalénse nonimargu, e-ambe-gakagwensak Jesús-nuggi-barmilesmalad, degi, baigan-eba-bukmarmogad danar-bukwa daknonimalad,
sogbukmalad: —Ar Dummad-Jesús nue gannar durgusye, Simónse Jesús na magarosye.
Geb degi emar-warbogwad amarga sogdesun, igi igarba gusmala, degine, igi Jesús madu bichidgu, emar mag-Jesús-daksamala.
Jesús-sapingan amba we-ibmargangi sunmakbukmala, Jesús emar-abargi gwisgunonikid, emarga sogded: —¡Na, degite! Bemar, gwage bogidikidgi gudigumarsun.
Jesús-sapingandi gwakidmargu, dobgudmalad, sergan-dakye binsadmalad.
Ar Jesúsdi amarga sogded: —¿Ar ibiga bemar dobe itomarsunna, degine, ibiga deyob bemar ulubgi binsamarsunna?
An-argan, degine, an-mali bemar dakmar. Be an-ebumar, adi bemar mag dakmalagar an-sunnad an gudiid. Ar burbadi sana, degine, garmar sulid, ar andi sana, degi, garmar nikad. Be an-dakmalana.
Ar degi-soggwichi, ega e-argan, degi, e-mali oyoded.
Ar e-sapingandi weligwaledba Jesús-durgusad bengudmalad, geger dakdemalad. Degisoggu, Jesús amarga sogdesunnad: —¿Ar bemar mas-gunned wis nikmala?
Geb degi e-sapingan ua-naraled bisgar, degi, achanis ega uksamalad.
Jesús na e-sapingan-annik susgua, amar-asabin, ua, degi, achanis, guchad.
Jesús amarga sogded: —Ar bela-angi-gusad we-ibmarmargi an bemarga bato sunmaksamalad, deun amba an bemar-abargi gudigu. Ar bela angi narmakar-naidba guer-gebed, igi Moisés-igargi, degi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad-narmaksamalad, degi, Salmosgi narmakar-naidba bela angi deyob guer-gebed.
Geb degi Jesús na e-sapingan magar-itoged imaksad, adi mag itomalagar, igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi-narmakar-naid nue sognai.
Jesús amarga sogded: “Weyob-narmakar-naid, a-narmakar-naidba Cristo-wileger-gebed, degi, burgwar-mai ibapaagwad-sorba gannar durguer-gebed.
Degine, bela we-napneggi neggweburmar-nanaidgi Cristo-nuggi sunmakleger-gebed, dulemar na e-iskuedga bukib itoged, adi e-daed ogwamalagar, degi, Bab Dummad dulemarga iskued elinoni-daed igargi. We-igargan-sunmakleged Jerusalén-akar onodoed.
Ar bemar-sunnad we-igargan angi gusad daksamarsoggu, baiganga bemar sogmarmosunnodo.
“Emide, an-Bab bemarga sogsa-gusad, an bemarga ukoye, a an bemarga barmidagoed. Jerusalén-neggweburgi be edarbemalo, nibneg-akar burba-gangued bemarse nonikoedse.”
Degi Jesús Jerusaléngi e-sapingan-bukwad-onosad, Betaniase sesa-gusad. Agi na e-argan niba onakwidgu, e-sapinganga sogded: —Bab Dummad bemargi nued binsaena-gadin.
Degine, Jesús na e-sapinganga degi-sunmakgwichi, egi nued binsasgu, banguded, degi, edi nibnegse nakwidsunnad.
E-sapingandi, Jesús-Bab-Dummadyob-daksadba e-nug ogannodmarsunnad, nue-weligwar gannar Jerusalénse aibirismarsunnad.
Ar emardi Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi gudigu-gusmalad, Bab-Dummad-nug ogannonai, degi, Bab Dummadgi nued binsabukwa gusmalad. Be itomargua.
Gebe-negasailaunni bato Gaya-Burba-Nued gudiid, we-Gaya-Burba-Nued Bab Dummadba gudiid, degi, we-Gaya-Burba-Nued, Bab Dummad gued.
We-a-Gaya-Burba-Nued, gebe-negasailaunni bato Bab Dummadba gudiid.
A-Gaya-Burba-Nued bela ibmar obinnisad. Ibmar-ambikunonikid, a-suli gwen ambikunonisulid.
A-Gaya-Burba-Nuedgi san-burba-dulad gudiid, we-a-san-burba-dulad dulemarga gwallu-meegwadga-gued.
Gwallu-meegwad neg-sichid mee imaked, degine, neg-sichid gege gwallu-meegwadgi obined.
Bab Dummad dule-wargwen-barmiar-gusad, a-dule Juanye-nugad.
We-dule-nonikid gwallu-meegwad barsogega nonikid, adi bela dulemar a-gwallu-meegwad mer bengumalagar.
We-dule, Juan-nugad, a gwallu-meegwadsulid. Juan nonikidi, unnila gwallu-meegwad-barsogegalad.
We-gwallu-meegwad we-napnegse dani-gusad, napiragwadid. A-gwallu-meegwad bela dulemarga neg-mee-saed.
A-gwallu-meegwad we-napneggi gudigusad, ar we-napneg a-sogedba nagus-inigwele, degite, dulemar-we-napneggi-bukmalad aku daksamalad.
We-Gaya-Burba-Nued na e-dulemarse nonikinad, e-dulemar gwen abingassurmalad.
Ar bela dulemar a-Gaya-Burba-Nued-abingasmaladdi, e-nuggi-bengussurmaladba, amarga Bab Dummad igar-uknonikid, na e-mimmiganga-gued-igar.
A-Gaya-Burba-Nuedgi-bensurmalad, Bab Dummad Burba Nuedba gwalulenonimalad, dulemar-sogedbarsulid, dulemar-igarginsulid, dulemar-binsaedginsurbalid. Suli, degisuli. A-dulemar Bab-Dummad-sogedba E-Burba-Nuedgi gwalulenonimalad.
We-a-Gaya-Burba-Nued, anmargii sanale san-nika-gunonimogad, degine, anmar-abargi sanale gudigusmogad. Anmar e-gandik-gaed daksamalad, unnila Bab-Dummad-Machi-Wargwenna-Gued e-gandik-gaed. A-dule ibibayobi dulemar-sabgue-wilubsulinad, degite, nue dulemar-sabe nanadii-gusad, degine, igar-napiragwadgi nanadii-gusbalid.
Juan-Bautista a-dulegi sunmaksa-gusad, sogde-gusad, deun binnasur gote-gusgu: —We-dulegi an bemarga sunmaksa-gusmalad: Dule-wargwen an-sorba-danikoedi, we an-iduedid, ar we-inse an-idu gudiid.
Ar a-dule bela-bela anmargi nued binsamaisoggu, belagwapa ibmar-nikadba ibmar-nuegan anmarga ukmaiguad.
Ar Bab Dummad Moisésba dulemarga igar-mesisad, dulemar igi nanaer-gebe. Ar Bab-Dummad-anmargi-nued-binsaeddi anmarga uklege-wilubsulinad na e-anmarga-ukbiedba anmarga ukmaid, degi, igar-napiragwaddi Jesucristoba anmarga uknonikid.
Dule gwen Bab-Dummad-dakdisulid. Unnila Bab-Dummad-Machi-Wargwennagwad, na e-Babba-mesa gudiid, a anmarga Bab-Dummad-osanalononikid.
Juan-Bautista Jesúsgi sunmaksa-gusgu, weyob gusdo. Deunni Judiomar-dummagan Jerusalén-akar dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad, degi, a-bendakmalad-barmiar-gusmalad, Juanse egismalagar: —¿Be doa-dule-sunna?
Juan na dukin sogsa-gusad, gwen yapa sogsasulid: —Ani an Cristosur.
Degi gannar Juanse egichidmarbalid: —Degite, ¿be doa-dule-sunna? ¿Be Elías? Juan, abin-imaksad: —Suli, an a-dulesur. Juan-Bautistaga sogdemarbarsun: —Degite, ¿be Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged anmar edarbediiddi? Juan, abin-imakebar: —Suli, an a-dulesur.
Degi ega sogdemarsun: —Degite, ¿be doa-dule-sunna? Adi dummaganga anmar sogega, be doa-dule. Degite, ¿doa-duleye na be sogsunna?
Juan, abin-sogde-gus: —Isaías, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged sogsa-gusad: Dule-wargwen nega-dule-sulidganba binnasur sunmaknonikoed, dulemarga sognonikoed: Dule-Dummad-idu igar mayemar, igar-swilidik mesmar. Is. 40:3 Ani an a-duledo.
Dulemar-Juanse-barmilear-gusmaladi, Fariseo-sapingan gumalad.
Juanse egichiarmalad, ega sogdemalad: —¿Ar degite, ibiga be Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imakdisunna, ar bede Cristosulid, degi, Elíassurbalid, degine, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged anmar edarbediidsurbalid?
Juan, amar-abin imakdegu, sogsa-gus: —Andi Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar-imakedi, unnila digi an ogdiid, ar bemar-abargi dule-wargwen-gudiiddi aku be dakmalad.
A-dule an-sorba-danikidi, we an-iduedid. Ar anba bur dule-dummadsoggu, gege e-sapat-dub esik an itoged.
We degi-gusadi, bia Juan Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaknai, Jordán-diwar-obakar, Betania-neg-nugadgi, agi deyob gusa-gusdo.
A-banedgine, Juan Jesús-ese-dani dakargua, sogded: —Be dakmalana, we-dule, Bab-Dummad-Sibad-Wawaad-E-Mimmid, bela dulemarga-we-napneggi-iskued osulogedid.
We dule-nik an sogsa-gusad: ‘Dule-wargwen an-sorba danikid, ar a-dule an-iduedid, ar ade a-inse an-idu gudiid.’
Aku a-dule an dakmoganad. A-ulale, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar an imaknonikid, adi Israel-dulemar mag dakega, doa Bab-Dummad-epenne-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule.
Juan Jesús-nik sogsa-gusbalid: —Nibneggi Bab Dummad Burba Nued nuuyobi aidedani, degi, a-dulegi nagunoni an daksad.
An aku a-dule-dakmoganad, ar Bab Dummad digi-ogleged-igar-imakega an-barmialid, a anga sogsad: ‘Dule-wargwengi Bab Dummad Burba Nued aidenoni, degi, egi nagunoni be daksale, we a-duledo, Bab Dummad Burba Nuedgi dulemar-ogoed-duledo.’
We deyob an daksad, degisoggu, nue an sogsundo, we-dule, Bab-Dummad-Machi-sunnadye.
A-banedgine, gannar Juan-Bautista, degine, e-sapingan-warbo walik gudiid,
dakarmalad, Jesús e-walik gudii. Juan sogded: —Be dakmalana, we-dule, Bab-Dummad-Sibad-Wawaad-E-Mimmid.
Juan-e-sapingan-warbogwad degi-soge itosgu, Jesúsba nade-gusmalad.
Jesús sorba atakdegu, dule-warbogwad-eba-dani dakargu, amarga sogded: —¿Ibu be amimala? Amar, abin-sogdemalad: —Rabí, ¿Bia be mai? (Rabí sogleged, odurdaked-sailaye.)
Jesús amarga sogded: —Bemar dagmar. Degi be dakmaloed bia an mai. Amar Jesúsba nade-gusmar, degi, daksamar bia Jesús maid. A-ibagi Jesús-walik osedosmalad, ar ade bato sedosad.
Emi dule-warbogwad Juan-sunmak-itosad, Jesúsba-nade-gusmalad, wargwen Andrésye-nugad, Simón-Pedro-e-urba.
Andrésde e-ia-Simón-inse aminaded. Simón-amisgu, ega sogded: —Anmar Mesías-amismalad. (Mesías sogleged, Cristo.)
Geb degi Andrés, e-ia-Simón Jesússe senonikid. Jesús, Simón-nuu-dakdegu, ega sogded: —Be Simón, Jonás-machi, emigindi Cefasye be nugguoed. (A sogledo, Pedro.)
A-banedgine, Jesús Galilease naesokargu, agi Felipe-dakar, ega sogded: —Anba be dage an-sapinga guegar.
Felipe, Betsaida-neggweburginedid. Andrés, degi, Pedro, a-neggweburginmarmogadid.
Felipe, Natanael-aminad. Amisgu, ega sogde: —Moisés e-igar-mesisadgi igi narmaksa, degi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad egi narmaksamarmoga, yoedse dule-wargwen danikoye, a-dule anmar amisad. A-dule, Jesús, José-machi, Nazaretginedid.
Natanael, abin-sogded: —¿Ar Nazaret-neggweburgi sunna ibmar-nued nodasi? Felipe, abin-sogde: —Be anba dage, adi be-sunnad be dakoed.
Jesús, Natanael-ese-warmakdani dakargu, Natanaelgi sogded: —Wedi Israel-dule-sunnadid, dule-nuedid, we-dule gwagegi emar-yardaked gwen naisulid-duled.
Natanael Jesúsga sogded: —¿Wede igi be an-wisi an deyobid? Jesús, abin-sogded: —Amba yo Felipe bese goleunni, deun sapi-higuera-urba amba be sigua, bato an be-daksad.
Natanael Jesúsga sogdesun: —Rabí, be Bab-Dummad-Machi, Israel-e-Rey-sunnadid, a-ular be an-wisid.
Jesús, abin-sogded: —An bega sogsad, be higuera-sapi-urba sii an be-daksaye, ¿a-ular be an-bensuli? Weba bur-bule ibmar-dummagan be dakoed.
Jesús Natanaelga sogdebar: —Napira an bega soged, emi-onodedgi nibnega argas, Bab-Dummad-e-angermar nakwemai, degi, aidemai Dule-Machigi be dakoed.
A-ibapaagwad-sorba Galilea-yargi, Caná-neggweburgi dule-wargwen ome-niku-sokalid. A-ibagi Jesús-e-nan sii-gusmogad.
A-ibagi Jesússe, degi, e-sapinganse, dule-ome-niku-sokalid gochamogad, a-ibase dagegar.
Ibagi vino emarga galadgua, Jesús-e-nan Jesúsga sokar: —Vino emarga bergud.
Jesús, e-nan-abin sogded: —¿Omegwa, ibiga deyob be anga soge? An-ibagan amba yo warmaked.
Jesús-e-nan, neg-ibed-e-maiganga sokar: —Jesús, ibi imakye bemarga sokalile, a-sogedba bela be imakmalo.
Deun mete-akwa-gwanergwa dii-siega sii-gusad, ar igi Moisés-igar-mesisadba Judiomar na nudakega ebumala. A-mete-gwagwengi sunna galón-dulagwen-wilub, igi, galón-dulagwen-gakambe-wilub-dibe, dii siged.
Jesús maimarga sogded: —Bela metemar digi enomar. Bela nue-ena mete digi enosmarsun.
Geb Jesús amarga sogdebar: —Emigi dii be wemar, dule-iba-sailaga-gusiidse be sedmar. Degi ase sesmarsun.
Iba-sailaga-gusiid dii-vinoga-binnisad gobsagua, dule-ome-nikusiidse gochad. Iba-sailaga-gusiid wichulid bia vino daniki. Ar maigandi wisdo, ar ade emar na dii wesmalad.
Iba-sailaga-gusiid ome-nikusiidga sogded: —Bela dulemar vino-nued-insa mimmi-damalad, geb bukidargus-gobmalad-sorba vino-akusaaled mimmid-damalad. Ar bedi vino-nued sabos, geb be mimmialid.
Jesús we-ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad gebe Galilea-yargi, Caná-neggweburgi imaksa-gusad. Agi Jesús na e-gangued oyosad. Degine, e-sapingan Jesús-nue-bensuli-gunonimarsunnad.
We degi-gusad-sorbali, Jesús, e-nan, e-urbamar, degi, e-sapingan, Capernaumse nade-gusmalad. Agine, dogdar melu megissurmalad.
Deun Judiomar-iba, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba warmakdanikidgi, Jesús Jerusalénse nade-gusad.
Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse dogdapgu, dulemar-moli-ukmalad, sibad-wawaad-ukmalad, degi, nuu-ukmalad, ukbukwa dakdapid, degine, dulemar agi-mani-ogwabukwa dakdapbalid.
Degi Jesús ibmar-bibyoged-duba sobsagu, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi bela dulemar-ibmar-ukbukmalad-onosad, degi, sibad-wawaad, degi, molimar onisbalid, degine, dulemar-mani-ogwabukwad-e-mani midbalid, agine, e-mesamar ei obichabalid.
Jesús dulemar nuu-ukbukmaladga sogded: —¡We-ibmarmar bela be sedmar, melle an-Bab-nega ibmar-ukleged-negga be imakmar!
Degi Jesús-e-sapingan insad nadmalad, igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar nai: Be-nega an bina nue soged-ular, nue egi nobe an itoged. Sal. 69:9
Judiomar Jesús-abin imakdemalad, abin-sogdemalad: —¿Ibi-ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid be anmarga imakosunna, adi anmarse oyogegar Bab Dummad bega igar-uksad weyob be ibmar imakegar?
Jesús, abin-imakde, emarga sogded: —We-Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-siid be earmar, an ibapaagi gannar soboed.
Judiomar geb abin-sogdemarbar: —We-Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg birga-dulabo-gakanergwa soblenai-gusadde, emide, ¿bede ibapaagi gannar sobode? Geg be gue.
Ar Jesúsdi na e-sangi sunmaknaid, akwa-neg-sobaledgi sunmaknaisulid.
Ar degisoggu, Jesús burgwis gannar durgusgu, geb e-sapingan insaas-nadmalad we bato degi-sogsad. A-ular Jesús-e-sapingan Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid, degine, Jesús-ibmar-sogsad, nue ulubgi abingasmalad, gwen bengussurmalad.
Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibagi Jesús, Jerusaléngi gudigu, ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad imaksadba, bukidar Jesús-bensuli-gunonimalad.
Ar Jesúsdi bela dulemar-daed wissoggu, dulemar-bengusad, ar ade wisid dulemar eba nue naisulid.
Jesús dule-ega-ibmar-soged gwen abessulid, ar wisid dulemar ulubgi igi binsamala.
Dule-wargwen Fariseo-sorda, Nicodemo-nugadi, a-dule Judiomar-abargi nue-nug-nikaa gudigusad.
We-dulede mutik Jesússe nonikid, ega sognonikid: —Rabí, odurdaked-saila-dummad, anmar wisid, be Bab Dummadgi danikid, dulemar-odurdakegar. Ar dule gege ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad imaked, we Bab Dummad eba gudisulir.
Jesús, Nicodemo-abin imakde, ega sogded: —Napira an bega soged, dule gannar gwalulesulile, gege Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid daked.
Nicodemo Jesússe egisdesun: —¿Ar igi dule-sered gannar gwalulegosunna? ¿Ar sunna gannar gwalulegega e-nan-nukugi gannar megosi?
Jesús, abin-sogde: “Napira an bega soged, ar dule digi, degi, Bab Dummad Burba Nuedgi gwalulesulile, gege Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse doged.
Ar dule wegi-sanale gwalulesale, we sanaledgadid. Ar dule Bab Dummad Burba Nuedgi gwalulesardi, we burbaledgadid.
Degisoggu, mer geg be itoge, an bega soged: Be gannar gwaluleger-gebye.
“Burwa-goledi e-itoledba goled, unnila e-goledbi be itoged. Bia burwa danikiddi be wichulid, degi, be wichurbalid, bia nadapbali. Deyobmodo, dule Bab Dummad Burba Nuedgi gwalulesar.”
Nicodemo, Jesús-abin sogde: —¿Wede igi nue gusunna?
Jesús, Nicodemo-abin sogde: “Bede Israel-dulemar-odurdaked-sailadde, ¿we-igar amba be aku itode?
Napira an bega soged, anmar we-ibmar-wisidba sunmakmalad, anmar we-ibmar-daksadba an sogmalad, degite anmar ibmar-bega-sogedi yapa be abingamalad.
Ar ibmar-we-napneggined an bega sogsad, be benmalad, ar ¿igi be bengussurmalarsunna an bega ibmar-nibneggined sogdemalar? Be bengusmalaled.
“Dule nibnegse gwen nakwissulid, unnila Dule-Machibi nibneggi-mai aidenonikid.
“Igi Moisés nega-dule-sulidganba naibe-onakwis-gusa, debayobi, ani Dule-Machi, nakrusgi niba onailemogar-gebed.
Adi doa-dule angi bengusulile, mer yogguega, adi burba-geg-bergued angi nikuegar.”
“Ar Bab Dummad bela we-napneggi-dulemar-bukwad nue sabgussoggu, E-Machi-Wargwenna-Guedi barmialid, adi dulemar-iskued-anar burgwegar. Ar doa-dule Bab-Dummad-Machigi bensuli-gunonikile, burba-geg-bergued nikuoed, adi mer bar degi-sadegu sabsur odurdaklesii-guegar.
Ar Bab Dummad we-napnegse na E-Machi-barmiargu, dulemar-we-napneggi-bukmalad sabsur-odurdakega barmiarsulid. Na E-Machi-barmialid, adi dulemar-we-napneggi-bukmalad na E-Machigi abonolemalagar.
“Ar doa-dule Bab-Dummad-Machigi bensulile, we-dule sabsur odurdaklegosulid, ar dule benerdi, Bab-Dummad-Machi-Wargwennaa-Gued e-nuggi bengusad-ular bato adi sabsur-odurdakleged-igar ega megisdo.
“Bab-Dummad-Machi we-napnegse-nonikidba neg mee imaknonikid. Dulemar ibmar-iskana-imakmaladba, neg-sichid bur gwallu-meegwadba sabgusmalad. A-ular dulemar sabsur odurdaklegoed.
“Ar bela dulemar-ibmar-iskana-imakmaladi, gwallu-meegwad istar dakdamalad, gwalluse dagbisur-damalad, adi melle e-ibmar-iskana-imakdiid neg-meegwadse osanalolegegar. A sogledo, dulemar ibmar-iskana-imakmalad yapa Bab-Dummad-Machise dagdamalad, adi melle e-istar-daed mag daklegegar.
“Ar dule igar-napiragwad-imakdiiddina, gwalluse noni-damalad, adi na e-ibmar-imakdiid na oyogega, na Bab Dummadgi ibmar imakdiid.”
A-sorbali Jesús na e-sapinganmala Judea-yalase nonimalad, agi undar gudigusmalad, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaknai-gusad.
Deun Salim-walik, Enón-neg-nugadgi, Juan-Bautista Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaknai-gusmogad, ar ade agi dii wilarbad. Dulemar Juan-Bautistase noni-gusmalad, Bab-Dummad-digi-oglegegar.
Ar ade deun amba yo Juan eskaryagi melleged.
Agi Juan-sapingan Judiomar-ebo abin-abin imakarmalad, dule-swilidik-ibmar-imaked-igargi.
E-sapingan, Juanse nonimalad, ega sognonimalad: —Odurdaked-saila, dule Jordán-diwar-obakar beba gudigusad, egi nued be sunmaksad, a-dule Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaknaimogad, degine, dule-bukidar ese duurmaknadapmalad, degisoggu, be sordamar-sate guoed.
Juan, e-sapingan-abin imakdegu, sogded: “Ar dule gege ibmar-abingaed, ar nibneggi ega ibmar danisulir. A sogledo, ani Juan, degi, Jesús, anmar anbobela, Bab Dummad anmar-barmiarye. Ar Bab Dummad soger, Jesús anba bur dule-dummad guoye, ar deyob guodo.
Ar bemar-sunnad an itosmalad, an sogsagu: Ani an Cristosur, andi unnila e-idu-barmilealidid, ega igar-mayegar.
“Ar dule ome-nikunaidyobdo, dule-ome-nikunaid, a-ome a-dule-omega gunonikoed. Ar machered-e-aidi, e-dikarba gwichid, unnila sui-e-sunmaked itogwichid, weligwar itogwichid, sui ibmar soggwichid. Ar an dule-ome-nikunaid-e-aiyobmogad, emigindi nue an weligwar itomosundo.
Jesús bur nug-dungue-wilubbid, andi bur nug-bipii gue-wilubbid.”
Juan-Bautista sogdebar: “Ar Jesús-nibneggi-danikid bela dulemargi obined. Dule-napneggineddi, unnila napnegginedid, napneggined-ibmarbi sunmaked. Ar dule-nibneggi-danikiddi bela dulemargi obined.
“We dule-nibneggi-danikid nibneggi-ibmar-daksadba, degi, nibneggi-itosadba, sunmaked, degite, dulemar a-dule-gwen-itobisurmalad.
Ar dule, dule-nibneggi-danikid-sunmaked abingaele, we sognado, Bab-Dummad-ibmar-soged napiraye.
Ar Bab Dummad we-dule-barmiarsoggu, a-ular we-dule-nibneggi-danikid Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba sunmaked. Ar Bab Dummad na E-Burba-Nued ise-obinagwar uked, ise-wilubsaar uksulid.
“Ar Bab Dummad nue na Machi-sabsoggu, bela ibmar E-Machiga na uksasunnad.
“Ar doa-dule Bab-Dummad-Machi-bensuli-gunonikile, a-dule burba-geg-bergued nikuoed. Ar dule Bab-Dummad-Machigi bengunonikirdi, burba-geg-bergued gwen nikuosulid, agardi Bab Dummad dulemar-sabsur-odurdakoed-igar bato guar ega maid.”
Dummad-Jesús wisguar, Fariseomar itoarmarye dulemar sogdimarye: “Jesús, Juan-Bautistaba bur-bule dulemar-Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-imakdiiye, degi, bur-bule sapingan-nikbarye.”
(Ar Jesús Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imakdisulindo, e-sapingan imakdiinad.)
A-ular, Jesús Judeagi bangudsunnad, gannar Galilease nade-gusad.
Ase naegala, Samaria-yargi naer-gebed.
Samaria-yalase, neggwebur-Sicar-nugad-dikarse Jesús nonisun, bia dad-Jacob na e-machi-Joséga nainu-uksad-walik.
Agine Jacob-dia-akwisad siid. Jesús nanaedba yegussoggu, a-dia-dikarba sigisad, obunnogegar. Deun bato yoruku gusad.
Ome-wargwen, Samariagined, a-diase nonikid, dii suegar. Jesús a-omega sogded: —Anga be dii-gobed wis udage.
Ar ade Jesús-sapingan neggweburse naded, mas-bakegar.
Judiomar, degi, Samaria-dorgan na geg sunmakmarsoggu, ome-Samariagined, Jesús-abin sogded: —¿Ibiga bede Judio-duledde, andi ome-Samariaginedidde, anse be dii-gobed egise?
Jesús, abin-imakdegu, ega sogded: —Ar Bab-Dummad-ibmar-uked be wisina, degine, doa-dule bega soge: ‘Anga dii-gobed be udaye,’ be ese dii egisoenad, degine, na e bega ukoenad, dii-burba-nikad.
Ome, Jesús-abin sogded: —Dummad, be dii-weed-ibmar sated, degine, dia-yaa matusurbalid, degite ¿igi be dii-burba-nikadi onogosunna?
¿Ar bede anmar-dad-Jacobba bur dummadsi? Anmar-dad we-dia anmarga uksad, we-dii na gobsad, e-mimmigan, degi, e-molimar, we-dii gobsamarmogad.
Jesús, ome-abin imakde, sogded: —Ar doa-dule we-dii-gobsa-dibe, gannar uku-uku itobaloed.
Ar dii-an-ega-ukoed gobsardi, bar gannar uku-uku itogosulid. Ar dii-an-ega-ukoeddi, dii napa-urba aryomaiyobi, e-ulubgi megoed, adi burba-geg-bergued nikuegar.
Ome Jesúsga sogded: —Dummad, we-dii be anga udage, adi melle gannar bar uku-uku an itogegar, degine, adi melle gannar bar wese dii an wedagegarbar.
Jesús, abin-sogded: —Be nae, be-suise be gornae, degi, gannar be dagbaloed.
Ome, abin-imakde, sogded: —An sui sated. Jesús, abin-imakded: —Nabir be soged: ‘An sui sateye.’
Ar sui walatargus be nikued, emi sui be nikumaidi be-sui-sulid. Ar nabir be-sogsad.
Ome, Jesús-abin sogded: —Dummad, an be-dakgua, be Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged an be-dakdo.
Anmar-dadgan, Samaria-dulemar we-yargi Bab Dummadse gochamalad, e-nug odummogegar. Ar bemar-Judiomardi soged, Jerusaléngi, agi Bab Dummadse goler-gebye e-nug odummogegar.
Jesús omega sogded: —Omegwa, napira an bega soged, mer be an-bengu, ibagan dani, we-yarginsur, degine, Jerusalénginsurbar, be Bab Dummadse goloed e-nug odummogegar.
Bemar-Samaria-dulemar wichurmalad, doase gornai e-nug odummogegar, anmar-Judiomardi wismalad, ar doase gornai e-nug odummogegar, ar ade dulemar-abonoleged Judiomargi danikid.
Ar ibagan danikoed, emigindi ibagan nonisunnad, dulemar Bab Dummadse gollalile, nue burbar, degi, napiragwadgi ese gormaloed e-nug odummogegar. Ar Bab Dummad dulemar-degi-ese-goled amidimogad.
Bab Dummad, burbaled. Ar dule Bab Dummadse goledi, burbar, degi, napiragwadgi ese gormogar-gebed.
Ome, Jesúsga sogded: —An wisi, yoedse Mesías, dule-wargwen barmiledagoye soglesad, Cristo-nugad nonikoed. A-Cristo nonikile, a anmarga bela ibmar sognonikoed.
Jesús, ome-abin sogded: —Ani an a-duled, bebo sunmaksiid.
Agi e-sapingan nonikid, amar geger dakdemalad, Jesús, ome-ebo sunmaksiid, degi-inigwele, gwen ega sogsasurmalad: “¿Ibu omese be egissii? ¿Ibiga ome bebo sunmaksii?”
Degi ome e-gwidu-mete neggweburse nadsunnad. Neggweburse modapgu, macherganga sogdapid:
—Be dagmar, dule-wargwen bela-an-ibmar-imaksad-anga-sogsad be dakdamar, ¿abakalegi we-dule Cristo-sua?
Degi dulemar neggweburgi ainiarmargu, bela Jesússe nonimalad.
Degi-gunaigua, e-sapingan Jesúsgi wilenai-gusmalad, ega sognai-guarmalad: —Odurdaked-saila, wis mas be gungwele.
Jesús, abin-sogded: —Andi mas-gunned an nikad, ar a-mas-gunnedi bemar wichurmalad.
Degi e-sapingan na ega muchub-muchub sokarmalad: —¿Ar dule-wargwen mas-gunned ega senoni-sua?
Jesús, abin-sogded: “Dule-an-barmialidba ibmar-imaked, degi, a-e-arbaed-obeloged, a an-mas-gunnedid.
¿Ar bemarde sogsursi: ‘Amba nii-walabake napye ibmar-gwag-weed-iba?’ Andi an bemarga sogdo, nue be atakmar, nainu be dakmar, dulemar-bukidar-duurmakdanimalad, we-dulemar ibmar-gwagyobdo, weegala bato guagwar naid.
“Ar dule ibmar-gwag-weedgi arbaedi bennukledo, degine, ibmar-gwag-weoedi burba-geg-berguedga weoed, adi dule-ibmar-gwag-digedi, dule-ibmar-gwag-weed-ebo na wergumalagar.
“Ar we-ibmar-sogleged nue-napira sogleged: ‘Dule-gwensak ibmar-gwag-diged, dule-baid, ibmar-gwag-wee-daed.’
An bemar-barminanaid, bemar ibmar-gwaggi-arbassurmalad weega. Dule-baigan arbasmalad, bemar a-arbasadgi dogdemalad.”
Bukidar Samaria-dorgan, Sicar-neggweburginmalad Jesús-bengussurmalad, ar ade ome Jesúsgi sogdiid: “Bela an-ibmar-imaksad anga sogsaye.”
Degine, bukidar Jesússe Samaria-dorgan duurmaknonimalad, egi wilenagusmalad: “Anmar-walik be beeye.” Amar-walik Jesús ibabo megissunnad, dulemar-odurdakegar.
Jesús-ibmar-sogsadgi bur-ichesur Jesúsgi bengussurmalad, ome-ibmar-sogsadba.
A-ulale omega sokarmalad: —Anmar-Jesúsgi-bensulidi unnila be anmarga ibmar sogedginsulid. Ar anmar-sunnad itosmarmogad. Anmar nue-wisid, we-dule napneggi dule-iskubukmalad-abonoged-sunnadid, we-dule Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmiledagoye-sogsad-duled.
Jesús Sicar-neggweburgi ibabo megisad-sorbali, Samaria-yargi node-gusad, Galilease naegar.
Ar Jesús na e-sunnad sogsa-gusmogad: “Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbegedi na e-neggweburgi geg e-nug odummoleye.”
Jesús Galilease nonigu, Galilea-dorgan nued abingasmalad, ar ade ibase arbimarmosoggu, agi daksamalad, igi Jesús Jerusaléngi ibmar imaksad.
Degisoggu, Jesús gannar Galilea-yarse nonigu, Caná-neggweburse nade-gusad, bia dii vinoga obinnisadse. Deun Capernaum-neggweburgi dule-dummad, Reyga-arbaed-e-machi uelemaid.
We-dule itoargu, Jesús Judea-yarba-gudiid Galilea-yarse noniye, Jesússe nade-gusad. Jesúsgi wilenai-guar, adi e-machi ega nudaknaegar, ar ade e-machi burgwedani maid.
Jesús, abin-sogded: —Ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad, degi, ibmar-geger-daklemalad bemar daksasulina, be an-benmalanad.
Dule-dummad, Reyga-arbaed, sogded: —Dummad, an-machi-burgwed-idu gwae anba be dage.
Jesús, abin-sogded: —Be nae, be-machi dula gudiid. Reyga-arbaed Jesús-degi-ega-sogsad gwen bengussulid. Degisoggu, na e-negse nade-gusad.
Negse monadapgu, e-maigan abin-noarmalad. E-dummad-abingusmargu, ega sogdemalad: —Be-machi bato nugus.
Degi, dummad e-maiganse egichiar, igi-wachigi e-machi nuguarye. Abin-sogdemar: —Sae, wachi-irgwengi ueleged gichaye.
Machigwa-e-bab mag itosad, a-wachigi Jesús ega sogsa-gusad: “Be-machi dula gudiiye.” Machigwa-e-bab, degine, bela e-negginmalad, Jesúsgi bensuli-gunonimarsunnad.
Jesús Judea-yargi-gudiid Galilea-yarse nonigu, we-ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid ilabogus wegi-imaknonido.
We-ibmar degi-gusad-sorbali, Judiomar-iba nonikid. Agi Jesús Jerusalénse nonimogad.
Jerusaléngi, Sibad-Wawaadye-Yawagak-nugad-naba, dii-wilasar-naid, Hebreo-gayagi Betesdaye bileged. Agi neg-imba-dummagan-gwaatar siid.
A-neg-imbamargi uelemalad-bukidar maimalad, ibya-surmalad, geg-nanamalad, bela-abgan-burgwarmalad. Amar dii-sukamaked edarbe mamaimalad.
Ar ade imbagwenar anger aidenoni-daed, dii-wilasar-naid osukamakegar. Ar doa-dule-insa a-dii-wilasar-naid sukamaksad-sorba aidesale, ibi-ueleged nik-dibe, yog nuguar-daed.
Agine, machered-wargwen birga-dulagwen-gakambe-gakabaabakgus uelemaid mai-gusmogad.
Jesús a-machered-meremai dakalid. Jesús wisguargu, we-machered dikasurgus uelemaiye, a-macheredga sogded: —¿Be nugubie?
Dule-uelemaid, abin-imakde, sogded: —Dummad, dii-sukamaksad-sorba dule a-dise an-odeged sate daed, ar an-aideged-idu an-iduar bato dule aides-daed.
Jesús ega sogded: —Be gwisgu, be-egi-gabed na be sede, be nae.
Jesús-degi-sogsad-sorba, dule yog nuguar naded, e-gabed na susa, nadsunnad. A-ibagi deun obunnoged-iba gued.
Agi Judiomar dule-nugusadga sogdemalad: —Emi-ibagi obunnoged-iba naid, degisoggu, be-egi-gabed na be sededsulid.
Dule-nugusad, abin-sogded: —Dule-an-nudaksad, ar a anga soged: ‘Be-egi-gabed na be sedye, be naye.’
Degi dule-nugusadse egisdemarsunnad: —¿Ar doa bega sogsa: ‘Be-egi-gabed na be sedye, be naye?’
Ar dule-nugusad, wichulid, doa ega sogsa, ar Jesúsde bato dulemar-bukidar-gunanaid-abargi banguded.
A-sorbali Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi Jesús dule-nugusad-dakargu, ega sogded: —Be dake, be nugusad. Degisoggu, mer be bar iskuo. Degir, aka-bur-bule boni-dummad begi danikile.
Dule-nugusad nade-gusad, Judiomar-owisodapid, Jesús e-onudaksaye.
A-ulale, Judiomar Jesús-bareginnarmarsunnad, oburgwebi-guarmalad, ar ade obunnoged-ibagi we-ibmarmar imakdiid.
Degi Jesús, abin-sogded: —An-Bab gusgu arbanaiguad, degisoggu, a-ular an arbamosundo.
A-ulale Judiomar bur Jesús-oburgwebi-guarmalad, ar ade Jesús unnila obunnoged-ibabi biskedisulid, Bab Dummad na ebo emar imakdibalid, na sogsadba, Bab Dummad an-Bab-sunnadye.
Jesús geb degi abin-imakdesun: “Napira an bemarga soged, Bab-Dummad-Machi gege na wargwengi ibmar imaked, unnila e-Bab-dakedba ibmar-imaked. Ar e-Bab bela ibmar-imakedi, E-Machi a sunnaa bela ibmar imakmogad.
Ar Bab na Machi-sabsoggu, ibmar-imakedi bela E-Machiga na oyoged. Ar weba bur-bule ibmar-dummagan Bab ega oyogoed, adi bemar bur-bule geger dakmalagar.
Ar igi Bab dule-burgwar-maid gannar oduloge, ega san-burba-dula-gued uke, amba E-Machi deyobmodo, ar doaga san-burba-dulad ukbie, ega ukodo.
Ar Bab emigi bar dulemarga igar-itogosulid, ar ade na E-Machiga we-igargan uksad,
adi bela dulemar E-Machi-nug ogannomogagar, ar igi E-Bab-nug oganno-damarmoga. Ar dule Bab-Dummad-Machi-e-nug odummosulile, E-Bab-nug odummosurmodo, ar ade Bab na E-Machi-barmialid.
“Napira an bemarga soged: Ar dule an-sunmakedba daele, degi, Bab-an-barmialidgi bengusulile, a-dule burba-geg-bergued nikuodo. A-dule bar sabsur odurdaklegosulid, ar burgwar-gudiidgi nosad, dula gudii-gunonisunnad.
Napira an bemarga soged: Ibagan danikoed, emigindi ibagan nonisunnad, dulemar-burbar-burgwarmalad Bab-Dummad-Machi-e-gaya-burba itononikoed, ar dulemar-a-gaya-burba-itosmalad durgunonikoed.
Ar igi Bab na-dukin-na-dulad-nika gudii, amba deyob na E-Machiga na-dukin-na-dula-gued uksamogad.
Deginbali, ar ade Dule-Machisoggu, amba ega igar-uksabalid, dulemarga igar-itogegar.
We-igar mer geger be itomar, ar ibagan danikoed, dulemar-neg-uangi-burgwar-mamaid, bela Bab-Dummad-Machi-e-gaya-burba-itomaloed.
Ar dule-ibmar-nued-imaksamalad gannar durgunonimaloed, burba-dulad nikuegar, ar dule-ibmar-iskana-imaksamaladdi, gannar durgunonimarmogoed, odurdakleged-negse naegar.”
Jesús Judiomarga sogdebar: “Geg na dukin wargwen na ibmar imaked, unnila an-Bab-anga-sogedba an dulemarga igar-itoged. An-igar-itogedi, igar-napiragwadgi an itoged, ar wargwen an-itolegedba an ibmar-imaksulid, an-ibmar-imakedi, dule-an-barmialid-sogedba an ibmar-imaked, an-Bab-sogedba.
“Ar an na dukin ibmar barsogele, an-ibmar-sogedi, igarga gussuliled.
Emigindi dule-baid an-barsoged, a-ular an wisid, dule an-barsoged, napiragwadba an-barsogdiid.
Bemar Juan-Bautistase dulemar-barmiar-gusmalad, egisega, be Mesías sogeye. Juan dulemar-abin imaksagu, napiragwadgi angi sogsa-gusad, ani an Mesíasye.
Ar we-napneggined-dulemar an-barsoged an amidisulid, degi-inigwele, we Juan-sogsad an bemarga sogmalad, adi bemar-abonolemalagar.
Ar igi acha-gwallu gummake, degine, mee-gae, ayobi Juan-Bautista gunonikid. Ar bemar unnila ichesaar a-gwallugine yeer-itodii-gudigusmalad.
“Ar Juan angi sogdigusadba bur-bule an-ibmar-imakdiidba an bemarga oyonaid, an doa-dule gue. Ar arbaegala Bab arbaed anga uksad, ar arbaed an imakdiid, a bato oyonaid, Bab an-barmiarye.
Deginbali, Bab-an-barmialid, bato angi sunmaksa-gusad. Bemardi bipisaale e-gaya-sunmaked be itodisurmalad, degine, e-dakleged be dakdisurmarbalid.
Deginbali, Bab-gaya-burba bemargi gwen naisurbalid. Ar Bab na dule bemarse barmialidi, bemar a-dule-benmalad.
Bab-Dummad-Garda-narmakar-naid nue be baramimar, ar agi burba-geg-bergued baramilesiye be sogmalad. Ar a-Gardagi angi sunmaknaid, an doa-dule gue.
Ar degite anse bemar yapa dagmalad, adi burba-geg-bergued bemar nikuegar.
“Dulemar an-nug-odummoged, an abingasulid.
Ar an bemar-wisid, bemar Bab-Dummad-sabsurmalad.
An-Bab-nuggi an bemarse nonikid, degite be an-abingasurmalad. Ar dule-baid na dukin e-nuggi danikoeddi, adi bemar a-dule-abingamaloed.
¿Ar igi bemar Bab-Dummad-bensuli-gumalosunna, ar unnila na be muchub-muchub san-ogannodimalad, ar Bab-Dummad-unnila-wargwenna-guedgi nug-gangued-danikid bemar amisurmalad?
“Mer bemar binsamalo, ani an-Bab-asabin bemargi gwisgumaloye. Suli, dule bato nika bemargi-gwisgumaloed, Moisés. Ar a-dulegi bemar sogmalad, a-igar-mesisadgi anmar-nanaedba an nibnegse dogmaloye. Bemar-iskudimaladba a-Moisés bemargi Bab-Dummad-asabin gwisgumaloed.
Ar Moisés-ibmar-sogsad be bengusurmalana, be an-bensurmalando, ar Moisés-ibmar-narmaksad angi narmaksad.
Ar Moisés-ibmar-narmaksad be benmaladde, degite, ¿igi an-ibmar-sogedgi bensuli be gumalosunna? Be an-bengumaloe.”
We degi-gusad-sorbali, Jesús Galilea-mata-dummad-obakar nade-gusad. We-mata-dummad Tiberias-mataye-nugbalid.
Dulemar-bukidar Jesúsba nade-gusmalad, ar ade ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid dule-uelemaladgi-imakdiid daksamalad.
Agi Jesús yar-birse nakwisgu, e-sapinganmala agi sigdapmalad.
Deun Judiomar-iba, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba bato omosad.
Jesús atakdegu, dakded, dulemar-bukidar ese nonimala. Agi Felipega sogded: —¿Wemar madu gunmalagar, wede bia anmar madu bakoe?
Unnila binsa Felipe-wilubdakega Jesús weyob Felipega sogsa-gusad, ar edi na bato wisid igi imakoe.
Felipe, Jesús-abin sogded: —Dule-wargwen nii-walabaabak-arbana-bennukleged, a-manigi madu baklesale, amba unnisuliled, belagwapa wis madu bipi-bipi gunmalagar.
Geb degi e-sapin-baid, Andrés, Simón-Pedro-e-urba, Jesúsga sogded:
—Wegi machigwa-wargwen cebada-madu-gwaatar wis sediid, degine, ua-burwigana wis ukabo sedibalid, degite, ¿ar wede unniosi, ar dule bukidarad?
Jesús degi sogded: —Nabir. Dulemar be urbemar. A-degi-gunanaidgine, gagan bukidar naid. Agi dulemar ambikusmargu, miliatar-wilub machergan mergu daklealid.
Jesús madu susgua, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsagu, e-sapinganga madu uke-uke imaksad. Geb e-sapingan dulemar-gagan-birgi-bukmaladga ukdemogad. Jesús amba deyob ua-imaksabalid, ar bule-mergu abemaladba ega uksamalad.
Bela dulemar immelesmargu, Jesús e-sapinganga sogded: —Bela gwabgusmalad be wemar, adi mer binsa mas milegegar.
Cebada-madu-gwaataled bela guchamalad-sorba, gwabgusmalad wesmargu, garba-gwaambe-gakabo-mergu enosmar daklealid.
